{
  type: 10,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 22, line: 1, offset: 21 },
    source: "<div v-if='ok'></div>"
  },
  condition: {
    type: 4,
    content: '_ctx.ok',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'ok' }
  },
  children: [
    {
      type: 1,
      ns: 0,
      tag: 'div',
      tagType: 0,
      props: [],
      isSelfClosing: false,
      children: [],
      loc: [Object],
      codegenNode: [Object]
    }
  ],
  userKey: undefined
}
--------- node.branches[0].condition ---------
{
  type: 4,
  content: '_ctx.ok',
  isStatic: false,
  constType: 0,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 12, line: 1, offset: 11 },
    end: { column: 14, line: 1, offset: 13 },
    source: 'ok'
  }
}
undefined
  1. processIf()

    初始化 v-if process 函数， processIf 函数里面会针对 v-if 节点甚至它的兄弟节点做 一系列操作，比如将下一个是 v-else 的兄弟节点删除移到自己的 branches[] 里面。

     1: function processIf(node, dir, context, processCodegen) {
 2:   logg('processIf - node - dir', node, dir)
 3:   if (
 4:     dir.name !== 'else' &&
 5:     (!dir.exp || !dir.exp.content.trim())
 6:   ) {
 7:     const loc = dir.exp ? dir.exp.loc : node.loc
 8:     // <div v-if></div> 没有指令值的情况，默认值为 true
 9:     dir.exp = createSimpleExpression(`true`, false, loc)
10:   }
11: 
12:   if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers && dir.exp) {
13:     // dir.exp can only be simple expression because vIf transform is applied
14:     // before expression transform.
15:     dir.exp = processExpression(dir.exp, context)
16:   }
17: 
18:   if (dir.name === 'if') { // v-if
19:     const branch = createIfBranch(node, dir)
20:     const ifNode = {
21:       type: NodeTypes.IF,
22:       loc: node.loc,
23:       branches: [branch]
24:     }
25:     context.replaceNode(ifNode)
26:     if (processCodegen) {
27:       return processCodegen(ifNode, branch, true)
28:     }
29:   } else {
30:     // locate the adjacent v-if
31:     const siblings = context.parent.children
32:     const comments = []
33:     let i = siblings.indexOf(node)
34:     while (i-- >= -1) {
35:       const sibling = siblings[i]
36: 
37:       // 空行，空文本
38:       if (
39:         sibling &&
40:         sibling.type === NodeTypes.TEXT &&
41:         !sibling.content.trim().length
42:       ) {
43:         context.removeNode(sibling)
44:         continue
45:       }
46: 
47:       if (sibling && sibling.type === NodeTypes.IF) {
48:         // 这里会将原本的结点删除，而是用新组装的 if 结构(包含else-if, else 分支的结构，node.branches[...])
49:         context.removeNode()
50:         const branch = createIfBranch(node, dir)
51:         sibling.branches.push(branch)
52: 
53:         const onExit = processCodegen && processCodegen(sibling, branch, false)
54:         // 这里需要手动触发一次遍历，因为上面将原本的分支节点从原来的节点树中删除了
55:         traverseNode(branch, context)
56:         // 回溯结束后执行收集到的 transformXxx 函数
57:         if (onExit) onExit()
58:         // make sure to reset currentNode after traversal to indicate this
59:         // node has been removed.
60:         context.currentNode = null
61:       }
62:       break
63:     }
64:   }
65: }

    其中 branches 保存着所有 v-else, v-else-if 分支节点，这里其实是创建了一个默认的 分支节点(注释结点)，因为 v-if 系列指令在 render 函数中是以三元运算符(?:)形式存在 的，所以 if 后面必须要有一个分支，即 condition ? node1 : node2 中的 node2 必须是 个有效的值，才能正常使用 ?: 运算符。

  2. processExpression()
      1: // Important: since this function uses Node.js only dependencies, it should
  2: // always be used with a leading !__BROWSER__ check so that it can be
  3: // tree-shaken from the browser build.
  4: function processExpression(
  5:   node,
  6:   context,
  7:   // some expressions like v-slot props & v-for aliases should be parsed as
  8:   // function params
  9:   asParams = false,
 10:   // v-on handler values may contain multiple statements
 11:   asRawStatements = false,
 12:   localVars = Object.create(context.identifiers)
 13: ) {
 14:   if (__BROWSER__) {
 15:     return node
 16:   }
 17: 
 18:   if (!context.prefixIdentifiers || !node.content.trim()) {
 19:     return node
 20:   }
 21: 
 22:   const { inline, bindingMetadata } = context
 23:   const rewriteIdentifier = (raw, parent, id) => {
 24:     const type = hasOwn(bindingMetadata, raw) && bindingMetadata[raw]
 25:     if (inline) {
 26:       // x = y
 27:       const isAssignmentLVal =
 28:         parent && parent.type === 'AssignmentExpression' && parent.left === id
 29:       // x++
 30:       const isUpdateArg =
 31:         parent && parent.type === 'UpdateExpression' && parent.argument === id
 32:       // ({ x } = y)
 33:       const isDestructureAssignment =
 34:         parent && isInDestructureAssignment(parent, parentStack)
 35: 
 36:       if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST || localVars[raw]) {
 37:         return raw
 38:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_REF) {
 39:         return `${raw}.value`
 40:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_MAYBE_REF) {
 41:         // const binding that may or may not be ref
 42:         // if it's not a ref, then assignments don't make sense -
 43:         // so we ignore the non-ref assignment case and generate code
 44:         // that assumes the value to be a ref for more efficiency
 45:         return isAssignmentLVal || isUpdateArg || isDestructureAssignment
 46:           ? `${raw}.value`
 47:           : `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
 48:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_LET) {
 49:         if (isAssignmentLVal) {
 50:           // let binding.
 51:           // this is a bit more tricky as we need to cover the case where
 52:           // let is a local non-ref value, and we need to replicate the
 53:           // right hand side value.
 54:           // x = y --> isRef(x) ? x.value = y : x = y
 55:           const { right: rVal, operator } = parent
 56:           const rExp = rawExp.slice(rVal.start - 1, rVal.end - 1)
 57:           const rExpString = stringifyExpression(
 58:             processExpression(
 59:               createSimpleExpression(rExp, false),
 60:               context,
 61:               false,
 62:               false,
 63:               knownIds
 64:             )
 65:           )
 66:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${raw}.value ${operator} ${rExpString} : ${raw}`
 67:         } else if (isUpdateArg) {
 68:           // make id replace parent in the code range so the raw update operator
 69:           // is removed
 70:           id.start = parent.start
 71:           id.end = parent.end
 72:           const { prefix: isPrefix, operator } = parent
 73:           const prefix = isPrefix ? operator : ``
 74:           const postfix = isPrefix ? `` : operator
 75:           // let binding.
 76:           // x++ --> isRef(a) ? a.value++ : a++
 77:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${prefix}${raw}.value${postfix} : ${prefix}${raw}${postfix}`
 78:         } else if (isDestructureAssignment) {
 79:           // TODO
 80:           // let binding in a destructure assignment - it's very tricky to
 81:           // handle both possible cases here without altering the original
 82:           // structure of the code, so we just assume it's not a ref here
 83:           // for now
 84:           return raw
 85:         } else {
 86:           return `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
 87:         }
 88:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS) {
 89:         // use __props which is generated by compileScript so in ts mode
 90:         // it gets correct type
 91:         return `__props.${raw}`
 92:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
 93:         // prop with a different local alias (from defineProps() destructure)
 94:         return `__props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
 95:       }
 96:     } else {
 97:       if (type && type.startsWith('setup')) {
 98:         // setup bindings in non-inline mode
 99:         return `$setup.${raw}`
100:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
101:         return `$props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
102:       } else if (type) {
103:         return `$${type}.${raw}`
104:       }
105:     }
106: 
107:     // fallback to ctx
108:     return `_ctx.${raw}`
109:   }
110: 
111:   // fast path if expression is a simple identifier.
112:   const rawExp = node.content
113:   // bail constant on parens (function invocation) and dot (member access)
114:   const bailConstant = rawExp.indexOf(`(`) > -1 || rawExp.indexOf('.') > 0
115: 
116:   if (isSimpleIdentifier(rawExp)) {
117:     const isScopeVarReference = context.identifiers[rawExp]
118:     const isAllowedGlobal = isGloballyWhitelisted(rawExp)
119:     const isLiteral = isLiteralWhitelisted(rawExp)
120:     if (!asParams && !isScopeVarReference && !isAllowedGlobal && !isLiteral) {
121:       // const bindings exposed from setup can be skipped for patching but
122:       // cannot be hoisted to module scope
123:       if (bindingMetadata[node.content] === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST) {
124:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_SKIP_PATCH
125:       }
126:       node.content = rewriteIdentifier(rawExp)
127:     } else if (!isScopeVarReference) {
128:       if (isLiteral) {
129:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
130:       } else {
131:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
132:       }
133:     }
134:     return node
135:   }
136: 
137:   let ast
138:   // exp needs to be parsed differently:
139:   // 1. Multiple inline statements (v-on, with presence of `;`): parse as raw
140:   //    exp, but make sure to pad with spaces for consistent ranges
141:   // 2. Expressions: wrap with parens (for e.g. object expressions)
142:   // 3. Function arguments (v-for, v-slot): place in a function argument position
143:   const source = asRawStatements
144:     ? ` ${rawExp} `
145:     : `(${rawExp})${asParams ? `=>{}` : ``}`
146:   try {
147:     ast = babelParser.parse(source, {
148:       plugins: context.expressionPlugins
149:     }).program
150:   } catch (e) {
151:     return node
152:   }
153: 
154:   const ids= []
155:   const parentStack = []
156:   const knownIds = Object.create(context.identifiers)
157: 
158:   walkIdentifiers(
159:     ast,
160:     (node, parent, _, isReferenced, isLocal) => {
161:       if (isStaticPropertyKey(node, parent)) {
162:         return
163:       }
164: 
165:       const needPrefix = isReferenced && canPrefix(node)
166:       if (needPrefix && !isLocal) {
167:         if (isStaticProperty(parent) && parent.shorthand) {
168:           // property shorthand like { foo }, we need to add the key since
169:           // we rewrite the value
170:           node.prefix = `${node.name}: `
171:         }
172:         node.name = rewriteIdentifier(node.name, parent, node)
173:         ids.push(node)
174:       } else {
175:         // The identifier is considered constant unless it's pointing to a
176:         // local scope variable (a v-for alias, or a v-slot prop)
177:         if (!(needPrefix && isLocal) && !bailConstant) {
178:           node.isConstant = true
179:         }
180:         // also generate sub-expressions for other identifiers for better
181:         // source map support. (except for property keys which are static)
182:         ids.push(node)
183:       }
184:     },
185:     true, // invoke on ALL identifiers
186:     parentStack,
187:     knownIds
188:   )
189: 
190:   // We break up the compound expression into an array of strings and sub
191:   // expressions (for identifiers that have been prefixed). In codegen, if
192:   // an ExpressionNode has the `.children` property, it will be used instead of
193:   // `.content`.
194:   const children = []
195:   ids.sort((a, b) => a.start - b.start)
196:   ids.forEach((id, i) => {
197:     // range is offset by -1 due to the wrapping parens when parsed
198:     const start = id.start - 1
199:     const end = id.end - 1
200:     const last = ids[i - 1]
201:     const leadingText = rawExp.slice(last ? last.end - 1 : 0, start)
202:     if (leadingText.length || id.prefix) {
203:       children.push(leadingText + (id.prefix || ``))
204:     }
205:     const source = rawExp.slice(start, end)
206:     children.push(
207:       createSimpleExpression(
208:         id.name,
209:         false,
210:         {
211:           source,
212:           start: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, start),
213:           end: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, end)
214:         },
215:         id.isConstant ? ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY : ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
216:       )
217:     )
218:     if (i === ids.length - 1 && end < rawExp.length) {
219:       children.push(rawExp.slice(end))
220:     }
221:   })
222: 
223:   let ret
224:   if (children.length) {
225:     ret = createCompoundExpression(children, node.loc)
226:   } else {
227:     ret = node
228:     ret.constType = bailConstant
229:       ? ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
230:       : ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
231:   }
232:   ret.identifiers = Object.keys(knownIds)
233:   return ret
234: }
235: 
236: function canPrefix(id) {
237:   // skip whitelisted globals
238:   if (isGloballyWhitelisted(id.name)) {
239:     return false
240:   }
241:   // special case for webpack compilation
242:   if (id.name === 'require') {
243:     return false
244:   }
245:   return true
246: }
247: 
248: function stringifyExpression(exp){
249:   if (isString(exp)) {
250:     return exp
251:   } else if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
252:     return exp.content
253:   } else {
254:     return exp.children.map(stringifyExpression).join('')
255:   }
256: }
257:
  3. getParentCondition()
     1: function getParentCondition(node) {
 2:   while (true) {
 3:     if (node.type === NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION) {
 4:       if (node.alternate.type === NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION) {
 5:         node = node.alternate
 6:       } else {
 7:         return node
 8:       }
 9:     } else if (node.type === NodeTypes.JS_CACHE_EXPRESSION) {
10:       node = node.value
11:     }
12:   }
13: }
14:
  4. createIfBranch()
     1: function createIfBranch(node, dir) {
 2:   return {
 3:     type: NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH,
 4:     loc: node.loc,
 5:     condition: dir.name === 'else' ? undefined : dir.exp,
 6:     children:
 7:       node.tagType === ElementTypes.TEMPLATE && !findDir(node, 'for')
 8:         ? node.children
 9:         : [node],
10:     userKey: findProp(node, `key`)
11:   }
12: }
  5. createCodegenNodeForBranch()
     1: function createCodegenNodeForBranch(branch, keyIndex, context) {
 2:   if (branch.condition) {
 3:     return createConditionalExpression(
 4:       branch.condition,
 5:       createChildrenCodegenNode(branch, keyIndex, context),
 6:       // 这里是考虑到只有 v-if 的情况，因为 v-if 指令最后都会被解析成三目运算符形式
 7:       // 如： <div v-if="foo"/><div v-else/> => foo ? ... : ...
 8:       // 如： <div v-if="foo"/><div v-else-if="bar"/><div v-else/> => foo ? ... : bar ? ... : ...
 9:       // 所以必需得要有一个 v-else，如果没有的话就相当于是 `foo ? ...` 这样的语句是不合法的
10:       // 因此这里在判断没有 v-else 分支的情况时默认给它创建了个注释节点
11:       createCallExpression(context.helper(CREATE_COMMENT), [
12:         __DEV__ ? '"v-if"' : '""',
13:         'true'
14:       ])
15:     )
16:   } else {
17:     return createChildrenCodegenNode(branch, keyIndex, context)
18:   }
19: }
  6. createChildrenCodegenNode()
     1: function createChildrenCodegenNode(branch, keyIndex, context) {
 2:   const { helper } = context
 3:   const keyProperty = createObjectProperty(
 4:     `key`,
 5:     createSimpleExpression(
 6:       `${keyIndex}`,
 7:       false,
 8:       locStub,
 9:       ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
10:     )
11:   )
12:   const { children } = branch
13:   const firstChild = children[0]
14:   const needFragmentWrapper =
15:     children.length !== 1 || firstChild.type !== NodeTypes.ELEMENT
16:   if (needFragmentWrapper) {
17:     if (children.length === 1 && firstChild.type === NodeTypes.FOR) {
18:       // optimize away nested fragments when child is a ForNode
19:       const vnodeCall = firstChild.codegenNode
20:       injectProp(vnodeCall, keyProperty, context)
21:       return vnodeCall
22:     } else {
23:       let patchFlag = PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT
24:       let patchFlagText = PatchFlagNames[PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT]
25: 
26:       return createVNodeCall(
27:         context,
28:         helper(FRAGMENT),
29:         createObjectExpression([keyProperty]),
30:         children,
31:         patchFlag + (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${patchFlagText} */` : ``),
32:         undefined,
33:         undefined,
34:         true,
35:         false,
36:         false /* isComponent */,
37:         branch.loc
38:       )
39:     }
40:   } else {
41:     const ret = firstChild.codegenNode
42:     const vnodeCall = getMemoedVNodeCall(ret)
43:     // Change createVNode to createBlock.
44:     if (vnodeCall.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
45:       makeBlock(vnodeCall, context)
46:     }
47:     // inject branch key
48:     injectProp(vnodeCall, keyProperty, context)
49:     return ret
50:   }
51: }
  7. isSameKey()
     1: function isSameKey(a, b) {
 2:   if (!a || a.type !== b.type) {
 3:     return false
 4:   }
 5:   if (a.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE) {
 6:     if (a.value.content !== b.value.content) {
 7:       return false
 8:     }
 9:   } else {
10:     // directive
11:     const exp = a.exp
12:     const branchExp = b.exp
13:     if (exp.type !== branchExp.type) {
14:       return false
15:     }
16:     if (
17:       exp.type !== NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION ||
18:       exp.isStatic !== branchExp.isStatic ||
19:       exp.content !== branchExp.content
20:     ) {
21:       return false
22:     }
23:   }
24:   return true
25: }

3.9.5. transformSlotOutlet()

处理 <slot/> 插槽,插槽会被解析并存放到 $slots 上，实际渲染是调用 renderSlot 这个 函数(renderSlot($slots, slotName, props, children, scopeId), 而每个 slot 都是个 函数，例如使用 h 函数是(h(Comp, props, { default: () => default slot, slot1: () => named slot }), 因为 Comp 是组件类型，因此第三个参数会被当前 slots 处理，详情 Vue3 源码头脑风暴之 7 ☞ runtime-core(1) - 若叶知秋)。

 1: const transformSlotOutlet = (node, context) => {
 2:   if (isSlotOutlet(node)) { // <slot/>
 3:     const { children, loc } = node
 4:     const { slotName, slotProps } = processSlotOutlet(node, context)
 5: 
 6:     const slotArgs = [
 7:       context.prefixIdentifiers ? `_ctx.$slots` : `$slots`,
 8:       slotName,
 9:       '{}', //  props
10:       'undefined', // children
11:       'true'
12:     ]
13:     let expectedLen = 2
14: 
15:     if (slotProps) {
16:       slotArgs[2] = slotProps
17:       expectedLen = 3
18:     }
19: 
20:     if (children.length) {
21:       slotArgs[3] = createFunctionExpression([], children, false, false, loc)
22:       expectedLen = 4
23:     }
24: 
25:     if (context.scopeId && !context.slotted) {
26:       expectedLen = 5
27:     }
28:     slotArgs.splice(expectedLen) // remove unused arguments
29: 
30:     // -> renderSlot($slots, slotName, props, children, true)
31:     node.codegenNode = createCallExpression(
32:       context.helper(RENDER_SLOT), // renderSlot
33:       slotArgs,
34:       loc
35:     )
36:   }
37: }
38: 
39: function processSlotOutlet(
40:   node,
41:   context
42: ) {
43:   let slotName = `"default"`
44:   let slotProps = undefined
45: 
46:   const nonNameProps = [] // 无名插槽
47:   logg(`processSlotOutlet| props.length = ${node.props.length}`)
48:   for (let i = 0; i < node.props.length; i++) {
49:     const p = node.props[i]
50:     logg(`processSlotOutlet| props[${i}]`, p)
51:     if (p.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE) { // 静态 <slot name="xxx"/>
52:       if (p.value) {
53:         if (p.name === 'name') {
54:           slotName = JSON.stringify(p.value.content)
55:         } else {
56:           p.name = camelize(p.name)
57:           nonNameProps.push(p)
58:         }
59:       }
60:     } else { // 动态 <slot :name="xxx"/>
61:       // 动态插槽 <slot v-bind:name="slotName"/>
62:       if (p.name === 'bind' && isStaticArgOf(p.arg, 'name')) {
63:         if (p.exp) slotName = p.exp
64:       } else {
65:         if (p.name === 'bind' && p.arg && isStaticExp(p.arg)) {
66:           p.arg.content = camelize(p.arg.content)
67:         }
68:         nonNameProps.push(p)
69:       }
70:     }
71:   }
72: 
73:   logg(`processSlotOutlet| nonNameProps.length=${nonNameProps.length}`)
74:   if (nonNameProps.length > 0) {
75:     const { props, directives } = buildProps(node, context, nonNameProps)
76:     slotProps = props
77: 
78:     if (directives.length) {
79:       logg('[ERROR] X_V_SLOT_UNEXPECTED_DIRECTIVE_ON_SLOT_OUTLET')
80:     }
81:   }
82: 
83:   return {
84:     slotName,
85:     slotProps
86:   }
87: }

Testing


Testing v-if with slot 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: const { node, root } = parseWithIfTransform("<template v-if='ok'><slot/></template>")
4: logg('root ast', root)
5: logg(`node.type=${node.type}, NodeTypes.IF=${NodeTypes.IF}`)
6: logg(`node.codegenNode`, node.codegenNode)
7: logg(`node.codegenNode.consequent`, node.codegenNode.consequent)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
parseAttribute| match=v-if,if,,
--------- ATTR ---------
{
  type: 7,
  name: 'if',
  exp: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'ok',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'ok' }
  },
  arg: undefined,
  modifiers: [],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 11, line: 1, offset: 10 },
    end: { column: 20, line: 1, offset: 19 },
    source: "v-if='ok'"
  }
}
--------- processIf - node - dir ---------
{
  type: 1,
  ns: 0,
  tag: 'template',
  tagType: 3,
  props: [],
  isSelfClosing: false,
  children: [
    {
      type: 1,
      ns: 0,
      tag: 'slot',
      tagType: 2,
      props: [],
      isSelfClosing: true,
      children: [],
      loc: [Object],
      codegenNode: undefined
    }
  ],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 39, line: 1, offset: 38 },
    source: "<template v-if='ok'><slot/></template>"
  },
  codegenNode: undefined
}
{
  type: 7,
  name: 'if',
  exp: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'ok',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'ok' }
  },
  arg: undefined,
  modifiers: [],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 11, line: 1, offset: 10 },
    end: { column: 20, line: 1, offset: 19 },
    source: "v-if='ok'"
  }
}
--------- transformIf ---------
{
  type: 9,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 39, line: 1, offset: 38 },
    source: "<template v-if='ok'><slot/></template>"
  },
  branches: [
    {
      type: 10,
      loc: [Object],
      condition: [Object],
      children: [Array],
      userKey: undefined
    }
  ]
}
{
  isRoot: true,
  branch: {
    type: 10,
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: "<template v-if='ok'><slot/></template>"
    },
    condition: {
      type: 4,
      content: 'ok',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    },
    children: [ [Object] ],
    userKey: undefined
  }
}
--------- processSlotOutlet| props.length = 0 ---------
--------- processSlotOutlet| nonNameProps.length=0 ---------
--------- transformIf - isRoot - v-if ---------
{
  type: 9,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 39, line: 1, offset: 38 },
    source: "<template v-if='ok'><slot/></template>"
  },
  branches: [
    {
      type: 10,
      loc: [Object],
      condition: [Object],
      children: [Array],
      userKey: undefined
    }
  ],
  codegenNode: {
    type: 19,
    test: {
      type: 4,
      content: 'ok',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    },
    consequent: {
      type: 14,
      loc: [Object],
      callee: Symbol(renderSlot),
      arguments: [Array]
    },
    alternate: {
      type: 14,
      loc: [Object],
      callee: Symbol(createCommentVNode),
      arguments: [Array]
    },
    newline: true,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] }
  }
}
--------- createRootCodegen ---------
children=1, 只有一个用 block, 多个用Fragment
--------- parseWithIfTransform| ast.children.length=1 ---------
--------- parseWithIfTransform| NodeTypes.IF=9 ---------
ast.children[0].type=9
--------- root ast ---------
{
  type: 0,
  children: [
    {
      type: 9,
      loc: [Object],
      branches: [Array],
      codegenNode: [Object]
    }
  ],
  helpers: [ Symbol(renderSlot), Symbol(createCommentVNode) ],
  components: [],
  directives: [],
  hoists: [],
  imports: [],
  cached: 0,
  temps: 0,
  codegenNode: {
    type: 9,
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: "<template v-if='ok'><slot/></template>"
    },
    branches: [ [Object] ],
    codegenNode: {
      type: 19,
      test: [Object],
      consequent: [Object],
      alternate: [Object],
      newline: true,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  },
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 39, line: 1, offset: 38 },
    source: "<template v-if='ok'><slot/></template>"
  }
}
--------- node.type=9, NodeTypes.IF=9 ---------
--------- node.codegenNode ---------
{
  type: 19,
  test: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'ok',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'ok' }
  },
  consequent: {
    type: 14,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '<slot/>' },
    callee: Symbol(renderSlot),
    arguments: [ '$slots', '"default"', [Object] ]
  },
  alternate: {
    type: 14,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    callee: Symbol(createCommentVNode),
    arguments: [ '"v-if"', 'true' ]
  },
  newline: true,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  }
}
--------- node.codegenNode.consequent ---------
{
  type: 14,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 21, line: 1, offset: 20 },
    end: { column: 28, line: 1, offset: 27 },
    source: '<slot/>'
  },
  callee: Symbol(renderSlot),
  arguments: [
    '$slots',
    '"default"',
    { type: 15, loc: [Object], properties: [Array] }
  ]
}
undefined

Testing default slot outlet 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: const ast = parseWithSlots("<slot/>")
3: logg('ast.children[0]', ast.children[0])
4: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode', ast.children[0].codegenNode)

type:14 是函数调用 => renderSlot($slots, 'default')


Testing named slot outlet 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: const ast = parseWithSlots("<slot name="foo" />")
3: logg('ast.children[0]', ast.children[0])
4: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode - 具名插槽', ast.children[0].codegenNode)

type:14 是函数调用 => renderSlot($slots, "foo")


Testing dynamic named slot outlet 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: const ast = parseWithSlots("<slot :name="foo" />")
3: logg('ast.children[0]', ast.children[0])
4: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode - 具名插槽', ast.children[0].codegenNode)

type:14 是函数调用 => renderSlot($slots, foo)


Testing dynamic named slot outlet with prefixIdentifiers=true 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: const ast = parseWithSlots("<slot :name="foo" />", { prefixIdentifiers: true })
3: logg('ast.children[0]', ast.children[0])
4: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode - 具名插槽', ast.children[0].codegenNode)

type:14 是函数调用 => renderSlot(_ctx.$slots, _ctx.foo) 且变量都使用上下文对象引 用。


Testing default slot outlet with props 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: const ast = parseWithSlots(
3:   `<slot :name="foo" foo="bar" :bax="qux" :foo-bar="foo-bar" />`
4: )
5: logg('ast.children[0]', ast.children[0])
6: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode - 具名插槽', ast.children[0].codegenNode)
7: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments', ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments')

type:14 是函数调用 => renderSlot($slots, "foo", { foo, bax, fooBar }) 。


Testing default slot outlet with fallback 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: const ast = parseWithSlots(
3:   `<slot :name="foo" foo="bar" :bax="qux" :foo-bar="foo-bar"><div/></slot>`
4: )
5: logg('ast.children[0]', ast.children[0])
6: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments', ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments')
7: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments[3]', ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments[3')

type:14 是函数调用 => renderSlot($slots, "foo", {}, () => div) 第四个是 children 如果指定了 {slotted: false} 那这个 children 就一直是 undefined 如下面的 示例。


Testing default slot outlet with slotted=false 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: const ast = parseWithSlots(
3:   `<slot><div/></slot>`,
4:   { slotted: false, scopeId: 'foo' }
5: )
6: logg('ast.children[0]', ast.children[0])
7: logg('ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments', ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments)
8: logg(`ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments[3]=${ast.children[0].codegenNode.arguments[3]}`)

type:14 是函数调用 => renderSlot($slots, "foo", {}, undefined) 第四个是 children 是 undefined 因为 slotted:false 在这里拦截了 children 的处理。

3.9.6. transformExpression()

  1: const isLiteralWhitelisted = /*#__PURE__*/ makeMap('true,false,null,this')
  2: 
  3: const transformExpression = (node, context) => {
  4:   logg(`transformExpression`, node)
  5:   // 插值处理
  6:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION) {
  7:     node.content = processExpression(
  8:       node.content ,
  9:       context
 10:     )
 11:   } else if (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
 12:     // 处理元素上的指令
 13:     for (let i = 0; i < node.props.length; i++) {
 14:       const dir = node.props[i]
 15:       logg(`transformExpression - prop[${i}] - directive`, node.props[i])
 16:       // do not process for v-on & v-for since they are special handled
 17:       if (dir.type === NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE && dir.name !== 'for') { // v-for 在 vFor.ts 中处理
 18:         const exp = dir.exp
 19:         const arg = dir.arg
 20:         // do not process exp if this is v-on:arg - we need special handling
 21:         // for wrapping inline statements.
 22:         if (
 23:           exp &&
 24:           exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION &&
 25:           !(dir.name === 'on' && arg)
 26:         ) {
 27:           dir.exp = processExpression(
 28:             exp,
 29:             context,
 30:             // slot args must be processed as function params
 31:             dir.name === 'slot'
 32:           )
 33:         }
 34:         if (arg && arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION && !arg.isStatic) {
 35:           dir.arg = processExpression(arg, context)
 36:         }
 37:       }
 38:     }
 39:   }
 40: }
 41: 
 42: // Important: since this function uses Node.js only dependencies, it should
 43: // always be used with a leading !__BROWSER__ check so that it can be
 44: // tree-shaken from the browser build.
 45: function processExpression(
 46:   node,
 47:   context,
 48:   // some expressions like v-slot props & v-for aliases should be parsed as
 49:   // function params
 50:   asParams = false,
 51:   // v-on handler values may contain multiple statements
 52:   asRawStatements = false,
 53:   localVars = Object.create(context.identifiers)
 54: ) {
 55:   if (__BROWSER__) {
 56:     return node
 57:   }
 58: 
 59:   if (!context.prefixIdentifiers || !node.content.trim()) {
 60:     return node
 61:   }
 62: 
 63:   const { inline, bindingMetadata } = context
 64:   const rewriteIdentifier = (raw, parent, id) => {
 65:     const type = hasOwn(bindingMetadata, raw) && bindingMetadata[raw]
 66:     if (inline) {
 67:       // x = y
 68:       const isAssignmentLVal =
 69:         parent && parent.type === 'AssignmentExpression' && parent.left === id
 70:       // x++
 71:       const isUpdateArg =
 72:         parent && parent.type === 'UpdateExpression' && parent.argument === id
 73:       // ({ x } = y)
 74:       const isDestructureAssignment =
 75:         parent && isInDestructureAssignment(parent, parentStack)
 76: 
 77:       if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST || localVars[raw]) {
 78:         return raw
 79:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_REF) {
 80:         return `${raw}.value`
 81:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_MAYBE_REF) {
 82:         // const binding that may or may not be ref
 83:         // if it's not a ref, then assignments don't make sense -
 84:         // so we ignore the non-ref assignment case and generate code
 85:         // that assumes the value to be a ref for more efficiency
 86:         return isAssignmentLVal || isUpdateArg || isDestructureAssignment
 87:           ? `${raw}.value`
 88:           : `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
 89:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_LET) {
 90:         if (isAssignmentLVal) {
 91:           // let binding.
 92:           // this is a bit more tricky as we need to cover the case where
 93:           // let is a local non-ref value, and we need to replicate the
 94:           // right hand side value.
 95:           // x = y --> isRef(x) ? x.value = y : x = y
 96:           const { right: rVal, operator } = parent
 97:           const rExp = rawExp.slice(rVal.start - 1, rVal.end - 1)
 98:           const rExpString = stringifyExpression(
 99:             processExpression(
100:               createSimpleExpression(rExp, false),
101:               context,
102:               false,
103:               false,
104:               knownIds
105:             )
106:           )
107:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${raw}.value ${operator} ${rExpString} : ${raw}`
108:         } else if (isUpdateArg) {
109:           // make id replace parent in the code range so the raw update operator
110:           // is removed
111:           id.start = parent.start
112:           id.end = parent.end
113:           const { prefix: isPrefix, operator } = parent
114:           const prefix = isPrefix ? operator : ``
115:           const postfix = isPrefix ? `` : operator
116:           // let binding.
117:           // x++ --> isRef(a) ? a.value++ : a++
118:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${prefix}${raw}.value${postfix} : ${prefix}${raw}${postfix}`
119:         } else if (isDestructureAssignment) {
120:           // TODO
121:           // let binding in a destructure assignment - it's very tricky to
122:           // handle both possible cases here without altering the original
123:           // structure of the code, so we just assume it's not a ref here
124:           // for now
125:           return raw
126:         } else {
127:           return `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
128:         }
129:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS) {
130:         // use __props which is generated by compileScript so in ts mode
131:         // it gets correct type
132:         return `__props.${raw}`
133:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
134:         // prop with a different local alias (from defineProps() destructure)
135:         return `__props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
136:       }
137:     } else {
138:       if (type && type.startsWith('setup')) {
139:         // setup bindings in non-inline mode
140:         return `$setup.${raw}`
141:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
142:         return `$props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
143:       } else if (type) {
144:         return `$${type}.${raw}`
145:       }
146:     }
147: 
148:     // fallback to ctx
149:     return `_ctx.${raw}`
150:   }
151: 
152:   // fast path if expression is a simple identifier.
153:   const rawExp = node.content
154:   // bail constant on parens (function invocation) and dot (member access)
155:   const bailConstant = rawExp.indexOf(`(`) > -1 || rawExp.indexOf('.') > 0
156: 
157:   logg(`processExpression - node.content: ${rawExp}`)
158:   if (isSimpleIdentifier(rawExp)) {
159:     const isScopeVarReference = context.identifiers[rawExp]
160:     const isAllowedGlobal = isGloballyWhitelisted(rawExp)
161:     const isLiteral = isLiteralWhitelisted(rawExp)
162:     if (!asParams && !isScopeVarReference && !isAllowedGlobal && !isLiteral) {
163:       // const bindings exposed from setup can be skipped for patching but
164:       // cannot be hoisted to module scope
165:       if (bindingMetadata[node.content] === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST) {
166:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_SKIP_PATCH
167:       }
168:       node.content = rewriteIdentifier(rawExp)
169:     } else if (!isScopeVarReference) {
170:       if (isLiteral) {
171:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
172:       } else {
173:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
174:       }
175:     }
176:     return node
177:   }
178: 
179:   let ast
180:   // exp needs to be parsed differently:
181:   // 1. Multiple inline statements (v-on, with presence of `;`): parse as raw
182:   //    exp, but make sure to pad with spaces for consistent ranges
183:   // 2. Expressions: wrap with parens (for e.g. object expressions)
184:   // 3. Function arguments (v-for, v-slot): place in a function argument position
185:   const source = asRawStatements
186:     ? ` ${rawExp} `
187:     : `(${rawExp})${asParams ? `=>{}` : ``}`
188:   try {
189:     ast = babelParser.parse(source, {
190:       plugins: context.expressionPlugins
191:     }).program
192:   } catch (e) {
193:     return node
194:   }
195: 
196:   logg(`processExpression - babel parse`, ast)
197:   const ids = []
198:   const parentStack = []
199:   const knownIds = Object.create(context.identifiers)
200: 
201:   walkIdentifiers(
202:     ast,
203:     (node, parent, _, isReferenced, isLocal) => {
204:       if (isStaticPropertyKey(node, parent)) {
205:         return
206:       }
207: 
208:       const needPrefix = isReferenced && canPrefix(node)
209:       if (needPrefix && !isLocal) {
210:         if (isStaticProperty(parent) && parent.shorthand) {
211:           // property shorthand like { foo }, we need to add the key since
212:           // we rewrite the value
213:           node.prefix = `${node.name}: `
214:         }
215:         node.name = rewriteIdentifier(node.name, parent, node)
216:         ids.push(node)
217:       } else {
218:         // The identifier is considered constant unless it's pointing to a
219:         // local scope variable (a v-for alias, or a v-slot prop)
220:         if (!(needPrefix && isLocal) && !bailConstant) {
221:           node.isConstant = true
222:         }
223:         // also generate sub-expressions for other identifiers for better
224:         // source map support. (except for property keys which are static)
225:         ids.push(node)
226:       }
227:     },
228:     true, // invoke on ALL identifiers
229:     parentStack,
230:     knownIds
231:   )
232: 
233:   // We break up the compound expression into an array of strings and sub
234:   // expressions (for identifiers that have been prefixed). In codegen, if
235:   // an ExpressionNode has the `.children` property, it will be used instead of
236:   // `.content`.
237:   const children = []
238:   ids.sort((a, b) => a.start - b.start)
239:   ids.forEach((id, i) => {
240:     // range is offset by -1 due to the wrapping parens when parsed
241:     const start = id.start - 1
242:     const end = id.end - 1
243:     const last = ids[i - 1]
244:     const leadingText = rawExp.slice(last ? last.end - 1 : 0, start)
245:     if (leadingText.length || id.prefix) {
246:       children.push(leadingText + (id.prefix || ``))
247:     }
248:     const source = rawExp.slice(start, end)
249:     children.push(
250:       createSimpleExpression(
251:         id.name,
252:         false,
253:         {
254:           source,
255:           start: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, start),
256:           end: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, end)
257:         },
258:         id.isConstant ? ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY : ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
259:       )
260:     )
261:     if (i === ids.length - 1 && end < rawExp.length) {
262:       children.push(rawExp.slice(end))
263:     }
264:   })
265: 
266:   let ret
267:   if (children.length) {
268:     ret = createCompoundExpression(children, node.loc)
269:   } else {
270:     ret = node
271:     ret.constType = bailConstant
272:       ? ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
273:       : ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
274:   }
275:   ret.identifiers = Object.keys(knownIds)
276:   return ret
277: }
278: 
279: function canPrefix(id) {
280:   // skip whitelisted globals
281:   if (isGloballyWhitelisted(id.name)) {
282:     return false
283:   }
284:   // special case for webpack compilation
285:   if (id.name === 'require') {
286:     return false
287:   }
288:   return true
289: }
290: 
291: function stringifyExpression(exp) {
292:   if (isString(exp)) {
293:     return exp
294:   } else if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
295:     return exp.content
296:   } else {
297:     return (exp.children)
298:       .map(stringifyExpression)
299:       .join('')
300:   }
301: }
302:

3.9.7. transformFor()

支持各种使用方式：

无括号： <div v-for="value in items" />, <div v-for="value, key in items" />, <div v-for="value, key, index in items" />

有括号： <div v-for="(value) in items" />, <div v-for="( value, key ) in items" />, <div v-for="( value, key, index ) in items" />

省略部分: <div v-for="(,key,index) in items" />, <div v-for="(,,index) in items" />, <div v-for="(value,,index) in items" />

解构： <div v-for="({ foo, bar }) in items" />

  1: const transformFor = createStructuralDirectiveTransform(
  2:   'for',
  3:   (node, dir, context) => {
  4:     const { helper, removeHelper } = context
  5:     return processFor(node, dir, context, forNode => {
  6:       // create the loop render function expression now, and add the
  7:       // iterator on exit after all children have been traversed
  8:       const renderExp = createCallExpression(helper(RENDER_LIST), [
  9:         forNode.source
 10:       ])
 11:       const isTemplate = isTemplateNode(node)
 12:       const memo = findDir(node, 'memo')
 13:       const keyProp = findProp(node, `key`)
 14:       const keyExp =
 15:         keyProp &&
 16:         (keyProp.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE
 17:           ? createSimpleExpression(keyProp.value.content, true)
 18:           : keyProp.exp)
 19:       const keyProperty = keyProp ? createObjectProperty(`key`, keyExp) : null
 20: 
 21:       if (!__BROWSER__ && isTemplate) {
 22:         // #2085 / #5288 process :key and v-memo expressions need to be
 23:         // processed on `<template v-for>`. In this case the node is discarded
 24:         // and never traversed so its binding expressions won't be processed
 25:         // by the normal transforms.
 26:         if (memo) {
 27:           memo.exp = processExpression(
 28:             memo.exp ,
 29:             context
 30:           )
 31:         }
 32:         if (keyProperty && keyProp.type !== NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE) {
 33:           keyProperty.value = processExpression(
 34:             keyProperty.value ,
 35:             context
 36:           )
 37:         }
 38:       }
 39: 
 40:       const isStableFragment =
 41:         forNode.source.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION &&
 42:         forNode.source.constType > ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
 43:       const fragmentFlag = isStableFragment
 44:         ? PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT
 45:         : keyProp
 46:         ? PatchFlags.KEYED_FRAGMENT
 47:         : PatchFlags.UNKEYED_FRAGMENT
 48: 
 49:       forNode.codegenNode = createVNodeCall(
 50:         context,
 51:         helper(FRAGMENT),
 52:         undefined,
 53:         renderExp,
 54:         fragmentFlag +
 55:           (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${PatchFlagNames[fragmentFlag]} */` : ``),
 56:         undefined,
 57:         undefined,
 58:         true /* isBlock */,
 59:         !isStableFragment /* disableTracking */,
 60:         false /* isComponent */,
 61:         node.loc
 62:       )
 63: 
 64:       return () => {
 65:         // finish the codegen now that all children have been traversed
 66:         let childBlock
 67:         const { children } = forNode
 68: 
 69:         // check <template v-for> key placement
 70:         if ((__DEV__ || !__BROWSER__) && isTemplate) {
 71:           node.children.some(c => {
 72:             if (c.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
 73:               const key = findProp(c, 'key')
 74:               if (key) {
 75:                 logg(`transformFor - key on template`)
 76:                 return true
 77:               }
 78:             }
 79:           })
 80:         }
 81: 
 82:         const needFragmentWrapper =
 83:           children.length !== 1 || children[0].type !== NodeTypes.ELEMENT
 84:         const slotOutlet = isSlotOutlet(node)
 85:           ? node
 86:           : isTemplate &&
 87:             node.children.length === 1 &&
 88:             isSlotOutlet(node.children[0])
 89:           ? node.children[0] // api-extractor somehow fails to infer this
 90:           : null
 91: 
 92:         if (slotOutlet) {
 93:           // <slot v-for="..."> or <template v-for="..."><slot/></template>
 94:           childBlock = slotOutlet.codegenNode
 95:           if (isTemplate && keyProperty) {
 96:             // <template v-for="..." :key="..."><slot/></template>
 97:             // we need to inject the key to the renderSlot() call.
 98:             // the props for renderSlot is passed as the 3rd argument.
 99:             injectProp(childBlock, keyProperty, context)
100:           }
101:         } else if (needFragmentWrapper) {
102:           // <template v-for="..."> with text or multi-elements
103:           // should generate a fragment block for each loop
104:           childBlock = createVNodeCall(
105:             context,
106:             helper(FRAGMENT),
107:             keyProperty ? createObjectExpression([keyProperty]) : undefined,
108:             node.children,
109:             PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT +
110:               (__DEV__
111:                 ? ` /* ${PatchFlagNames[PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT]} */`
112:                 : ``),
113:             undefined,
114:             undefined,
115:             true,
116:             undefined,
117:             false /* isComponent */
118:           )
119:         } else {
120:           // Normal element v-for. Directly use the child's codegenNode
121:           // but mark it as a block.
122:           childBlock = children[0].codegenNode
123:           if (isTemplate && keyProperty) {
124:             injectProp(childBlock, keyProperty, context)
125:           }
126:           if (childBlock.isBlock !== !isStableFragment) {
127:             if (childBlock.isBlock) {
128:               // switch from block to vnode
129:               removeHelper(OPEN_BLOCK)
130:               removeHelper(
131:                 getVNodeBlockHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent)
132:               )
133:             } else {
134:               // switch from vnode to block
135:               removeHelper(
136:                 getVNodeHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent)
137:               )
138:             }
139:           }
140:           childBlock.isBlock = !isStableFragment
141:           if (childBlock.isBlock) {
142:             helper(OPEN_BLOCK)
143:             helper(getVNodeBlockHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent))
144:           } else {
145:             helper(getVNodeHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent))
146:           }
147:         }
148: 
149:         if (memo) {
150:           const loop = createFunctionExpression(
151:             createForLoopParams(forNode.parseResult, [
152:               createSimpleExpression(`_cached`)
153:             ])
154:           )
155:           loop.body = createBlockStatement([
156:             createCompoundExpression([`const _memo = (`, memo.exp, `)`]),
157:             createCompoundExpression([
158:               `if (_cached`,
159:               ...(keyExp ? [` && _cached.key === `, keyExp] : []),
160:               ` && ${context.helperString(
161:                 IS_MEMO_SAME
162:               )}(_cached, _memo)) return _cached`
163:             ]),
164:             createCompoundExpression([`const _item = `, childBlock]),
165:             createSimpleExpression(`_item.memo = _memo`),
166:             createSimpleExpression(`return _item`)
167:           ])
168:           renderExp.arguments.push(
169:             loop,
170:             createSimpleExpression(`_cache`),
171:             createSimpleExpression(String(context.cached++))
172:           )
173:         } else {
174:           renderExp.arguments.push(
175:             createFunctionExpression(
176:               createForLoopParams(forNode.parseResult),
177:               childBlock,
178:               true /* force newline */
179:             )
180:           )
181:         }
182:       }
183:     })
184:   }
185: )
186: 
187: // target-agnostic transform used for both Client and SSR
188: function processFor(
189:   node,
190:   dir,
191:   context,
192:   processCodegen
193: ) {
194:   if (!dir.exp) {
195:     logg(`processFor - dir.exp is null`)
196:     return
197:   }
198: 
199:   const parseResult = parseForExpression(
200:     // can only be simple expression because vFor transform is applied
201:     // before expression transform.
202:     dir.exp,
203:     context
204:   )
205: 
206:   if (!parseResult) {
207:     logg(`processFor - parseResult is null`)
208:     return
209:   }
210: 
211:   const { addIdentifiers, removeIdentifiers, scopes } = context
212:   const { source, value, key, index } = parseResult
213: 
214:   const forNode = {
215:     type: NodeTypes.FOR,
216:     loc: dir.loc,
217:     source,
218:     valueAlias: value,
219:     keyAlias: key,
220:     objectIndexAlias: index,
221:     parseResult,
222:     children: isTemplateNode(node) ? node.children : [node]
223:   }
224: 
225:   context.replaceNode(forNode)
226: 
227:   // bookkeeping
228:   scopes.vFor++
229:   if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
230:     // scope management
231:     // inject identifiers to context
232:     value && addIdentifiers(value)
233:     key && addIdentifiers(key)
234:     index && addIdentifiers(index)
235:   }
236: 
237:   const onExit = processCodegen && processCodegen(forNode)
238: 
239:   return () => {
240:     scopes.vFor--
241:     if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
242:       value && removeIdentifiers(value)
243:       key && removeIdentifiers(key)
244:       index && removeIdentifiers(index)
245:     }
246:     if (onExit) onExit()
247:   }
248: }
249: 
250: const forAliasRE = /([\s\S]*?)\s+(?:in|of)\s+([\s\S]*)/
251: // This regex doesn't cover the case if key or index aliases have destructuring,
252: // but those do not make sense in the first place, so this works in practice.
253: const forIteratorRE = /,([^,\}\]]*)(?:,([^,\}\]]*))?$/
254: const stripParensRE = /^\(|\)$/g
255: 
256: function parseForExpression(
257:   input,
258:   context
259: ) {
260:   const loc = input.loc
261:   const exp = input.content
262:   const inMatch = exp.match(forAliasRE)
263:   if (!inMatch) return
264: 
265:   const [, LHS, RHS] = inMatch
266: 
267:   const result = {
268:     source: createAliasExpression(
269:       loc,
270:       RHS.trim(),
271:       exp.indexOf(RHS, LHS.length)
272:     ),
273:     value: undefined,
274:     key: undefined,
275:     index: undefined
276:   }
277:   if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
278:     result.source = processExpression(
279:       result.source,
280:       context
281:     )
282:   }
283: 
284:   let valueContent = LHS.trim().replace(stripParensRE, '').trim()
285:   const trimmedOffset = LHS.indexOf(valueContent)
286: 
287:   const iteratorMatch = valueContent.match(forIteratorRE)
288:   if (iteratorMatch) {
289:     valueContent = valueContent.replace(forIteratorRE, '').trim()
290: 
291:     const keyContent = iteratorMatch[1].trim()
292:     let keyOffset
293:     if (keyContent) {
294:       keyOffset = exp.indexOf(keyContent, trimmedOffset + valueContent.length)
295:       result.key = createAliasExpression(loc, keyContent, keyOffset)
296:       if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
297:         result.key = processExpression(result.key, context, true)
298:       }
299:     }
300: 
301:     if (iteratorMatch[2]) {
302:       const indexContent = iteratorMatch[2].trim()
303: 
304:       if (indexContent) {
305:         result.index = createAliasExpression(
306:           loc,
307:           indexContent,
308:           exp.indexOf(
309:             indexContent,
310:             result.key
311:               ? keyOffset + keyContent.length
312:               : trimmedOffset + valueContent.length
313:           )
314:         )
315:         if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
316:           result.index = processExpression(result.index, context, true)
317:         }
318:       }
319:     }
320:   }
321: 
322:   if (valueContent) {
323:     result.value = createAliasExpression(loc, valueContent, trimmedOffset)
324:     if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
325:       result.value = processExpression(result.value, context, true)
326:     }
327:   }
328: 
329:   return result
330: }
331: 
332: function createAliasExpression(
333:   range,
334:   content,
335:   offset
336: ) {
337:   return createSimpleExpression(
338:     content,
339:     false,
340:     getInnerRange(range, offset, content.length)
341:   )
342: }
343: 
344: function createForLoopParams(
345:   { value, key, index },
346:   memoArgs = []
347: ) {
348:   return createParamsList([value, key, index, ...memoArgs])
349: }
350: 
351: function createParamsList(args) {
352:   let i = args.length
353:   while (i--) {
354:     if (args[i]) break
355:   }
356:   return args
357:     .slice(0, i + 1)
358:     .map((arg, i) => arg || createSimpleExpression(`_`.repeat(i + 1), false))
359: }

Testing


number expression 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const { node } = parseWithForTransform(`<span v-for="index in 5" />`)
5: logOn()
6: logg('node', node.codegenNode.children)

value 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const { node } = parseWithForTransform(`<span v-for="( value ) in items" />`)
5: logOn()
6: logg('node', node.codegenNode.children)
7: node.codegenNode.children.arguments.forEach(( arg, i ) => {
8:   logg(`argument[${i}]`, arg)
9: })

 7: logg('node - valueAlias', node.valueAlias)

 9:   logg(`argument[${i}]`, arg)
10: })

nested v-for 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { node } = parseWithForTransform(`
 5: <div v-for="i in list"><div v-for="i in list">{{ i + j }}</div>{{ i }}</div>
 6: `.trim(), { prefixIdentifiers: true })
 7: logOn()
 8: const outerDiv = node.children[0]
 9: const outerExp = outerDiv.children[1]
10: const innerFor = outerDiv.children[0]
11: const innerExp = innerFor.children[0].children[0]
12: logg("innerFor", innerFor)
13: logg(`innerExp.content`, innerExp.content)
14: logg(`outerExp.content`, outerExp.content)

complex expressions 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const { node } = parseWithForTransform(`
5: <div v-for="({ foo = bar, baz: [qux = quux] }) in list">{{ foo + bar + baz + qux + quux }}</div>`, { prefixIdentifiers: true })
6: logOn()
7: logg('node.valueAlias', node.valueAlias)
8: logg('node.children[0].children[0].content', node.children[0].children[0].content)

3.9.8. transformBind

 1: // v-bind without arg is handled directly in ./transformElements.ts due to it affecting
 2: // codegen for the entire props object. This transform here is only for v-bind
 3: // *with* args.
 4: const transformBind = (dir, _node, context) => {
 5:   const { exp, modifiers, loc } = dir
 6:   const arg = dir.arg
 7: 
 8:   if (arg.type !== NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
 9:     arg.children.unshift(`(`)
10:     arg.children.push(`) || ""`)
11:   } else if (!arg.isStatic) {
12:     arg.content = `${arg.content} || ""`
13:   }
14: 
15:   // .sync is replaced by v-model:arg
16:   if (modifiers.includes('camel')) {
17:     if (arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
18:       if (arg.isStatic) {
19:         arg.content = camelize(arg.content)
20:       } else {
21:         arg.content = `${context.helperString(CAMELIZE)}(${arg.content})`
22:       }
23:     } else {
24:       arg.children.unshift(`${context.helperString(CAMELIZE)}(`)
25:       arg.children.push(`)`)
26:     }
27:   }
28: 
29:   if (!context.inSSR) {
30:     if (modifiers.includes('prop')) {
31:       injectPrefix(arg, '.')
32:     }
33:     if (modifiers.includes('attr')) {
34:       injectPrefix(arg, '^')
35:     }
36:   }
37: 
38:   if (
39:     !exp ||
40:     (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION && !exp.content.trim())
41:   ) {
42:     logg(`transformBind v-bind no expression`)
43:     return {
44:       props: [createObjectProperty(arg, createSimpleExpression('', true, loc))]
45:     }
46:   }
47: 
48:   return {
49:     props: [createObjectProperty(arg, exp)]
50:   }
51: }
52: 
53: const injectPrefix = (arg, prefix) => {
54:   if (arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
55:     if (arg.isStatic) {
56:       arg.content = prefix + arg.content
57:     } else {
58:       arg.content = `\`${prefix}\${${arg.content}}\``
59:     }
60:   } else {
61:     arg.children.unshift(`'${prefix}' + (`)
62:     arg.children.push(`)`)
63:   }
64: }
65:

Testing


v-bind 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: const node = parseWithVBind(`<div v-bind:id="id">`)
4: const props = node.codegenNode.props
5: logg('props', props.properties[0])

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
parseAttribute| match=v-bind:id,bind,id,
--------- ATTR ---------
{
  type: 7,
  name: 'bind',
  exp: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  },
  arg: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: true,
    constType: 3,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  },
  modifiers: [],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 6, line: 1, offset: 5 },
    end: { column: 20, line: 1, offset: 19 },
    source: 'v-bind:id="id"'
  }
}
--------- createRootCodegen ---------
children=1, 只有一个用 block, 多个用Fragment
--------- props ---------
{
  type: 16,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  key: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: true,
    constType: 3,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  },
  value: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  }
}

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)

--------- ATTR ---------
{
  type: 7,
  name: 'bind',
  exp: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  },
  arg: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '[id]' }
  },
  modifiers: [],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 6, line: 1, offset: 5 },
    end: { column: 22, line: 1, offset: 21 },
    source: 'v-bind:[id]="id"'
  }
}
--------- createRootCodegen ---------
children=1, 只有一个用 block, 多个用Fragment
--------- props ---------
{
  type: 14,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  callee: Symbol(normalizeProps),
  arguments: [ { type: 15, loc: [Object], properties: [Array] } ]
}
--------- props.arguments ---------
[
  {
    type: 15,
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: '<div v-bind:[id]="id">'
    },
    properties: [ [Object] ]
  }
]
--------- props.arguments[0].properties ---------
[
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },

      type: 4,
      content: 'id || ""',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    },
    value: {
      type: 4,
      content: 'id',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  }
]

5: const props = node.codegenNode.props

8: logg('props.arguments[0].properties', props.arguments[0].properties)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
parseAttribute| match=v-bind:[foo(bar)].camel,bind,[foo(bar)],.camel
--------- ATTR ---------
{
  type: 7,
  name: 'bind',
  exp: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  },
  arg: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'foo(bar)',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '[foo(bar)]' }
  },
  modifiers: [ 'camel' ],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 6, line: 1, offset: 5 },
    end: { column: 34, line: 1, offset: 33 },
    source: 'v-bind:[foo(bar)].camel="id"'
  }
}
--------- createRootCodegen ---------
children=1, 只有一个用 block, 多个用Fragment
--------- props ---------
{
  type: 14,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  callee: Symbol(normalizeProps),
  arguments: [ { type: 15, loc: [Object], properties: [Array] } ]
}
--------- props.arguments ---------
[
  {
    type: 15,
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: '<div v-bind:[foo(bar)].camel="id">'
    },
    properties: [ [Object] ]
  }
]
--------- props.arguments[0].properties ---------
[
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      content: '_camelize(foo(bar) || "")',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    },
    value: {
      type: 4,
      content: 'id',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  }
]

.prop modifier 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logTraverseOff()
4: const node = parseWithVBind(`<div v-bind:fooBar.prop="id">`)
5: const props = node.codegenNode.props
6: logg('props.properties[0]', props.properties[0])

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
parseAttribute| match=v-bind:fooBar.prop,bind,fooBar,.prop
--------- ATTR ---------
{
  type: 7,
  name: 'bind',
  exp: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  },
  arg: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'fooBar',
    isStatic: true,
    constType: 3,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'fooBar' }
  },
  modifiers: [ 'prop' ],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 6, line: 1, offset: 5 },
    end: { column: 29, line: 1, offset: 28 },
    source: 'v-bind:fooBar.prop="id"'
  }
}
--------- createRootCodegen ---------
children=1, 只有一个用 block, 多个用Fragment
--------- props.properties[0] ---------
{
  type: 16,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  key: {
    type: 4,
    content: '.fooBar',
    isStatic: true,
    constType: 3,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'fooBar' }
  },
  value: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  }
}
undefined

.prop modifier + dynamic arg 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logTraverseOff()
4: const node = parseWithVBind(`<div v-bind:[fooBar].prop="id">`)
5: const props = node.codegenNode.props
6: logg('props.arguments[0].properties[0]', props.arguments[0].properties[0])

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
parseAttribute| match=v-bind:[fooBar].prop,bind,[fooBar],.prop
--------- ATTR ---------
{
  type: 7,
  name: 'bind',
  exp: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  },
  arg: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'fooBar',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '[fooBar]' }
  },
  modifiers: [ 'prop' ],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 6, line: 1, offset: 5 },
    end: { column: 31, line: 1, offset: 30 },
    source: 'v-bind:[fooBar].prop="id"'
  }
}
--------- createRootCodegen ---------
children=1, 只有一个用 block, 多个用Fragment
--------- props.arguments[0].properties[0] ---------
{
  type: 16,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  key: {
    type: 4,
    content: '`.${fooBar || ""}`',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '[fooBar]' }
  },
  value: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'id',
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'id' }
  }
}
undefined

5: const props = node.codegenNode.props
6: logg('props.properties[0]', props.properties[0])

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)

{
  type: 7,
  name: 'bind',

    type: 4,

undefined

3.9.9. transformModel

  1: const transformModel = (dir, node, context) => {
  2:   const { exp, arg } = dir
  3:   if (!exp) {
  4:     logg(`transformModel no exp`)
  5:     return createTransformProps()
  6:   }
  7: 
  8:   const rawExp = exp.loc.source
  9:   const expString =
 10:     exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION ? exp.content : rawExp
 11: 
 12:   // im SFC <script setup> inline mode, the exp may have been transformed into
 13:   // _unref(exp)
 14:   const bindingType = context.bindingMetadata[rawExp]
 15:   const maybeRef =
 16:     !__BROWSER__ &&
 17:     context.inline &&
 18:     bindingType &&
 19:     bindingType !== BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST
 20: 
 21:   if (
 22:     !expString.trim() ||
 23:     (!isMemberExpression(expString, context) && !maybeRef)
 24:   ) {
 25:     return createTransformProps()
 26:   }
 27: 
 28:   if (
 29:     !__BROWSER__ &&
 30:     context.prefixIdentifiers &&
 31:     isSimpleIdentifier(expString) &&
 32:     context.identifiers[expString]
 33:   ) {
 34:     return createTransformProps()
 35:   }
 36: 
 37:   const propName = arg ? arg : createSimpleExpression('modelValue', true)
 38:   const eventName = arg
 39:     ? isStaticExp(arg)
 40:       ? `onUpdate:${arg.content}`
 41:       : createCompoundExpression(['"onUpdate:" + ', arg])
 42:     : `onUpdate:modelValue`
 43: 
 44:   let assignmentExp
 45:   const eventArg = context.isTS ? `($event: any)` : `$event`
 46:   if (maybeRef) {
 47:     if (bindingType === BindingTypes.SETUP_REF) {
 48:       // v-model used on known ref.
 49:       assignmentExp = createCompoundExpression([
 50:         `${eventArg} => ((`,
 51:         createSimpleExpression(rawExp, false, exp.loc),
 52:         `).value = $event)`
 53:       ])
 54:     } else {
 55:       // v-model used on a potentially ref binding in <script setup> inline mode.
 56:       // the assignment needs to check whether the binding is actually a ref.
 57:       const altAssignment =
 58:         bindingType === BindingTypes.SETUP_LET ? `${rawExp} = $event` : `null`
 59:       assignmentExp = createCompoundExpression([
 60:         `${eventArg} => (${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${rawExp}) ? (`,
 61:         createSimpleExpression(rawExp, false, exp.loc),
 62:         `).value = $event : ${altAssignment})`
 63:       ])
 64:     }
 65:   } else {
 66:     assignmentExp = createCompoundExpression([
 67:       `${eventArg} => ((`,
 68:       exp,
 69:       `) = $event)`
 70:     ])
 71:   }
 72: 
 73:   const props = [
 74:     // modelValue: foo
 75:     createObjectProperty(propName, dir.exp),
 76:     // "onUpdate:modelValue": $event => (foo = $event)
 77:     createObjectProperty(eventName, assignmentExp)
 78:   ]
 79: 
 80:   // cache v-model handler if applicable (when it doesn't refer any scope vars)
 81:   if (
 82:     !__BROWSER__ &&
 83:     context.prefixIdentifiers &&
 84:     !context.inVOnce &&
 85:     context.cacheHandlers &&
 86:     !hasScopeRef(exp, context.identifiers)
 87:   ) {
 88:     props[1].value = context.cache(props[1].value)
 89:   }
 90: 
 91:   // modelModifiers: { foo: true, "bar-baz": true }
 92:   if (dir.modifiers.length && node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT) {
 93:     const modifiers = dir.modifiers
 94:       .map(m => (isSimpleIdentifier(m) ? m : JSON.stringify(m)) + `: true`)
 95:       .join(`, `)
 96:     const modifiersKey = arg
 97:       ? isStaticExp(arg)
 98:         ? `${arg.content}Modifiers`
 99:         : createCompoundExpression([arg, ' + "Modifiers"'])
100:       : `modelModifiers`
101:     props.push(
102:       createObjectProperty(
103:         modifiersKey,
104:         createSimpleExpression(
105:           `{ ${modifiers} }`,
106:           false,
107:           dir.loc,
108:           ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
109:         )
110:       )
111:     )
112:   }
113: 
114:   return createTransformProps(props)
115: }
116: 
117: function createTransformProps(props = []) {
118:   return { props }
119: }

Testing


v-model 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = parseWithVModel(`<input v-model="model" />`)
5: const node = root.children[0]
6: const props = node.codegenNode.props.properties
7: logOn()
8: logg("node", node)
9: logg('props', props)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- node ---------
{
  type: 1,
  ns: 0,
  tag: 'input',
  tagType: 0,
  props: [
    {
      type: 7,
      name: 'model',
      exp: [Object],
      arg: undefined,
      modifiers: [],
      loc: [Object]
    }
  ],
  isSelfClosing: true,
  children: [],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 26, line: 1, offset: 25 },
    source: '<input v-model="model" />'
  },
  codegenNode: {
    type: 13,
    tag: '"input"',
    props: { type: 15, loc: [Object], properties: [Array] },
    children: undefined,
    patchFlag: '8',
    dynamicProps: '["modelValue", "onUpdate:modelValue"]',
    directives: undefined,
    isBlock: true,
    disableTracking: false,
    isComponent: false,
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: '<input v-model="model" />'
    }
  }
}
--------- props ---------
[
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'modelValue',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3
    },
    value: {
      type: 4,
      content: 'model',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  },
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'onUpdate:modelValue',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3
    },
    value: { type: 8, loc: [Object], children: [Array] }
  }
]
undefined

cache update handler 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const root = parseWithVModel(`<input v-model="foo" />`, {
 5:   prefixIdentifiers: true,
 6:   cacheHandlers: true
 7: })
 8: const node = root.children[0]
 9: const props = node.codegenNode.props.properties
10: logOn()

13: logg("node.codegenNode", codegen)
14: logg('codegenNode.dynamicProps', codegen.dynamicProps)
15: logg(`codegen.props.properties`, codegen.props.properties)

not cache update handler if it refers v-for scope vairables 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()

 5:   prefixIdentifiers: true,
 6:   cacheHandlers: true
 7: })
 8: const node = root.children[0]

13: logg('codegenNode.dynamicProps', codegen.dynamicProps)
14: logg(`codegen.props.properties`, codegen.props.properties)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- root.cached=0 ---------
--------- node.codegenNode ---------
{
  type: 13,
  tag: '"input"',
  props: {
    type: 15,
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: '<input v-for="i in list" v-model="foo[i]" />'
    },

  },

  patchFlag: '8',
  dynamicProps: '["modelValue", "onUpdate:modelValue"]',
  directives: undefined,
  isBlock: true,
  disableTracking: false,
  isComponent: false,

    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 45, line: 1, offset: 44 },
    source: '<input v-for="i in list" v-model="foo[i]" />'
  }

      constType: 3

 7: })

mark update handler dynamic if it refers slot scope variables 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const root = parseWithVModel(`<Comp v-slot="{foo}"><input v-model="foo.bar" /></Comp>`, {
 5:   prefixIdentifiers: true,
 6: })
 7: const node = root.children[0]
 8: logOn()
 9: const codegen = node.children[0].codegenNode
10: logg("codegenNode.dynamicProps", codegenNode.dynamicProps)

should generate modelModifiers for component v-model 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const root = parseWithVModel(`<Comp v-model.trim.bar-baz="foo" />`, {
 5:   prefixIdentifiers: true,
 6: })
 7: const node = root.children[0]
 8: logOn()
 9: logg("node.codegenNode.props.properties", node.codegenNode.props.properties)
10: logg("node.codegenNode.dynamicProps", node.codegenNode.dynamicProps)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- node.codegenNode.props.properties ---------
[
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'modelValue',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3
    },
    value: {
      type: 4,
      content: '_ctx.foo',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  },
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'onUpdate:modelValue',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3
    },
    value: { type: 8, loc: [Object], children: [Array] }
  },
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'modelModifiers',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3
    },
    value: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: '{ trim: true, "bar-baz": true }',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 2
    }
