3.9.10. transformOn()

v-on 表达式正则(/^\s*([\w$_]+|(async\s*)?\([^)]*?\))\s*=>|^\s*(async\s+)?function(?:\s+[\w$]+)?\s*\(/)：

  1: // 函数表达式正则, @click="fnExp"
  2: const fnExpRE =
  3:   /^\s*([\w$_]+|(async\s*)?\([^)]*?\))\s*=>|^\s*(async\s+)?function(?:\s+[\w$]+)?\s*\(/
  4: 
  5: const transformOn = (
  6:   dir,
  7:   node,
  8:   context,
  9:   augmentor
 10: ) => {
 11:   const { loc, modifiers, arg } = dir
 12: 
 13:   let eventName
 14:   if (arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
 15:     if (arg.isStatic) {
 16:       let rawName = arg.content
 17: 
 18:       // 将事件名转成驼峰式
 19:       eventName = createSimpleExpression(
 20:         toHandlerKey(camelize(rawName)),
 21:         true,
 22:         arg.loc
 23:       )
 24:     } else {
 25:       // #2388 toHandlerKey 将事件名转成 onXxx, 如：eventName -> onEventName
 26:       eventName = createCompoundExpression([
 27:         `${context.helperString(TO_HANDLER_KEY)}(`,
 28:         arg,
 29:         `)`
 30:       ])
 31:     }
 32:   } else {
 33:     // already a compound expression.
 34: 
 35:     eventName = arg
 36:     eventName.children.unshift(`${context.helperString(TO_HANDLER_KEY)}(`)
 37:     eventName.children.push(`)`)
 38:   }
 39: 
 40:   // handler processing, 事件表达式内容
 41:   let exp = dir.exp
 42:   if (exp && !exp.content.trim()) {
 43:     exp = undefined
 44:   }
 45:   // 事件处理函数缓存
 46:   let shouldCache = context.cacheHandlers && !exp && !context.inVOnce
 47:   if (exp) {
 48:     const isMemberExp = isMemberExpression(exp.content, context)
 49:     const isInlineStatement = !(isMemberExp || fnExpRE.test(exp.content))
 50:     const hasMultipleStatements = exp.content.includes(`;`)
 51: 
 52:     // process the expression since it's been skipped
 53:     if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
 54:       isInlineStatement && context.addIdentifiers(`$event`)
 55:       exp = dir.exp = processExpression(
 56:         exp,
 57:         context,
 58:         false,
 59:         hasMultipleStatements
 60:       )
 61:       isInlineStatement && context.removeIdentifiers(`$event`)
 62:       // with scope analysis, the function is hoistable if it has no reference
 63:       // to scope variables.
 64:       shouldCache =
 65:         context.cacheHandlers &&
 66:         // unnecessary to cache inside v-once
 67:         !context.inVOnce &&
 68:         // runtime constants don't need to be cached
 69:         // (this is analyzed by compileScript in SFC <script setup>)
 70:         !(exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION && exp.constType > 0) &&
 71:         // #1541 bail if this is a member exp handler passed to a component -
 72:         // we need to use the original function to preserve arity,
 73:         // e.g. <transition> relies on checking cb.length to determine
 74:         // transition end handling. Inline function is ok since its arity
 75:         // is preserved even when cached.
 76:         !(isMemberExp && node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT) &&
 77:         // bail if the function references closure variables (v-for, v-slot)
 78:         // it must be passed fresh to avoid stale values.
 79:         !hasScopeRef(exp, context.identifiers)
 80:       // If the expression is optimizable and is a member expression pointing
 81:       // to a function, turn it into invocation (and wrap in an arrow function
 82:       // below) so that it always accesses the latest value when called - thus
 83:       // avoiding the need to be patched.
 84:       if (shouldCache && isMemberExp) {
 85:         if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
 86:           exp.content = `${exp.content} && ${exp.content}(...args)`
 87:         } else {
 88:           exp.children = [...exp.children, ` && `, ...exp.children, `(...args)`]
 89:         }
 90:       }
 91:     }
 92: 
 93:     if (isInlineStatement || (shouldCache && isMemberExp)) {
 94:       // wrap inline statement in a function expression
 95:       // ($event) => statement
 96:       // (...args) => { statement1;statement2 }
 97:       exp = createCompoundExpression([
 98:         `${
 99:           isInlineStatement
100:             ? `$event`
101:             : `(...args)`
102:         } => ${hasMultipleStatements ? `{` : `(`}`,
103:         exp,
104:         hasMultipleStatements ? `}` : `)`
105:       ])
106:     }
107:   }
108: 
109:   let ret = {
110:     props: [
111:       createObjectProperty(
112:         eventName,
113:         exp || createSimpleExpression(`() => {}`, false, loc)
114:       )
115:     ]
116:   }
117: 
118:   // apply extended compiler augmentor
119:   if (augmentor) {
120:     ret = augmentor(ret)
121:   }
122: 
123:   if (shouldCache) {
124:     // cache handlers so that it's always the same handler being passed down.
125:     // this avoids unnecessary re-renders when users use inline handlers on
126:     // components.
127:     ret.props[0].value = context.cache(ret.props[0].value)
128:   }
129: 
130:   // mark the key as handler for props normalization check
131:   ret.props.forEach(p => (p.key.isHandlerKey = true))
132:   return ret
133: }

    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },

      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'onClick',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3,
      isHandlerKey: true
    },
    value: {
      type: 4,
      content: 'onClick',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,

not wrap as function

 5: const { node: node2 } = parseWithVOn(`<div @click="$event => {
 6:   foo($event)
 7: }" />`)
 8: const { node: node3 } = parseWithVOn(`<div @click="function ($event) {
 9:   foo($event)
10: }" />`)
11: logOn()
12: 
13: logg("node1.codegenNode.props.properties", node1.codegenNode.props.properties)
14: logg("node2.codegenNode.props.properties", node2.codegenNode.props.properties)

name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)

    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },

 5:   prefixIdentifiers: true,
 6:   cacheHandlers: true
 7: })

 9:   prefixIdentifiers: true,
10:   cacheHandlers: true
11: })

13: 
14: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
15: logg("node.codegenNode.props.properties", node.codegenNode.props.properties)
16: 
17: logg(`root1.cached=${root1.cached}`)
18: logg("node1.codegenNode.props.properties", node1.codegenNode.props.properties)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- root.cached=1 ---------
--------- node.codegenNode.props.properties ---------
[
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'onClick',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3,
      isHandlerKey: true
    },
    value: {
      type: 20,
      index: 0,
      value: [Object],
      isVNode: false,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  }
]
--------- root1.cached=1 ---------
--------- node1.codegenNode.props.properties ---------
[
  {
    type: 16,
    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },
    key: {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'onClick',
      isStatic: true,
      constType: 3,
      isHandlerKey: true
    },
    value: {
      type: 20,
      index: 0,
      value: [Object],
      isVNode: false,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  }
]
undefined

3.9.11. transformOnce()

 1: const seen = new WeakSet()
 2: 
 3: const transformOnce = (node, context) => {
 4:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT && findDir(node, 'once', true)) {
 5:     if (seen.has(node) || context.inVOnce) {
 6:       logg(`transformOnce node has seen`)
 7:       return
 8:     }
 9:     seen.add(node)
10:     context.inVOnce = true
11:     context.helper(SET_BLOCK_TRACKING)
12:     return () => {
13:       context.inVOnce = false
14:       const cur = context.currentNode
15:       if (cur.codegenNode) {
16:         cur.codegenNode = context.cache(cur.codegenNode, true /* isVNode */)
17:       }
18:     }
19:   }
20: }

Testing


as root node 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = transformWithOnce(`<div :id="foo" v-once />`)
5: logOn()
6: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
7: logg(`root.helpers`, root.helpers)
8: logg("root.codegenNode", root.codegenNode)

on nested plain element 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = transformWithOnce(`<div><div :id="foo" v-once /></div>`)
5: logOn()
6: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
7: logg(`root.helpers`, root.helpers)
8: logg("root.children[0].codegenNode", root.children[0].codegenNode)

on component 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = transformWithOnce(`<div><Comp :id="foo" v-once /></div>`)
5: logOn()
6: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
7: logg(`root.helpers`, root.helpers)
8: logg("root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode", root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode)

on slot outlet 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = transformWithOnce(`<div><slot v-once /></div>`)
5: logOn()
6: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
7: logg(`root.helpers`, root.helpers)
8: logg("root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode", root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode)

inside v-once 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = transformWithOnce(`<div v-once><slot v-once /></div>`)
5: logOn()
6: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
7: logg(`root.helpers`, root.helpers)
8: logg("root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode", root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode)

with v-if/else 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = transformWithOnce(`<div v-if="bool" v-once /><div v-else/>`)
5: logOn()
6: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
7: logg(`root.helpers`, root.helpers)
8: logg("root.children[0]", root.children[0])
9: logg("root.children[0].codegenNode", root.children[0].codegenNode)

with v-for 
1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
2: 
3: logOff()
4: const root = transformWithOnce(`<div v-for="i in list" v-once />`)
5: logOn()
6: logg(`root.cached=${root.cached}`)
7: logg(`root.helpers`, root.helpers)
8: logg("root.children[0]", root.children[0])
9: logg("root.children[0].codegenNode", root.children[0].codegenNode)

3.9.12. transformMemo()

<div v-memo="[x]" />

<Comp v-memo="[x]" />

<div v-if="ok" v-memo="[x]">
  <span>foo</span>
</div>
<Comp v-else v-memo="[x]" />

<div v-for="{ x, y } in list" :key="x" v-memo="[x, y === z]">
  <span>foobar</span>
</div>

<template v-for="{ x, y } in list" :key="x" v-memo="[x, y === z]">
  <span>foobar</span>
</template>

 1: const memoSeen = new WeakSet()
 2: 
 3: const transformMemo = (node, context) => {
 4:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
 5:     const dir = findDir(node, 'memo')
 6:     if (!dir || memoSeen.has(node)) {
 7:       return
 8:     }
 9:     memoSeen.add(node)
10:     return () => {
11:       const codegenNode = node.codegenNode || context.currentNode.codegenNode
12:       if (codegenNode && codegenNode.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
13:         // non-component sub tree should be turned into a block
14:         if (node.tagType !== ElementTypes.COMPONENT) {
15:           makeBlock(codegenNode, context)
16:         }
17:         node.codegenNode = createCallExpression(context.helper(WITH_MEMO), [
18:           dir.exp,
19:           createFunctionExpression(undefined, codegenNode),
20:           `_cache`,
21:           String(context.cached++)
22:         ])
23:       }
24:     }
25:   }
26: }

3.9.13. buildSlots()

  1: const defaultFallback = createSimpleExpression(`undefined`, false)
  2: 
  3: // A NodeTransform that:
  4: // 1. Tracks scope identifiers for scoped slots so that they don't get prefixed
  5: //    by transformExpression. This is only applied in non-browser builds with
  6: //    { prefixIdentifiers: true }.
  7: // 2. Track v-slot depths so that we know a slot is inside another slot.
  8: //    Note the exit callback is executed before buildSlots() on the same node,
  9: //    so only nested slots see positive numbers.
 10: const trackSlotScopes = (node, context) => {
 11:   if (
 12:     node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT &&
 13:     (node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT ||
 14:       node.tagType === ElementTypes.TEMPLATE)
 15:   ) {
 16:     // We are only checking non-empty v-slot here
 17:     // since we only care about slots that introduce scope variables.
 18:     const vSlot = findDir(node, 'slot')
 19:     if (vSlot) {
 20:       const slotProps = vSlot.exp
 21:       if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
 22:         slotProps && context.addIdentifiers(slotProps)
 23:       }
 24:       context.scopes.vSlot++
 25:       return () => {
 26:         if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
 27:           slotProps && context.removeIdentifiers(slotProps)
 28:         }
 29:         context.scopes.vSlot--
 30:       }
 31:     }
 32:   }
 33: }
 34: 
 35: 
 36: // A NodeTransform that tracks scope identifiers for scoped slots with v-for.
 37: // This transform is only applied in non-browser builds with { prefixIdentifiers: true }
 38: const trackVForSlotScopes = (node, context) => {
 39:   let vFor
 40:   if (
 41:     isTemplateNode(node) &&
 42:     node.props.some(isVSlot) &&
 43:     (vFor = findDir(node, 'for'))
 44:   ) {
 45:     const result = (vFor.parseResult = parseForExpression(
 46:       vFor.exp,
 47:       context
 48:     ))
 49:     if (result) {
 50:       const { value, key, index } = result
 51:       const { addIdentifiers, removeIdentifiers } = context
 52:       value && addIdentifiers(value)
 53:       key && addIdentifiers(key)
 54:       index && addIdentifiers(index)
 55: 
 56:       return () => {
 57:         value && removeIdentifiers(value)
 58:         key && removeIdentifiers(key)
 59:         index && removeIdentifiers(index)
 60:       }
 61:     }
 62:   }
 63: }
 64: 
 65: const buildClientSlotFn = (props, children, loc) =>
 66:   createFunctionExpression(
 67:     props,
 68:     children,
 69:     false /* newline */,
 70:     true /* isSlot */,
 71:     children.length ? children[0].loc : loc
 72:   )
 73: 
 74: 
 75: // Instead of being a DirectiveTransform, v-slot processing is called during
 76: // transformElement to build the slots object for a component.
 77: function buildSlots(node, context, buildSlotFn= buildClientSlotFn) {
 78:   context.helper(WITH_CTX)
 79: 
 80:   const { children, loc } = node
 81:   const slotsProperties = []
 82:   const dynamicSlots= []
 83: 
 84:   // If the slot is inside a v-for or another v-slot, force it to be dynamic
 85:   // since it likely uses a scope variable.
 86:   let hasDynamicSlots = context.scopes.vSlot > 0 || context.scopes.vFor > 0
 87:   // with `prefixIdentifiers: true`, this can be further optimized to make
 88:   // it dynamic only when the slot actually uses the scope variables.
 89:   if (!__BROWSER__ && !context.ssr && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
 90:     hasDynamicSlots = hasScopeRef(node, context.identifiers)
 91:   }
 92: 
 93:   // 1. Check for slot with slotProps on component itself.
 94:   //    <Comp v-slot="{ prop }"/>
 95:   const onComponentSlot = findDir(node, 'slot', true)
 96:   if (onComponentSlot) {
 97:     const { arg, exp } = onComponentSlot
 98:     if (arg && !isStaticExp(arg)) {
 99:       hasDynamicSlots = true
100:     }
101:     slotsProperties.push(
102:       createObjectProperty(
103:         arg || createSimpleExpression('default', true),
104:         buildSlotFn(exp, children, loc)
105:       )
106:     )
107:   }
108: 
109:   // 2. Iterate through children and check for template slots
110:   //    <template v-slot:foo="{ prop }">
111:   let hasTemplateSlots = false
112:   let hasNamedDefaultSlot = false
113:   const implicitDefaultChildren = []
114:   const seenSlotNames = new Set()
115: 
116:   for (let i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
117:     const slotElement = children[i]
118:     let slotDir
119: 
120:     if (
121:       !isTemplateNode(slotElement) ||
122:       !(slotDir = findDir(slotElement, 'slot', true))
123:     ) { // 收集不在 template v-slot 中的元素/组件，这些都会合并到默认插槽中去
124:       if (slotElement.type !== NodeTypes.COMMENT) {
125:         implicitDefaultChildren.push(slotElement)
126:       }
127:       continue
128:     }
129: 
130:     if (onComponentSlot) {
131:       logg(`buildSlots already has on-component slot - this is incorrect usage`)
132:       break
133:     }
134: 
135:     hasTemplateSlots = true
136:     const { children: slotChildren, loc: slotLoc } = slotElement
137:     const {
138:       arg: slotName = createSimpleExpression(`default`, true),
139:       exp: slotProps,
140:       loc: dirLoc
141:     } = slotDir
142: 
143:     // check if name is dynamic.
144:     let staticSlotName
145:     if (isStaticExp(slotName)) {
146:       staticSlotName = slotName ? slotName.content : `default`
147:     } else {
148:       hasDynamicSlots = true
149:     }
150: 
151:     const slotFunction = buildSlotFn(slotProps, slotChildren, slotLoc)
152:     // check if this slot is conditional (v-if/v-for)
153:     let vIf
154:     let vElse
155:     let vFor
156:     if ((vIf = findDir(slotElement, 'if'))) {
157:       hasDynamicSlots = true
158:       dynamicSlots.push(
159:         createConditionalExpression(
160:           vIf.exp,
161:           buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction),
162:           defaultFallback
163:         )
164:       )
165:     } else if (
166:       (vElse = findDir(slotElement, /^else(-if)?$/, true /* allowEmpty */))
167:     ) {
168:       // find adjacent v-if
169:       let j = i
170:       let prev
171:       while (j--) {
172:         prev = children[j]
173:         if (prev.type !== NodeTypes.COMMENT) {
174:           break
175:         }
176:       }
177:       if (prev && isTemplateNode(prev) && findDir(prev, 'if')) {
178:         // remove node
179:         children.splice(i, 1)
180:         i--
181: 
182:         // attach this slot to previous conditional
183:         let conditional = dynamicSlots[
184:           dynamicSlots.length - 1
185:         ]
186:         while (
187:           conditional.alternate.type === NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION
188:         ) {
189:           conditional = conditional.alternate
190:         }
191:         conditional.alternate = vElse.exp
192:           ? createConditionalExpression(
193:               vElse.exp,
194:               buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction),
195:               defaultFallback
196:             )
197:           : buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction)
198:       }
199:     } else if ((vFor = findDir(slotElement, 'for'))) {
200:       hasDynamicSlots = true
201:       const parseResult =
202:         vFor.parseResult ||
203:         parseForExpression(vFor.exp , context)
204:       if (parseResult) {
205:         // Render the dynamic slots as an array and add it to the createSlot()
206:         // args. The runtime knows how to handle it appropriately.
207:         dynamicSlots.push(
208:           createCallExpression(context.helper(RENDER_LIST), [
209:             parseResult.source,
210:             createFunctionExpression(
211:               createForLoopParams(parseResult),
212:               buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction),
213:               true /* force newline */
214:             )
215:           ])
216:         )
217:       }
218:     } else {
219:       // check duplicate static names
220:       if (staticSlotName) {
221:         if (seenSlotNames.has(staticSlotName)) {
222:           logg(`buildSlots seenSlotNames has slot name`)
223:           continue
224:         }
225:         seenSlotNames.add(staticSlotName)
226:         if (staticSlotName === 'default') {
227:           hasNamedDefaultSlot = true
228:         }
229:       }
230:       slotsProperties.push(createObjectProperty(slotName, slotFunction))
231:     }
232:   }
233: 
234:   if (!onComponentSlot) {
235:     const buildDefaultSlotProperty = (props, children) => {
236:       const fn = buildSlotFn(props, children, loc)
237: 
238:       return createObjectProperty(`default`, fn)
239:     }
240: 
241:     if (!hasTemplateSlots) {
242:       // implicit default slot (on component)
243:       slotsProperties.push(buildDefaultSlotProperty(undefined, children))
244:     } else if (
245:       implicitDefaultChildren.length &&
246:       // #3766
247:       // with whitespace: 'preserve', whitespaces between slots will end up in
248:       // implicitDefaultChildren. Ignore if all implicit children are whitespaces.
249:       implicitDefaultChildren.some(node => isNonWhitespaceContent(node))
250:     ) {
251:       // implicit default slot (mixed with named slots)
252:       if (hasNamedDefaultSlot) {
253:         logg(`buildSlots hasNamedDefaultSlot`)
254:       } else {
255:         // 合并到默认插槽
256:         slotsProperties.push(
257:           buildDefaultSlotProperty(undefined, implicitDefaultChildren)
258:         )
259:       }
260:     }
261:   }
262: 
263:   const slotFlag = hasDynamicSlots
264:     ? SlotFlags.DYNAMIC
265:     : hasForwardedSlots(node.children)
266:     ? SlotFlags.FORWARDED
267:     : SlotFlags.STABLE
268: 
269:   let slots = createObjectExpression(
270:     slotsProperties.concat(
271:       createObjectProperty(
272:         `_`,
273:         // 2 = compiled but dynamic = can skip normalization, but must run diff
274:         // 1 = compiled and static = can skip normalization AND diff as optimized
275:         createSimpleExpression(
276:           slotFlag + (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${slotFlagsText[slotFlag]} */` : ``),
277:           false
278:         )
279:       )
280:     ),
281:     loc
282:   )
283:   if (dynamicSlots.length) {
284:     slots = createCallExpression(context.helper(CREATE_SLOTS), [
285:       slots,
286:       createArrayExpression(dynamicSlots)
287:     ])
288:   }
289: 
290:   return {
291:     slots,
292:     hasDynamicSlots
293:   }
294: }
295: 
296: function buildDynamicSlot(name, fn) {
297:   return createObjectExpression([
298:     createObjectProperty(`name`, name),
299:     createObjectProperty(`fn`, fn)
300:   ])
301: }
302: 
303: function hasForwardedSlots(children) {
304:   for (let i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
305:     const child = children[i]
306:     switch (child.type) {
307:       case NodeTypes.ELEMENT:
308:         if (
309:           child.tagType === ElementTypes.SLOT ||
310:           hasForwardedSlots(child.children)
311:         ) {
312:           return true
313:         }
314:         break
315:       case NodeTypes.IF:
316:         if (hasForwardedSlots(child.branches)) return true
317:         break
318:       case NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH:
319:       case NodeTypes.FOR:
320:         if (hasForwardedSlots(child.children)) return true
321:         break
322:       default:
323:         break
324:     }
325:   }
326:   return false
327: }
328: 
329: function isNonWhitespaceContent(node){
330:   if (node.type !== NodeTypes.TEXT && node.type !== NodeTypes.TEXT_CALL)
331:     return true
332:   return node.type === NodeTypes.TEXT
333:     ? !!node.content.trim()
334:     : isNonWhitespaceContent(node.content)
335: }

Testing


component slots 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(`<Comp><div/></Comp>`, {
 5:   prefixIdentifiers: true
 6: })
 7: logOn()
 8: logg("root", root)
 9: logg("slots", slots)
10: logg("slots.properties[0]", slots.properties[0])
11: logg("slots.properties[0].value", slots.properties[0].value)
12: logg("slots.properties[1]", slots.properties[1])
13: logg("slots.properties[1].value", slots.properties[1].value)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- root ---------

  children: [

      loc: [Object],

    }

    Symbol(createElementVNode),

  },

    end: { column: 20, line: 1, offset: 19 },

  }
}

on-component named slot 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(`<Comp v-slot:named="{ foo }">{{ foo }}{{ bar }}</Comp>`, {
 5:   prefixIdentifiers: true
 6: })
 7: logOn()
 8: logg("slots", slots)
 9: const slot = slots.properties[0]
10: logg("slot", slot)
11: logg("slot.key", slot.key)
12: logg("slot.value.params", slot.value.params)
13: logg("slot.value.returns[0]", slot.value.returns[0])
14: logg("slot.value.returns[1]", slot.value.returns[1])

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- slots ---------
{
  type: 15,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 55, line: 1, offset: 54 },
    source: '<Comp v-slot:named="{ foo }">{{ foo }}{{ bar }}</Comp>'
  },
  properties: [
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] }
  ]
}
--------- slot ---------
{
  type: 16,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  key: {
    type: 4,
    content: 'named',
    isStatic: true,
    constType: 3,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'named' }
  },
  value: {
    type: 18,
    params: { type: 8, loc: [Object], children: [Array], identifiers: [Array] },
    returns: [ [Object], [Object] ],
    newline: false,
    isSlot: true,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{{ foo }}' }
  }
}
--------- slot.key ---------
{
  type: 4,
  content: 'named',
  isStatic: true,
  constType: 3,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 14, line: 1, offset: 13 },
    end: { column: 19, line: 1, offset: 18 },
    source: 'named'
  }
}
--------- slot.value.params ---------
{
  type: 8,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 21, line: 1, offset: 20 },
    end: { column: 28, line: 1, offset: 27 },
    source: '{ foo }'
  },
  children: [
    '{ ',
    {
      type: 4,
      loc: [Object],
      content: 'foo',
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0
    },
    ' }'
  ],
  identifiers: [ 'foo' ]
}
--------- slot.value.returns[0] ---------
{
  type: 5,
  content: {
    type: 4,
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    content: 'foo',
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'foo' }
  },
  loc: {
    start: { column: 30, line: 1, offset: 29 },
    end: { column: 39, line: 1, offset: 38 },
    source: '{{ foo }}'
  }
}
--------- slot.value.returns[1] ---------
{
  type: 5,
  content: {
    type: 4,
    isStatic: false,
    constType: 0,
    content: '_ctx.bar',
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'bar' }
  },
  loc: {
    start: { column: 39, line: 1, offset: 38 },
    end: { column: 48, line: 1, offset: 47 },
    source: '{{ bar }}'
  }
}
undefined

template named slot 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(
 5:   `<Comp>
 6:     <template v-slot:one="{ foo }">
 7:         {{ foo }}{{ bar }}
 8:     </template>
 9:     <template #two="{ bar }">
10:         {{ foo }}{{ bar }}
11:     </template>
12:   </Comp>`, {
13:   prefixIdentifiers: true
14: })
15: logOn()
16: logg("slots", slots)
17: slots.properties.forEach((p, i) => {
18:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content}`, p.value)
19: })
20: 

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- slots ---------
{
  type: 15,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 10, line: 8, offset: 168 },
    source: '<Comp>\n' +
      '    <template v-slot:one="{ foo }">\n' +
      '        {{ foo }}{{ bar }}\n' +
      '    </template>\n' +
      '    <template #two="{ bar }">\n' +
      '        {{ foo }}{{ bar }}\n' +
      '    </template>\n' +
      '  </Comp>'
  },
  properties: [
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] }
  ]
}

  type: 18,

    type: 8,

  returns: [

    { type: 5, content: [Object], loc: [Object] },

    { type: 2, content: '     ', loc: [Object] }

  }

    type: 8,

on component dynamically named slot 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(
 5:   `<Comp v-slot:[named]="{foo}">{{foo}}{{bar}}</Comp>`, {
 6:   prefixIdentifiers: true
 7: })
 8: logOn()
 9: logg("slots", slots)
10: slots.properties.forEach((p, i) => {
11:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - value`, p.value)
12:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - returns`, p.value.returns)
13: })
14: 

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)

  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },

  properties: [
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] }
  ]

    start: { column: 30, line: 1, offset: 29 },

undefined

named slots implicit default slot

这种情况时， <template #one>foo</template>bar<span/> 整个都会被当做默认插槽，而 不仅仅是 <template #one>foo</template> 这个，因为在处理插槽时，默认不在 template 里面的都合并到默认插槽中去。

相关代码： 收集 120~128, 合并 244~260

 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(
 5:   `<Comp>
 6:      <template #one>foo</template>bar<span/>
 7:    </Comp>`, {
 8:   prefixIdentifiers: true
 9: })
10: logOn()
11: logg("slots", slots)
12: slots.properties.forEach((p, i) => {
13:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - value`, p.value)
14:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - returns`, p.value.returns)
15: })
16: 

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- slots ---------
{
  type: 15,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 11, line: 3, offset: 62 },
    source: '<Comp>\n     <template #one>foo</template>bar<span/>\n   </Comp>'
  },
  properties: [
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] }
  ]
}
--------- slot 0 - name = one - value ---------
{
  type: 18,
  params: undefined,
  returns: [ { type: 2, content: 'foo', loc: [Object] } ],
  newline: false,
  isSlot: true,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 21, line: 2, offset: 27 },
    end: { column: 24, line: 2, offset: 30 },
    source: 'foo'
  }
}

  {
    type: 2,
    content: 'foo',
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'foo' }
  }
]

      type: 1,

      tagType: 0,

  ],

  loc: {
    start: { column: 7, line: 1, offset: 6 },
    end: { column: 6, line: 2, offset: 12 },

  }

    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: 'bar' }

    type: 1,

      children: undefined,
      patchFlag: undefined,

    type: 2,

  }

dynamically named slot 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(
 5:   `<Comp>
 6:     <template v-slot:[one]="{ foo }">
 7:         {{ foo }}{{ bar }}
 8:     </template>
 9:     <template #[two]="{ bar }">
10:         {{ foo }}{{ bar }}
11:     </template>
12:   </Comp>`, {
13:   prefixIdentifiers: true
14: })
15: logOn()
16: logg("slots", slots)
17: slots.properties.forEach((p, i) => {
18:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - value`, p.value)
19:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - returns`, p.value.returns)
20: })
21: 

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- slots ---------
{
  type: 15,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 10, line: 8, offset: 172 },
    source: '<Comp>\n' +
      '    <template v-slot:[one]="{ foo }">\n' +
      '        {{ foo }}{{ bar }}\n' +
      '    </template>\n' +
      '    <template #[two]="{ bar }">\n' +
      '        {{ foo }}{{ bar }}\n' +
      '    </template>\n' +
      '  </Comp>'
  },
  properties: [
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] }
  ]

    { type: 2, content: '     ', loc: [Object] }

  isSlot: true,
  loc: {

    end: { column: 9, line: 3, offset: 53 },
    source: '\n        '
  }

nested slots scoping 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(
 5:   `
 6: <Comp>
 7:   <template #default="{ foo }">
 8:     <Inner v-slot="{ bar }">
 9:     {{ foo }}{{ bar }}{{ baz }}
10:     </Inner>
11:     {{ foo }}{{ bar }}{{ baz }}
12:   </template>
13: </Comp>`, {
14:   prefixIdentifiers: true
15: })
16: logOn()
17: logg("slots", slots)
18: slots.properties.forEach((p, i) => {
19:   logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - value`, p.value)
20:   if (p.value.returns) {
21:      const returns = p.value.returns.filter(r => typeof r.content === 'string' ? !!r.content.trim() : true)
22:     logg(`slot ${i} - name = ${p.key.content} - returns`, returns)
23:   }
24: })
25: logg('inner slot returns', slots.properties[0].value.returns[1].codegenNode.children.properties[0].value.returns)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- slots ---------
{
  type: 15,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 2, offset: 1 },
    end: { column: 8, line: 9, offset: 167 },
    source: '<Comp>\n' +
      '  <template #default="{ foo }">\n' +
      '    <Inner v-slot="{ bar }">\n' +
      '    {{ foo }}{{ bar }}{{ baz }}\n' +
      '    </Inner>\n' +
      '    {{ foo }}{{ bar }}{{ baz }}\n' +
      '  </template>\n' +
      '</Comp>'
  },
  properties: [
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] },
    { type: 16, loc: [Object], key: [Object], value: [Object] }
  ]
}
--------- slot 0 - name = default - value ---------
{
  type: 18,
  params: {
    type: 8,
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{ foo }' },
    children: [ '{ ', [Object], ' }' ],
    identifiers: [ 'foo' ]
  },
  returns: [
    { type: 2, content: '     ', loc: [Object] },
    {
      type: 1,
      ns: 0,
      tag: 'Inner',
      tagType: 1,
      props: [Array],
      isSelfClosing: false,
      children: [Array],
      loc: [Object],
      codegenNode: [Object]
    },
    { type: 2, content: '     ', loc: [Object] },
    { type: 5, content: [Object], loc: [Object] },
    { type: 5, content: [Object], loc: [Object] },
    { type: 5, content: [Object], loc: [Object] },
    { type: 2, content: '   ', loc: [Object] }
  ],
  newline: false,
  isSlot: true,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 32, line: 3, offset: 39 },
    end: { column: 5, line: 4, offset: 44 },
    source: '\n    '
  }
}
--------- slot 0 - name = default - returns ---------
[
  {
    type: 1,
    ns: 0,
    tag: 'Inner',
    tagType: 1,
    props: [ [Object] ],
    isSelfClosing: false,
    children: [ [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object] ],
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: '<Inner v-slot="{ bar }">\n    {{ foo }}{{ bar }}{{ baz }}\n    </Inner>'
    },
    codegenNode: {
      type: 13,
      tag: '_component_Inner',
      props: undefined,
      children: [Object],
      patchFlag: '1024',
      dynamicProps: undefined,
      directives: undefined,
      isBlock: false,
      disableTracking: false,
      isComponent: true,
      loc: [Object]
    }
  },
  {
    type: 5,
    content: {
      type: 4,
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      content: 'foo',
      loc: [Object]
    },
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{{ foo }}' }
  },

    type: 5,
    content: {
      type: 4,
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      content: '_ctx.bar',
      loc: [Object]
    },
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{{ bar }}' }
  },
  {
    type: 5,
    content: {
      type: 4,
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      content: '_ctx.baz',
      loc: [Object]
    },
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{{ baz }}' }
  }
]
--------- slot 1 - name = _ - value ---------
{
  type: 4,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  content: '1 /* STABLE */',
  isStatic: false,
  constType: 0
}
--------- inner slot returns ---------
[
  {
    type: 2,
    content: '     ',
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '\n    ' }
  },
  {
    type: 5,
    content: {
      type: 4,
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      content: 'foo',
      loc: [Object]
    },
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{{ foo }}' }
  },
  {
    type: 5,
    content: {
      type: 4,
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      content: 'bar',
      loc: [Object]
    },
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{{ bar }}' }
  },
  {
    type: 5,
    content: {
      type: 4,
      isStatic: false,
      constType: 0,
      content: '_ctx.baz',
      loc: [Object]
    },
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '{{ baz }}' }
  },
  {
    type: 2,
    content: '     ',
    loc: { start: [Object], end: [Object], source: '\n    ' }
  }
]
undefined

should force dynamic when inside v-for 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root } = parseWithSlots(
 5: `<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar">foo</Comp></div>`
 6: )
 7: logOn()
 8: const div = root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode
 9: const comp = div.children[0]
10: logg(`div`, div)
11: logg(`comp`, comp)
12: logg(`comp.codegenNode.patchFlag(PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=${PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS})`, comp.codegenNode.patchFlag)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- div ---------
{
  type: 13,
  tag: '"div"',
  props: undefined,
  children: [
    {
      type: 1,
      ns: 0,
      tag: 'Comp',
      tagType: 1,
      props: [Array],
      isSelfClosing: false,
      children: [Array],
      loc: [Object],
      codegenNode: [Object]
    }
  ],
  patchFlag: undefined,
  dynamicProps: undefined,
  directives: undefined,
  isBlock: true,
  disableTracking: false,
  isComponent: false,
  loc: {
    start: { column: 1, line: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { column: 59, line: 1, offset: 58 },
    source: '<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar">foo</Comp></div>'
  }
}
--------- comp ---------
{
  type: 1,
  ns: 0,
  tag: 'Comp',
  tagType: 1,
  props: [
    {
      type: 7,
      name: 'slot',
      exp: [Object],
      arg: undefined,
      modifiers: [],
      loc: [Object]
    }
  ],
  isSelfClosing: false,
  children: [ { type: 2, content: 'foo', loc: [Object] } ],
  loc: {
    start: { column: 24, line: 1, offset: 23 },
    end: { column: 53, line: 1, offset: 52 },
    source: '<Comp v-slot="bar">foo</Comp>'
  },
  codegenNode: {
    type: 13,
    tag: '_component_Comp',
    props: undefined,
    children: { type: 15, loc: [Object], properties: [Array] },
    patchFlag: '1024',
    dynamicProps: undefined,
    directives: undefined,
    isBlock: false,
    disableTracking: false,
    isComponent: true,
    loc: {
      start: [Object],
      end: [Object],
      source: '<Comp v-slot="bar">foo</Comp>'
    }
  }
}
--------- comp.codegenNode.patchFlag(PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=1024) ---------
1024
undefined

force dynamic slots when using scope vars

意思是只有当 slots 用到了当前局部变量的情况下才强制解析成动态插槽。

 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: function assertDynamicSlots(template) {
 4:   logOff()
 5:   const { root } = parseWithSlots(template, { prefixIdentifiers: true })
 6:   logOn()
 7:   let flag
 8:   if (root.children[0].type === NodeTypes.FOR) {
 9:     const div = root.children[0].children[0].codegenNode
10:     const comp = div.children[0]
11:     flag = comp.codegenNode.patchFlag
12:   } else {
13:     const innerComp = root.children[0].children[0]
14:     flag = innerComp.codegenNode.patchFlag
15:   }
16: 
17:   logg(`template`, template)
18:   logg(`flag=${flag}, PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=${PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS}`)
19:   logBr()
20: }
21: 
22: assertDynamicSlots(`<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar">foo</Comp></div>`, false)
23: 
24: assertDynamicSlots(`<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar">{{ i }}</Comp></div>`, true)
25: 
26: // reference the component's own slot variable should not force dynamic slots
27: assertDynamicSlots(`<Comp v-slot="foo"><Comp v-slot="bar">{{ bar }}</Comp></Comp>`, false)
28: 
29: assertDynamicSlots(`<Comp v-slot="foo"><Comp v-slot="bar">{{ foo }}</Comp></Comp>`, true)
30: 
31: assertDynamicSlots(`<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar"><button @click="fn(i)" /></Comp></div>`, true)
32: 
33: assertDynamicSlots(`<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar"><button @click="fn()" /></Comp></div>`,false)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- template ---------
<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar">foo</Comp></div>
--------- flag=undefined, PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=1024 ---------


--------- template ---------
<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar">{{ i }}</Comp></div>
--------- flag=1024, PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=1024 ---------


--------- template ---------
<Comp v-slot="foo"><Comp v-slot="bar">{{ bar }}</Comp></Comp>
--------- flag=undefined, PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=1024 ---------


--------- template ---------
<Comp v-slot="foo"><Comp v-slot="bar">{{ foo }}</Comp></Comp>
--------- flag=1024, PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=1024 ---------


--------- template ---------
<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar"><button @click="fn(i)" /></Comp></div>
--------- flag=1024, PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=1024 ---------


--------- template ---------
<div v-for="i in list"><Comp v-slot="bar"><button @click="fn()" /></Comp></div>
--------- flag=undefined, PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS=1024 ---------


undefined

5:   `<Comp><template #one v-if="ok">hello</template></Comp>`)

 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>

14:   "slots.arguments[1].elements[0].alternate.consequent.properties",
15:   element.alternate.consequent.properties)
16: logg(
17:   "slots.arguments[1].elements[0].alternate.alternate.properties",
18:   element.alternate.alternate.properties)

named slot with v-for 
 1: <<transform-testing-utils>>
 2: 
 3: logOff()
 4: const { root, slots } = parseWithSlots(
 5:   `<Comp><template v-for="name in list" #[name]>{{ name }}</template></Comp>`,
 6:   { prefixIdentifiers: true }
 7: )
 8: logOn()
 9: logg("slots", slots)
10: logg("slots.arguments[0].properties[0]", slots.arguments[0].properties[0])
11: logg("slots.arguments[1].elements[0]", slots.arguments[1].elements[0])
12: logg("slots.arguments[1].elements[0].arguments", slots.arguments[1].elements[0].arguments)

--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=for, matches=(n) => n === name
--------- createStructuralDirectiveTransform ---------
name=/^(if|else|else-if)$/, matches=(n) => name.test(n)
--------- slots ---------
{
  type: 14,
  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },
  callee: Symbol(createSlots),
  arguments: [
    { type: 15, loc: [Object], properties: [Array] },
    { type: 17, loc: [Object], elements: [Array] }
  ]
}

  loc: {
    source: '',
    start: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 },
    end: { line: 1, column: 1, offset: 0 }
  },

    loc: { source: '', start: [Object], end: [Object] },

    isStatic: true,
    constType: 3
  },
