 638:   [BASE_TRANSITION]: `BaseTransition`,
 639:   [OPEN_BLOCK]: `openBlock`,
 640:   [CREATE_BLOCK]: `createBlock`,
 641:   [CREATE_ELEMENT_BLOCK]: `createElementBlock`,
 642:   [CREATE_VNODE]: `createVNode`,
 643:   [CREATE_ELEMENT_VNODE]: `createElementVNode`,
 644:   [CREATE_COMMENT]: `createCommentVNode`,
 645:   [CREATE_TEXT]: `createTextVNode`,
 646:   [CREATE_STATIC]: `createStaticVNode`,
 647:   [RESOLVE_COMPONENT]: `resolveComponent`,
 648:   [RESOLVE_DYNAMIC_COMPONENT]: `resolveDynamicComponent`,
 649:   [RESOLVE_DIRECTIVE]: `resolveDirective`,
 650:   [RESOLVE_FILTER]: `resolveFilter`,
 651:   [WITH_DIRECTIVES]: `withDirectives`,
 652:   [RENDER_LIST]: `renderList`,
 653:   [RENDER_SLOT]: `renderSlot`,
 654:   [CREATE_SLOTS]: `createSlots`,
 655:   [TO_DISPLAY_STRING]: `toDisplayString`,
 656:   [MERGE_PROPS]: `mergeProps`,
 657:   [NORMALIZE_CLASS]: `normalizeClass`,
 658:   [NORMALIZE_STYLE]: `normalizeStyle`,
 659:   [NORMALIZE_PROPS]: `normalizeProps`,
 660:   [GUARD_REACTIVE_PROPS]: `guardReactiveProps`,
 661:   [TO_HANDLERS]: `toHandlers`,
 662:   [CAMELIZE]: `camelize`,
 663:   [CAPITALIZE]: `capitalize`,
 664:   [TO_HANDLER_KEY]: `toHandlerKey`,
 665:   [SET_BLOCK_TRACKING]: `setBlockTracking`,
 666:   [PUSH_SCOPE_ID]: `pushScopeId`,
 667:   [POP_SCOPE_ID]: `popScopeId`,
 668:   [WITH_CTX]: `withCtx`,
 669:   [UNREF]: `unref`,
 670:   [IS_REF]: `isRef`,
 671:   [WITH_MEMO]: `withMemo`,
 672:   [IS_MEMO_SAME]: `isMemoSame`
 673: }
 674: 
 675: function registerRuntimeHelpers(helpers) {
 676:   Object.getOwnPropertySymbols(helpers).forEach(s => {
 677:     helperNameMap[s] = helpers[s]
 678:   })
 679: }
 680: 
 681: 
 682: /**
 683:  * Patch flags are optimization hints generated by the compiler.
 684:  * when a block with dynamicChildren is encountered during diff, the algorithm
 685:  * enters "optimized mode". In this mode, we know that the vdom is produced by
 686:  * a render function generated by the compiler, so the algorithm only needs to
 687:  * handle updates explicitly marked by these patch flags.
 688:  *
 689:  * Patch flags can be combined using the | bitwise operator and can be checked
 690:  * using the & operator, e.g.
 691:  *
 692:  * ```js
 693:  * const flag = TEXT | CLASS
 694:  * if (flag & TEXT) { ... }
 695:  * ```
 696:  *
 697:  * Check the `patchElement` function in '../../runtime-core/src/renderer.ts' to see how the
 698:  * flags are handled during diff.
 699:  */
 700: const PatchFlags = {
 701:   /**
 702:    * Indicates an element with dynamic textContent (children fast path)
 703:    */
 704:   TEXT: 1,
 705: 
 706:   /**
 707:    * Indicates an element with dynamic class binding.
 708:    */
 709:   CLASS: 1 << 1,
 710: 
 711:   /**
 712:    * Indicates an element with dynamic style
 713:    * The compiler pre-compiles static string styles into static objects
 714:    * + detects and hoists inline static objects
 715:    * e.g. `style="color: red"` and `:style="{ color: 'red' }"` both get hoisted
 716:    * as:
 717:    * ```js
 718:    * const style = { color: 'red' }
 719:    * render() { return e('div', { style }) }
 720:    * ```
 721:    */
 722:   STYLE: 1 << 2,
 723: 
 724:   /**
 725:    * Indicates an element that has non-class/style dynamic props.
 726:    * Can also be on a component that has any dynamic props (includes
 727:    * class/style). when this flag is present, the vnode also has a dynamicProps
 728:    * array that contains the keys of the props that may change so the runtime
 729:    * can diff them faster (without having to worry about removed props)
 730:    */
 731:   PROPS: 1 << 3,
 732: 
 733:   /**
 734:    * Indicates an element with props with dynamic keys. When keys change, a full
 735:    * diff is always needed to remove the old key. This flag is mutually
 736:    * exclusive with CLASS, STYLE and PROPS.
 737:    */
 738:   FULL_PROPS: 1 << 4,
 739: 
 740:   /**
 741:    * Indicates an element with event listeners (which need to be attached
 742:    * during hydration)
 743:    */
 744:   HYDRATE_EVENTS: 1 << 5,
 745: 
 746:   /**
 747:    * Indicates a fragment whose children order doesn't change.
 748:    */
 749:   STABLE_FRAGMENT: 1 << 6,
 750: 
 751:   /**
 752:    * Indicates a fragment with keyed or partially keyed children
 753:    */
 754:   KEYED_FRAGMENT: 1 << 7,
 755: 
 756:   /**
 757:    * Indicates a fragment with unkeyed children.
 758:    */
 759:   UNKEYED_FRAGMENT: 1 << 8,
 760: 
 761:   /**
 762:    * Indicates an element that only needs non-props patching, e.g. ref or
 763:    * directives (onVnodeXXX hooks). since every patched vnode checks for refs
 764:    * and onVnodeXXX hooks, it simply marks the vnode so that a parent block
 765:    * will track it.
 766:    */
 767:   NEED_PATCH: 1 << 9,
 768: 
 769:   /**
 770:    * Indicates a component with dynamic slots (e.g. slot that references a v-for
 771:    * iterated value, or dynamic slot names).
 772:    * Components with this flag are always force updated.
 773:    */
 774:   DYNAMIC_SLOTS: 1 << 10,
 775: 
 776:   /**
 777:    * Indicates a fragment that was created only because the user has placed
 778:    * comments at the root level of a template. This is a dev-only flag since
 779:    * comments are stripped in production.
 780:    */
 781:   DEV_ROOT_FRAGMENT: 1 << 11,
 782: 
 783:   /**
 784:    * SPECIAL FLAGS -------------------------------------------------------------
 785:    * Special flags are negative integers. They are never matched against using
 786:    * bitwise operators (bitwise matching should only happen in branches where
 787:    * patchFlag > 0), and are mutually exclusive. When checking for a special
 788:    * flag, simply check patchFlag === FLAG.
 789:    */
 790: 
 791:   /**
 792:    * Indicates a hoisted static vnode. This is a hint for hydration to skip
 793:    * the entire sub tree since static content never needs to be updated.
 794:    */
 795:   HOISTED: -1,
 796:   /**
 797:    * A special flag that indicates that the diffing algorithm should bail out
 798:    * of optimized mode. For example, on block fragments created by renderSlot()
 799:    * when encountering non-compiler generated slots (i.e. manually written
 800:    * render functions, which should always be fully diffed)
 801:    * OR manually cloneVNodes
 802:    */
 803:   BAIL: -2
 804: }
 805: 
 806: /**
 807:  * dev only flag -> name mapping
 808:  */
 809: const PatchFlagNames = {
 810:   [PatchFlags.TEXT]: `TEXT`,
 811:   [PatchFlags.CLASS]: `CLASS`,
 812:   [PatchFlags.STYLE]: `STYLE`,
 813:   [PatchFlags.PROPS]: `PROPS`,
 814:   [PatchFlags.FULL_PROPS]: `FULL_PROPS`,
 815:   [PatchFlags.HYDRATE_EVENTS]: `HYDRATE_EVENTS`,
 816:   [PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT]: `STABLE_FRAGMENT`,
 817:   [PatchFlags.KEYED_FRAGMENT]: `KEYED_FRAGMENT`,
 818:   [PatchFlags.UNKEYED_FRAGMENT]: `UNKEYED_FRAGMENT`,
 819:   [PatchFlags.NEED_PATCH]: `NEED_PATCH`,
 820:   [PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS]: `DYNAMIC_SLOTS`,
 821:   [PatchFlags.DEV_ROOT_FRAGMENT]: `DEV_ROOT_FRAGMENT`,
 822:   [PatchFlags.HOISTED]: `HOISTED`,
 823:   [PatchFlags.BAIL]: `BAIL`
 824: }
 825: 
 826: function genFlagText(flag, names = PatchFlagNames) {
 827:   if (isArray(flag)) {
 828:     let f = 0
 829:     flag.forEach(ff => {
 830:       f |= ff
 831:     })
 832:     return `${f} /* ${flag.map(f => names[f]).join(', ')} */`
 833:   } else {
 834:     return `${flag} /* ${names[flag]} */`
 835:   }
 836: }
 837: 
 838: const propsHelperSet = new Set([NORMALIZE_PROPS, GUARD_REACTIVE_PROPS])
 839: 
 840: function getUnnormalizedProps(props, callPath = []) {
 841:   if (
 842:     props &&
 843:     !isString(props) &&
 844:     props.type === NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION
 845:   ) {
 846:     const callee = props.callee
 847:     if (!isString(callee) && propsHelperSet.has(callee)) {
 848:       return getUnnormalizedProps(
 849:         props.arguments[0],
 850:         callPath.concat(props)
 851:       )
 852:     }
 853:   }
 854:   return [props, callPath]
 855: }
 856: 
 857: function injectProp(node, prop, context) {
 858:   let propsWithInjection
 859:   /**
 860:    * 1. mergeProps(...)
 861:    * 2. toHandlers(...)
 862:    * 3. normalizeProps(...)
 863:    * 4. normalizeProps(guardReactiveProps(...))
 864:    *
 865:    * we need to get the real props before normalization
 866:    */
 867:   let props =
 868:     node.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL ? node.props : node.arguments[2]
 869:   let callPath = []
 870:   let parentCall
 871:   if (
 872:     props &&
 873:     !isString(props) &&
 874:     props.type === NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION
 875:   ) {
 876:     const ret = getUnnormalizedProps(props)
 877:     props = ret[0]
 878:     callPath = ret[1]
 879:     parentCall = callPath[callPath.length - 1]
 880:   }
 881: 
 882:   if (props == null || isString(props)) {
 883:     propsWithInjection = createObjectExpression([prop])
 884:   } else if (props.type === NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION) {
 885:     // merged props... add ours
 886:     // only inject key to object literal if it's the first argument so that
 887:     // if doesn't override user provided keys
 888:     const first = props.arguments[0] | JSChildNode
 889:     if (!isString(first) && first.type === NodeTypes.JS_OBJECT_EXPRESSION) {
 890:       first.properties.unshift(prop)
 891:     } else {
 892:       if (props.callee === TO_HANDLERS) {
 893:         // #2366
 894:         propsWithInjection = createCallExpression(context.helper(MERGE_PROPS), [
 895:           createObjectExpression([prop]),
 896:           props
 897:         ])
 898:       } else {
 899:         props.arguments.unshift(createObjectExpression([prop]))
 900:       }
 901:     }
 902:     !propsWithInjection && (propsWithInjection = props)
 903:   } else if (props.type === NodeTypes.JS_OBJECT_EXPRESSION) {
 904:     let alreadyExists = false
 905:     // check existing key to avoid overriding user provided keys
 906:     if (prop.key.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
 907:       const propKeyName = prop.key.content
 908:       alreadyExists = props.properties.some(
 909:         p =>
 910:           p.key.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION &&
 911:           p.key.content === propKeyName
 912:       )
 913:     }
 914:     if (!alreadyExists) {
 915:       props.properties.unshift(prop)
 916:     }
 917:     propsWithInjection = props
 918:   } else {
 919:     // single v-bind with expression, return a merged replacement
 920:     propsWithInjection = createCallExpression(context.helper(MERGE_PROPS), [
 921:       createObjectExpression([prop]),
 922:       props
 923:     ])
 924:     // in the case of nested helper call, e.g. `normalizeProps(guardReactiveProps(props))`,
 925:     // it will be rewritten as `normalizeProps(mergeProps({ key: 0 }, props))`,
 926:     // the `guardReactiveProps` will no longer be needed
 927:     if (parentCall && parentCall.callee === GUARD_REACTIVE_PROPS) {
 928:       parentCall = callPath[callPath.length - 2]
 929:     }
 930:   }
 931:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
 932:     if (parentCall) {
 933:       parentCall.arguments[0] = propsWithInjection
 934:     } else {
 935:       node.props = propsWithInjection
 936:     }
 937:   } else {
 938:     if (parentCall) {
 939:       parentCall.arguments[0] = propsWithInjection
 940:     } else {
 941:       node.arguments[2] = propsWithInjection
 942:     }
 943:   }
 944: }
 945: 
 946: const BindingTypes = {
 947:   /**
 948:    * returned from data()
 949:    */
 950:   DATA: 'data',
 951:   /**
 952:    * declared as a prop
 953:    */
 954:   PROPS: 'props',
 955:   /**
 956:    * a local alias of a `<script setup>` destructured prop.
 957:    * the original is stored in __propsAliases of the bindingMetadata object.
 958:    */
 959:   PROPS_ALIASED: 'props-aliased',
 960:   /**
 961:    * a let binding (may or may not be a ref)
 962:    */
 963:   SETUP_LET: 'setup-let',
 964:   /**
 965:    * a const binding that can never be a ref.
 966:    * these bindings don't need `unref()` calls when processed in inlined
 967:    * template expressions.
 968:    */
 969:   SETUP_CONST: 'setup-const',
 970:   /**
 971:    * a const binding that may be a ref.
 972:    */
 973:   SETUP_MAYBE_REF: 'setup-maybe-ref',
 974:   /**
 975:    * bindings that are guaranteed to be refs
 976:    */
 977:   SETUP_REF: 'setup-ref',
 978:   /**
 979:    * declared by other options, e.g. computed, inject
 980:    */
 981:   OPTIONS: 'options'
 982: }
 983: 
 984: class WalkerBase {
 985:   constructor() {
 986:     /** @type {boolean} */
 987:     this.should_skip = false
 988: 
 989:     /** @type {boolean} */
 990:     this.should_remove = false
 991: 
 992:     /** @type {BaseNode | null} */
 993:     this.replacement = null
 994: 
 995:     /** @type {WalkerContext} */
 996:     this.context = {
 997:       skip: () => (this.should_skip = true),
 998:       remove: () => (this.should_remove = true),
 999:       replace: (node) => (this.replacement = node)
1000:     }
1001:   }
1002: 
1003:   replace(parent, prop, index, node) {
1004:     if (parent) {
1005:       if (index !== null) {
1006:         parent[prop][index] = node
1007:       } else {
1008:         parent[prop] = node
1009:       }
1010:     }
1011:   }
1012: 
1013:   remove(parent, prop, index) {
1014:     if (parent) {
1015:       if (index !== null) {
1016:         parent[prop].splice(index, 1)
1017:       } else {
1018:         delete parent[prop]
1019:       }
1020:     }
1021:   }
1022: }
1023: 
1024: class SyncWalker extends WalkerBase {
1025: 
1026:   constructor(enter, leave) {
1027:     super()
1028: 
1029:     /** @type {SyncHandler} */
1030:     this.enter = enter
1031: 
1032:     /** @type {SyncHandler} */
1033:     this.leave = leave
1034:   }
1035: 
1036:   visit(node, parent, prop, index) {
1037:     if (node) {
1038:       if (this.enter) {
1039:         const _should_skip = this.should_skip
1040:         const _should_remove = this.should_remove
1041:         const _replacement = this.replacement
1042:         this.should_skip = false
1043:         this.should_remove = false
1044:         this.replacement = null
1045: 
1046:         this.enter.call(this.context, node, parent, prop, index)
1047: 
1048:         if (this.replacement) {
1049:           node = this.replacement
1050:           this.replace(parent, prop, index, node)
1051:         }
1052: 
1053:         if (this.should_remove) {
1054:           this.remove(parent, prop, index)
1055:         }
1056: 
1057:         const skipped = this.should_skip
1058:         const removed = this.should_remove
1059: 
1060:         this.should_skip = _should_skip
1061:         this.should_remove = _should_remove
1062:         this.replacement = _replacement
1063: 
1064:         if (skipped) return node
1065:         if (removed) return null
1066:       }
1067: 
1068:       for (const key in node) {
1069:         const value = node[key]
1070: 
1071:         if (typeof value !== 'object') {
1072:           continue
1073:         } else if (Array.isArray(value)) {
1074:           for (let i = 0; i < value.length; i += 1) {
1075:             if (value[i] !== null && typeof value[i].type === 'string') {
1076:               if (!this.visit(value[i], node, key, i)) {
1077:                 // removed
1078:                 i--
1079:               }
1080:             }
1081:           }
1082:         } else if (value !== null && typeof value.type === 'string') {
1083:           this.visit(value, node, key, null)
1084:         }
1085:       }
1086: 
1087:       if (this.leave) {
1088:         const _replacement = this.replacement
1089:         const _should_remove = this.should_remove
1090:         this.replacement = null
1091:         this.should_remove = false
1092: 
1093:         this.leave.call(this.context, node, parent, prop, index)
1094: 
1095:         if (this.replacement) {
1096:           node = this.replacement
1097:           this.replace(parent, prop, index, node)
1098:         }
1099: 
1100:         if (this.should_remove) {
1101:           this.remove(parent, prop, index)
1102:         }
1103: 
1104:         const removed = this.should_remove
1105: 
1106:         this.replacement = _replacement
1107:         this.should_remove = _should_remove
1108: 
1109:         if (removed) return null
1110:       }
1111:     }
1112: 
1113:     return node
1114:   }
1115: }
1116: 
1117: class AsyncWalker extends WalkerBase {
1118: 
1119:   constructor(enter, leave) {
1120:     super()
1121: 
1122:     /** @type {AsyncHandler} */
1123:     this.enter = enter
1124: 
1125:     /** @type {AsyncHandler} */
1126:     this.leave = leave
1127:   }
1128: 
1129:   async visit(node, parent, prop, index) {
1130:     if (node) {
1131:       if (this.enter) {
1132:         const _should_skip = this.should_skip
1133:         const _should_remove = this.should_remove
1134:         const _replacement = this.replacement
1135:         this.should_skip = false
1136:         this.should_remove = false
1137:         this.replacement = null
1138: 
1139:         await this.enter.call(this.context, node, parent, prop, index)
1140: 
1141:         if (this.replacement) {
1142:           node = this.replacement
1143:           this.replace(parent, prop, index, node)
1144:         }
1145: 
1146:         if (this.should_remove) {
1147:           this.remove(parent, prop, index)
1148:         }
1149: 
1150:         const skipped = this.should_skip
1151:         const removed = this.should_remove
1152: 
1153:         this.should_skip = _should_skip
1154:         this.should_remove = _should_remove
1155:         this.replacement = _replacement
1156: 
1157:         if (skipped) return node
1158:         if (removed) return null
1159:       }
1160: 
1161:       for (const key in node) {
1162:         const value = node[key]
1163: 
1164:         if (typeof value !== 'object') {
1165:           continue
1166:         } else if (Array.isArray(value)) {
1167:           for (let i = 0; i < value.length; i += 1) {
1168:             if (value[i] !== null && typeof value[i].type === 'string') {
1169:               if (!(await this.visit(value[i], node, key, i))) {
1170:                 // removed
1171:                 i--
1172:               }
1173:             }
1174:           }
1175:         } else if (value !== null && typeof value.type === 'string') {
1176:           await this.visit(value, node, key, null)
1177:         }
1178:       }
1179: 
1180:       if (this.leave) {
1181:         const _replacement = this.replacement
1182:         const _should_remove = this.should_remove
1183:         this.replacement = null
1184:         this.should_remove = false
1185: 
1186:         await this.leave.call(this.context, node, parent, prop, index)
1187: 
1188:         if (this.replacement) {
1189:           node = this.replacement
1190:           this.replace(parent, prop, index, node)
1191:         }
1192: 
1193:         if (this.should_remove) {
1194:           this.remove(parent, prop, index)
1195:         }
1196: 
1197:         const removed = this.should_remove
1198: 
1199:         this.replacement = _replacement
1200:         this.should_remove = _should_remove
1201: 
1202:         if (removed) return null
1203:       }
1204:     }
1205: 
1206:     return node
1207:   }
1208: }
1209: 
1210: function walk(ast, { enter, leave }) {
1211:   const instance = new SyncWalker(enter, leave)
1212:   return instance.visit(ast, null)
1213: }
1214: 
1215: async function asyncWalk(ast, { enter, leave }) {
1216:   const instance = new AsyncWalker(enter, leave)
1217:   return await instance.visit(ast, null)
1218: }
1219: 
1220: 
1221: function isInDestructureAssignment(
1222:   parent,
1223:   parentStack
1224: ) {
1225:   if (
1226:     parent &&
1227:     (parent.type === 'ObjectProperty' || parent.type === 'ArrayPattern')
1228:   ) {
1229:     let i = parentStack.length
1230:     while (i--) {
1231:       const p = parentStack[i]
1232:       if (p.type === 'AssignmentExpression') {
1233:         return true
1234:       } else if (p.type !== 'ObjectProperty' && !p.type.endsWith('Pattern')) {
1235:         break
1236:       }
1237:     }
1238:   }
1239:   return false
1240: }
1241: 
1242: 
1243: function walkIdentifiers(
1244:   root,
1245:   onIdentifier,
1246:   includeAll = false,
1247:   parentStack = [],
1248:   knownIds = Object.create(null)
1249: ) {
1250:   if (__BROWSER__) {
1251:     return
1252:   }
1253: 
1254:   const rootExp =
1255:     root.type === 'Program' &&
1256:     root.body[0].type === 'ExpressionStatement' &&
1257:     root.body[0].expression
1258: 
1259:   walk(root, {
1260:     enter(node, parent) {
1261:       parent && parentStack.push(parent)
1262:       if (
1263:         parent &&
1264:         parent.type.startsWith('TS') &&
1265:         parent.type !== 'TSAsExpression' &&
1266:         parent.type !== 'TSNonNullExpression' &&
1267:         parent.type !== 'TSTypeAssertion'
1268:       ) {
1269:         return this.skip()
1270:       }
1271:       if (node.type === 'Identifier') {
1272:         const isLocal = !!knownIds[node.name]
1273:         const isRefed = isReferencedIdentifier(node, parent, parentStack)
1274:         if (includeAll || (isRefed && !isLocal)) {
1275:           onIdentifier(node, parent, parentStack, isRefed, isLocal)
1276:         }
1277:       } else if (
1278:         node.type === 'ObjectProperty' &&
1279:         parent.type === 'ObjectPattern'
1280:       ) {
1281:         // mark property in destructure pattern
1282:         node.inPattern = true
1283:       } else if (isFunctionType(node)) {
1284:         // walk function expressions and add its arguments to known identifiers
1285:         // so that we don't prefix them
1286:         walkFunctionParams(node, id => markScopeIdentifier(node, id, knownIds))
1287:       } else if (node.type === 'BlockStatement') {
1288:         // #3445 record block-level local variables
1289:         walkBlockDeclarations(node, id =>
1290:           markScopeIdentifier(node, id, knownIds)
1291:         )
1292:       }
1293:     },
1294:     leave(node, parent) {
1295:       parent && parentStack.pop()
1296:       if (node !== rootExp && node.scopeIds) {
1297:         for (const id of node.scopeIds) {
1298:           knownIds[id]--
1299:           if (knownIds[id] === 0) {
1300:             delete knownIds[id]
1301:           }
1302:         }
1303:       }
1304:     }
1305:   })
1306: }
1307: 
1308: function isReferencedIdentifier(
1309:   id,
1310:   parent,
1311:   parentStack
1312: ) {
1313:   if (__BROWSER__) {
1314:     return false
1315:   }
1316: 
1317:   if (!parent) {
1318:     return true
1319:   }
1320: 
1321:   // is a special keyword but parsed as identifier
1322:   if (id.name === 'arguments') {
1323:     return false
1324:   }
1325: 
1326:   if (isReferenced(id, parent)) {
1327:     return true
1328:   }
1329: 
1330:   // babel's isReferenced check returns false for ids being assigned to, so we
1331:   // need to cover those cases here
1332:   switch (parent.type) {
1333:     case 'AssignmentExpression':
1334:     case 'AssignmentPattern':
1335:       return true
1336:     case 'ObjectPattern':
1337:     case 'ArrayPattern':
1338:       return isInDestructureAssignment(parent, parentStack)
1339:   }
1340: 
1341:   return false
1342: }
1343: 
1344: function isInDestructureAssignment(
1345:   parent,
1346:   parentStack
1347: ) {
1348:   if (
1349:     parent &&
1350:     (parent.type === 'ObjectProperty' || parent.type === 'ArrayPattern')
1351:   ) {
1352:     let i = parentStack.length
1353:     while (i--) {
1354:       const p = parentStack[i]
1355:       if (p.type === 'AssignmentExpression') {
1356:         return true
1357:       } else if (p.type !== 'ObjectProperty' && !p.type.endsWith('Pattern')) {
1358:         break
1359:       }
1360:     }
1361:   }
1362:   return false
1363: }
1364: 
1365: function walkFunctionParams(
1366:   node,
1367:   onIdent
1368: ) {
1369:   for (const p of node.params) {
1370:     for (const id of extractIdentifiers(p)) {
1371:       onIdent(id)
1372:     }
1373:   }
1374: }
1375: 
1376: function walkBlockDeclarations(
1377:   block,
1378:   onIdent
1379: ) {
1380:   for (const stmt of block.body) {
1381:     if (stmt.type === 'VariableDeclaration') {
1382:       if (stmt.declare) continue
1383:       for (const decl of stmt.declarations) {
1384:         for (const id of extractIdentifiers(decl.id)) {
1385:           onIdent(id)
1386:         }
1387:       }
1388:     } else if (
1389:       stmt.type === 'FunctionDeclaration' ||
1390:       stmt.type === 'ClassDeclaration'
1391:     ) {
1392:       if (stmt.declare || !stmt.id) continue
1393:       onIdent(stmt.id)
1394:     }
1395:   }
1396: }
1397: 
1398: function extractIdentifiers(
1399:   param,
1400:   nodes = []
1401: ) {
1402:   switch (param.type) {
1403:     case 'Identifier':
1404:       nodes.push(param)
1405:       break
1406: 
1407:     case 'MemberExpression':
1408:       let object = param
1409:       while (object.type === 'MemberExpression') {
1410:         object = object.object
1411:       }
1412:       nodes.push(object)
1413:       break
1414: 
1415:     case 'ObjectPattern':
1416:       for (const prop of param.properties) {
1417:         if (prop.type === 'RestElement') {
1418:           extractIdentifiers(prop.argument, nodes)
1419:         } else {
1420:           extractIdentifiers(prop.value, nodes)
1421:         }
1422:       }
1423:       break
1424: 
1425:     case 'ArrayPattern':
1426:       param.elements.forEach(element => {
1427:         if (element) extractIdentifiers(element, nodes)
1428:       })
1429:       break
1430: 
1431:     case 'RestElement':
1432:       extractIdentifiers(param.argument, nodes)
1433:       break
1434: 
1435:     case 'AssignmentPattern':
1436:       extractIdentifiers(param.left, nodes)
1437:       break
1438:   }
1439: 
1440:   return nodes
1441: }
1442: 
1443: function markScopeIdentifier(
1444:   node,
1445:   child,
1446:   knownIds
1447: ) {
1448:   const { name } = child
1449:   if (node.scopeIds && node.scopeIds.has(name)) {
1450:     return
1451:   }
1452:   if (name in knownIds) {
1453:     knownIds[name]++
1454:   } else {
1455:     knownIds[name] = 1
1456:   }
1457:   ;(node.scopeIds || (node.scopeIds = new Set())).add(name)
1458: }
1459: 
1460: const isFunctionType = (node) => {
1461:   return /Function(?:Expression|Declaration)$|Method$/.test(node.type)
1462: }
1463: 
1464: const isStaticProperty = (node) =>
1465:   node &&
1466:   (node.type === 'ObjectProperty' || node.type === 'ObjectMethod') &&
1467:   !node.computed
1468: 
1469: const isStaticPropertyKey = (node, parent) => isStaticProperty(parent) && parent.key === node
1470: 
1471: /**
1472:  * Copied from https://github.com/babel/babel/blob/main/packages/babel-types/src/validators/isReferenced.ts
1473:  * To avoid runtime dependency on @babel/types (which includes process references)
1474:  * This file should not change very often in babel but we may need to keep it
1475:  * up-to-date from time to time.
1476:  *
1477:  * https://github.com/babel/babel/blob/main/LICENSE
1478:  *
1479:  */
1480: function isReferenced(node, parent, grandparent) {
1481:   switch (parent.type) {
1482:     // yes: PARENT[NODE]
1483:     // yes: NODE.child
1484:     // no: parent.NODE
1485:     case 'MemberExpression':
1486:     case 'OptionalMemberExpression':
1487:       if (parent.property === node) {
1488:         return !!parent.computed
1489:       }
1490:       return parent.object === node
1491: 
1492:     case 'JSXMemberExpression':
1493:       return parent.object === node
1494:     // no: let NODE = init;
1495:     // yes: let id = NODE;
1496:     case 'VariableDeclarator':
1497:       return parent.init === node
1498: 
1499:     // yes: () => NODE
1500:     // no: (NODE) => {}
1501:     case 'ArrowFunctionExpression':
1502:       return parent.body === node
1503: 
1504:     // no: class { #NODE; }
1505:     // no: class { get #NODE() {} }
1506:     // no: class { #NODE() {} }
1507:     // no: class { fn() { return this.#NODE; } }
1508:     case 'PrivateName':
1509:       return false
1510: 
1511:     // no: class { NODE() {} }
1512:     // yes: class { [NODE]() {} }
1513:     // no: class { foo(NODE) {} }
1514:     case 'ClassMethod':
1515:     case 'ClassPrivateMethod':
1516:     case 'ObjectMethod':
1517:       if (parent.key === node) {
1518:         return !!parent.computed
1519:       }
1520:       return false
1521: 
1522:     // yes: { [NODE]: "" }
1523:     // no: { NODE: "" }
1524:     // depends: { NODE }
1525:     // depends: { key: NODE }
1526:     case 'ObjectProperty':
1527:       if (parent.key === node) {
1528:         return !!parent.computed
1529:       }
1530:       // parent.value === node
1531:       return !grandparent || grandparent.type !== 'ObjectPattern'
1532:     // no: class { NODE = value; }
1533:     // yes: class { [NODE] = value; }
1534:     // yes: class { key = NODE; }
1535:     case 'ClassProperty':
1536:       if (parent.key === node) {
1537:         return !!parent.computed
1538:       }
1539:       return true
1540:     case 'ClassPrivateProperty':
1541:       return parent.key !== node
1542: 
1543:     // no: class NODE {}
1544:     // yes: class Foo extends NODE {}
1545:     case 'ClassDeclaration':
1546:     case 'ClassExpression':
1547:       return parent.superClass === node
1548: 
1549:     // yes: left = NODE;
1550:     // no: NODE = right;
1551:     case 'AssignmentExpression':
1552:       return parent.right === node
1553: 
1554:     // no: [NODE = foo] = [];
1555:     // yes: [foo = NODE] = [];
1556:     case 'AssignmentPattern':
1557:       return parent.right === node
1558: 
1559:     // no: NODE: for (;;) {}
1560:     case 'LabeledStatement':
1561:       return false
1562: 
1563:     // no: try {} catch (NODE) {}
1564:     case 'CatchClause':
1565:       return false
1566: 
1567:     // no: function foo(...NODE) {}
1568:     case 'RestElement':
1569:       return false
1570: 
1571:     case 'BreakStatement':
1572:     case 'ContinueStatement':
1573:       return false
1574: 
1575:     // no: function NODE() {}
1576:     // no: function foo(NODE) {}
1577:     case 'FunctionDeclaration':
1578:     case 'FunctionExpression':
1579:       return false
1580: 
1581:     // no: export NODE from "foo";
1582:     // no: export * as NODE from "foo";
1583:     case 'ExportNamespaceSpecifier':
1584:     case 'ExportDefaultSpecifier':
1585:       return false
1586: 
1587:     // no: export { foo as NODE };
1588:     // yes: export { NODE as foo };
1589:     // no: export { NODE as foo } from "foo";
1590:     case 'ExportSpecifier':
1591:       // @ts-expect-error
1592:       if (grandparent?.source) {
1593:         return false
1594:       }
1595:       return parent.local === node
1596: 
1597:     // no: import NODE from "foo";
1598:     // no: import * as NODE from "foo";
1599:     // no: import { NODE as foo } from "foo";
1600:     // no: import { foo as NODE } from "foo";
1601:     // no: import NODE from "bar";
1602:     case 'ImportDefaultSpecifier':
1603:     case 'ImportNamespaceSpecifier':
1604:     case 'ImportSpecifier':
1605:       return false
1606: 
1607:     // no: import "foo" assert { NODE: "json" }
1608:     case 'ImportAttribute':
1609:       return false
1610: 
1611:     // no: <div NODE="foo" />
1612:     case 'JSXAttribute':
1613:       return false
1614: 
1615:     // no: [NODE] = [];
1616:     // no: ({ NODE }) = [];
1617:     case 'ObjectPattern':
1618:     case 'ArrayPattern':
1619:       return false
1620: 
1621:     // no: new.NODE
1622:     // no: NODE.target
1623:     case 'MetaProperty':
1624:       return false
1625: 
1626:     // yes: type X = { someProperty: NODE }
1627:     // no: type X = { NODE: OtherType }
1628:     case 'ObjectTypeProperty':
1629:       return parent.key !== node
1630: 
1631:     // yes: enum X { Foo = NODE }
1632:     // no: enum X { NODE }
1633:     case 'TSEnumMember':
1634:       return parent.id !== node
1635: 
1636:     // yes: { [NODE]: value }
1637:     // no: { NODE: value }
1638:     case 'TSPropertySignature':
1639:       if (parent.key === node) {
1640:         return !!parent.computed
1641:       }
1642: 
1643:       return true
1644:   }
1645: 
1646:   return true
1647: }
1648: 
1649: 
1650: const validFirstIdentCharRE = /[A-Za-z_$\xA0-\uFFFF]/
1651: const validIdentCharRE = /[\.\?\w$\xA0-\uFFFF]/
1652: const whitespaceRE = /\s+[.[]\s*|\s*[.[]\s+/g
1653: 
1654: const MemberExpLexState = {
1655:   inMemberExp: 0,
1656:   inBrackets: 1,
1657:   inParens: 2,
1658:   inString: 3
1659: }
1660: 
1661: const isMemberExpressionBrowser = path => {
1662:   // remove whitespaces around . or [ first
1663:   path = path.trim().replace(whitespaceRE, s => s.trim())
1664: 
1665:   let state = MemberExpLexState.inMemberExp
1666:   let stateStack = []
1667:   let currentOpenBracketCount = 0
1668:   let currentOpenParensCount = 0
1669:   let currentStringType = null
1670: 
1671:   for (let i = 0; i < path.length; i++) {
1672:     const char = path.charAt(i)
1673:     switch (state) {
1674:       case MemberExpLexState.inMemberExp:
1675:         if (char === '[') {
1676:           stateStack.push(state)
1677:           state = MemberExpLexState.inBrackets
1678:           currentOpenBracketCount++
1679:         } else if (char === '(') {
1680:           stateStack.push(state)
1681:           state = MemberExpLexState.inParens
1682:           currentOpenParensCount++
1683:         } else if (
1684:           !(i === 0 ? validFirstIdentCharRE : validIdentCharRE).test(char)
1685:         ) {
1686:           return false
1687:         }
1688:         break
1689:       case MemberExpLexState.inBrackets:
1690:         if (char === `'` || char === `"` || char === '`') {
1691:           stateStack.push(state)
1692:           state = MemberExpLexState.inString
1693:           currentStringType = char
1694:         } else if (char === `[`) {
1695:           currentOpenBracketCount++
1696:         } else if (char === `]`) {
1697:           if (!--currentOpenBracketCount) {
1698:             state = stateStack.pop()
1699:           }
1700:         }
1701:         break
1702:       case MemberExpLexState.inParens:
1703:         if (char === `'` || char === `"` || char === '`') {
1704:           stateStack.push(state)
1705:           state = MemberExpLexState.inString
1706:           currentStringType = char
1707:         } else if (char === `(`) {
1708:           currentOpenParensCount++
1709:         } else if (char === `)`) {
1710:           // if the exp ends as a call then it should not be considered valid
1711:           if (i === path.length - 1) {
1712:             return false
1713:           }
1714:           if (!--currentOpenParensCount) {
1715:             state = stateStack.pop()
1716:           }
1717:         }
1718:         break
1719:       case MemberExpLexState.inString:
1720:         if (char === currentStringType) {
1721:           state = stateStack.pop()
1722:           currentStringType = null
1723:         }
1724:         break
1725:     }
1726:   }
1727:   return !currentOpenBracketCount && !currentOpenParensCount
1728: }
1729: 
1730: const isMemberExpressionNode = __BROWSER__
1731:   ? NOOP
1732:   : (path, context) => {
1733:       try {
1734:         let ret = babelParser.parseExpression(path, {
1735:           plugins: context.expressionPlugins
1736:         })
1737:         if (ret.type === 'TSAsExpression' || ret.type === 'TSTypeAssertion') {
1738:           ret = ret.expression
1739:         }
1740:         return (
1741:           ret.type === 'MemberExpression' ||
1742:           ret.type === 'OptionalMemberExpression' ||
1743:           ret.type === 'Identifier'
1744:         )
1745:       } catch (e) {
1746:         return false
1747:       }
1748:     }
1749: 
1750: const isMemberExpression = __BROWSER__
1751:   ? isMemberExpressionBrowser
1752:   : isMemberExpressionNode
1753: 
1754: // Check if a node contains expressions that reference current context scope ids
1755: function hasScopeRef(node, ids) {
1756:   if (!node || Object.keys(ids).length === 0) {
1757:     return false
1758:   }
1759:   switch (node.type) {
1760:     case NodeTypes.ELEMENT:
1761:       for (let i = 0; i < node.props.length; i++) {
1762:         const p = node.props[i]
1763:         if (
1764:           p.type === NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE &&
1765:           (hasScopeRef(p.arg, ids) || hasScopeRef(p.exp, ids))
1766:         ) {
1767:           return true
1768:         }
1769:       }
1770:       return node.children.some(c => hasScopeRef(c, ids))
1771:     case NodeTypes.FOR:
1772:       if (hasScopeRef(node.source, ids)) {
1773:         return true
1774:       }
1775:       return node.children.some(c => hasScopeRef(c, ids))
1776:     case NodeTypes.IF:
1777:       return node.branches.some(b => hasScopeRef(b, ids))
1778:     case NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH:
1779:       if (hasScopeRef(node.condition, ids)) {
1780:         return true
1781:       }
1782:       return node.children.some(c => hasScopeRef(c, ids))
1783:     case NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION:
1784:       return (
1785:         !node.isStatic &&
1786:         isSimpleIdentifier(node.content) &&
1787:         !!ids[node.content]
1788:       )
1789:     case NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION:
1790:       return node.children.some(c => isObject(c) && hasScopeRef(c, ids))
1791:     case NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION:
1792:     case NodeTypes.TEXT_CALL:
1793:       return hasScopeRef(node.content, ids)
1794:     case NodeTypes.TEXT:
1795:     case NodeTypes.COMMENT:
1796:       return false
1797:     default:
1798:       if (__DEV__) {
1799:         const exhaustiveCheck = node
1800:         exhaustiveCheck
1801:       }
1802:       return false
1803:   }
1804: }
1805: 
1806: const SlotFlags = {
1807:   /**
1808:    * Stable slots that only reference slot props or context state. The slot
1809:    * can fully capture its own dependencies so when passed down the parent won't
1810:    * need to force the child to update.
1811:    */
1812:   STABLE: 1,
1813:   /**
1814:    * Slots that reference scope variables (v-for or an outer slot prop), or
1815:    * has conditional structure (v-if, v-for). The parent will need to force
1816:    * the child to update because the slot does not fully capture its dependencies.
1817:    */
1818:   DYNAMIC: 2,
1819:   /**
1820:    * `<slot/>` being forwarded into a child component. Whether the parent needs
1821:    * to update the child is dependent on what kind of slots the parent itself
1822:    * received. This has to be refined at runtime, when the child's vnode
1823:    * is being created (in `normalizeChildren`)
1824:    */
1825:   FORWARDED: 3
1826: }
1827: 
1828: /**
1829:  * Dev only
1830:  */
1831: const slotFlagsText = {
1832:   [SlotFlags.STABLE]: 'STABLE',
1833:   [SlotFlags.DYNAMIC]: 'DYNAMIC',
1834:   [SlotFlags.FORWARDED]: 'FORWARDED'
1835: }
1836: 
1837: 
1838: function createElementWithCodegen(
1839:   tag,
1840:   props,
1841:   children,
1842:   patchFlag,
1843:   dynamicProps
1844: ) {
1845:   return {
1846:     type: NodeTypes.ELEMENT,
1847:     loc: locStub,
1848:     ns: Namespaces.HTML,
1849:     tag: 'div',
1850:     tagType: ElementTypes.ELEMENT,
1851:     isSelfClosing: false,
1852:     props: [],
1853:     children: [],
1854:     codegenNode: {
1855:       type: NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL,
1856:       tag,
1857:       props,
1858:       children,
1859:       patchFlag,
1860:       dynamicProps,
1861:       directives: undefined,
1862:       isBlock: false,
1863:       disableTracking: false,
1864:       isComponent: false,
1865:       loc: locStub
1866:     }
1867:   }
1868: }
1869: 
1870: function createParserContext(content, rawOptions) {
1871:   const options = extend({}, defaultParserOptions)
1872: 
1873:   let key
1874:   for (key in rawOptions) {
1875:     // @ts-ignore
1876:     options[key] =
1877:       rawOptions[key] === undefined
1878:         ? defaultParserOptions[key]
1879:         : rawOptions[key]
1880:   }
1881:   return {
1882:     options,
1883:     column: 1,
1884:     line: 1,
1885:     offset: 0,
1886:     originalSource: content,
1887:     source: content,
1888:     inPre: false,
1889:     inVPre: false,
1890:     onWarn: options.onWarn
1891:   }
1892: }
1893: function createRoot(children, loc = locStub) {
1894:   return {
1895:     type: NodeTypes.ROOT,
1896:     children,
1897:     helpers: [],
1898:     components: [],
1899:     directives: [],
1900:     hoists: [],
1901:     imports: [],
1902:     cached: 0,
1903:     temps: 0,
1904:     codegenNode: undefined,
1905:     loc
1906:   }
1907: }
1908: function parseChildren(context, mode, ancestors) {
1909:   const parent = last(ancestors)
1910:   const ns = parent ? parent.ns : Namespaces.HTML
1911:   const nodes = [] // -> ancestors
1912: 
1913:   // 1. while -> isEnd ? 游标不断往前走直接所以 source 都解析完成
1914:   while (!isEnd(context, mode, ancestors)) {
1915:     const s = context.source
1916:     let node = undefined
1917: 
1918:     if (mode === TextModes.DATA || mode === TextModes.RCDATA) {
1919:       if (!context.inVPre && startsWith(s, context.options.delimiters[0])) {
1920:         // '{{' 插值开始
1921:         node = parseInterpolation(context, mode)
1922:       } else if (mode === TextModes.DATA && s[0] === '<') {
1923:         if (s[1] === '/') {
1924:           // 结束标签
1925:           if (/[a-z]/i.test(s[2])) {
1926:             // 异常结束，如：`<div>some text<a`
1927:             emitError(context, 'X_INVALID_END_TAG')
1928:             parseTag(context, TagType.End, parent)
1929:             continue
1930:           }
1931:         } else if (/[a-z]/i.test(s[1])) {
1932:           // 正常的开始标签
1933:           node = parseElement(context, ancestors)
1934:           // 2.x <template> 无指令兼容，这里就不实现了，重点关注 3.x 的代码
1935:         }
1936:       }
1937:     }
1938:     // 以上都不是，说明应该是纯文本节点
1939:     if (!node) {
1940:       node = parseText(context, mode)
1941:     }
1942: 
1943:     // 用 pushNode 在其中合并相邻的文本节点
1944:     if (isArray(node)) {
1945:       for (let i = 0; i < node.length; i++) {
1946:         pushNode(nodes, node[i])
1947:       }
1948:     } else {
1949:       pushNode(nodes, node)
1950:     }
1951:   }
1952: 
1953:   // 2. 合并相邻文本节点，空格处理，会将多个空格合并成一个空格
1954:   let removedWhitespace = false
1955:   if (mode !== TextModes.RAWTEXT && mode !== TextModes.RCDATA) {
1956:     removedWhitespace = _removeWhitespace(nodes, context)
1957:   }
1958: 
1959:   // 3. 最后返回解析后的节点树
1960:   return removedWhitespace ? nodes.filter(Boolean) : nodes
1961: }
1962: 
1963: function _removeWhitespace(nodes, context) {
1964:   let removedWhitespace = false
1965:   // 可以通过选项来指定是不是保留空格，否则多余的会合并成一个
1966:   const shouldCondense = context.options.whitespace !== 'preserve'
1967:   for (let i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {
1968:     const node = nodes[i]
1969:     if (!context.inPre && node.type === NodeTypes.TEXT) {
1970:       if (!/[^\t\r\n\f]/.test(node.content)) {
1971:         const prev = nodes[i - 1]
1972:         const next = nodes[i + 1]
1973: 
1974:         if (
1975:           !prev ||
1976:             !next ||
1977:             (shouldCondense && (
1978:               prev.type === NodeTypes.COMMENT || next.type === NodeTypes.COMMENT || (
1979:                 prev.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT && next.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT && /[\r\n]/.test(node.content)
1980:               )
1981:             ))
1982:         ) {
1983:           removedWhitespace = true
1984:           nodes[i] = null
1985:         } else {
1986:           // 合并成一个
1987:           node.content = ' '
1988:         }
1989:       } else if (shouldCondense) {
1990:         // 保留空格
1991:         node.content = node.content.replace(/[\t\r\n\f]+/g, ' ')
1992:       }
1993:     } else if (node.type === NodeTypes.COMMENT && !context.options.comments) {
1994:       // 可以通过配置删除注释节点
1995:       removedWhitespace = true
1996:       nodes[i] = null
1997:     }
1998:   }
1999: 
2000:   if (context.inPre && parent && context.options.isPreTag(parent.tag)) {
2001:     // 删除 <pre> 中的第一行的空行
2002:     const first = nodes[0]
2003:     if (first && first.type === NodeTypes.TEXT) {
2004:       first.content = first.content.replace(/^\r?\n/, '')
2005:     }
2006:   }
2007: 
2008:   return removedWhitespace
2009: }
2010: function parseElement(context, ancestors) {
2011:   const parent = last(ancestors)
2012:   // 1. 解析出开始标签
2013:   const element = parseTag(context, TagType.Start, parent)
2014: 
2015:   // 自闭合的标签： <div/>
2016:   if (element.isSelfClosing || context.options.isVoidTag(element.tag)) {
2017:     return element
2018:   }
2019: 
2020:   // children
2021:   ancestors.push(element)
2022: 
2023:   const mode = context.options.getTextMode(element, parent)
2024:   // 递归解析子节点
2025:   const children = parseChildren(context, mode, ancestors)
2026:   // 解析完出栈 [root, parent1, parent2, ...] 代表层级
2027:   // <root><parent1><parent2></parent><parent1></root> -> 解析过程中通过
2028:   // ancestors 来维护这个层级关系
2029:   ancestors.pop()
2030: 
2031:   element.children = children
2032: 
2033:   // 2. 解析结束标签
2034:   if (startsWithEndTagOpen(context.source, element.tag)) {
2035:     parseTag(context, TagType.End, parent)
2036:   }
2037: 
2038:   // 更新解析后节点在源码中的位置信息
2039:   element.loc = getSelection(context, element.loc.start)
2040: 
2041:   return element
2042: }
2043: function parseTag(context, type, parent) {
2044:   // 1. 开始标签
2045:   const start = getCursor(context)
2046:   // 合法标签的正则匹配
2047:   const match = /^<\/?([a-z][^\t\r\n\f />]*)/i.exec(context.source)
2048:   const tag = match[1]
2049:   const ns = context.options.getNamespace(tag, parent)
2050: 
2051:   // 游标前进标签名长度的位置，如： <div id="foo"> -> ` id="foo">`
2052:   advanceBy(context, match[0].length)
2053:   // 空格处理
2054:   advanceSpaces(context)
2055: 
2056:   // parse attributes
2057:   let props = parseAttributes(context, type)
2058: 
2059:   // TODO v-pre 检测
2060: 
2061:   // 2. 闭合标签
2062:   let isSelfClosing = false
2063:   if (context.source.length === 0) {
2064:     // 非法情况, ignore
2065:   } else {
2066:     isSelfClosing = startsWith(context.source, '/>')
2067:     advanceBy(context, isSelfClosing ? 2 : 1)
2068:   }
2069: 
2070:   if (type === TagType.End) {
2071:     return
2072:   }
2073: 
2074:   // 3. 分析出标签的类型
2075:   let tagType = ElementTypes.ELEMENT
2076:   if (!context.inVPre) {
2077:     if (tag === 'slot') {
2078:       tagType = ElementTypes.SLOT
2079:     } else if (tag === 'template') {
2080:       if (props.some(p => p.type === NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE && isSpecialTemplateDirective(p.name))) {
2081:         tagType = ElementTypes.TEMPLATE
2082:       }
2083:     } else if (isComponent(tag, props, context)) {
2084:       tagType = ElementTypes.COMPONENT
2085:     }
2086:   }
2087: 
2088:   return {
2089:     type: NodeTypes.ELEMENT,
2090:     ns,
2091:     tag,
2092:     tagType,
2093:     props,
2094:     isSelfClosing,
2095:     children: [],
2096:     loc: getSelection(context, start),
2097:     codegenNode: undefined // 在 transform 阶段生成的产物
2098:   }
2099: }
2100: function parseText(context, mode) {
2101:   const endTokens = mode === TextModes.CDATA ? [']]>'] : ['<', context.options.delimiters[0]]
2102: 
2103:   let endIndex = context.source.length
2104:   for (let i = 0; i < endTokens.length; i++) {
2105:     const index = context.source.indexOf(endTokens[i], 1)
2106:     if (index !== -1 && endIndex > index) {
2107:       endIndex = index
2108:     }
2109:   }
2110: 
2111:   const start = getCursor(context)
2112:   const content = parseTextData(context, endIndex, mode)
2113: 
2114:   return {
2115:     type: NodeTypes.TEXT,
2116:     content,
2117:     loc: getSelection(context, start)
2118:   }
2119: }
2120: function parseTextData(context, length, mode) {
2121:   const rawText = context.source.slice(0, length)
2122:   advanceBy(context, length)
2123: 
2124:   // 不含HTML entities
2125:   if (mode === TextModes.RAWTEXT || mode === TextModes.CDATA || !rawText.includes('&')) {
2126:     return rawText
2127:   } else {
2128:     // 将 &gt; -> `>`, &lt; -> `<`, &amp; -> `&`, &apos; -> `'`, &quot; -> `"`
2129:     return context.options.decodeEntities(rawText, mode === TextModes.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE)
2130:   }
2131: }
2132: function parseInterpolation(context, mode) {
2133:   const [open, close] = context.options.delimiters
2134: 
2135:   // 如： source = "{{ a + b }}"
2136:   // closeIndex = indexOf("}}", "{{".length) = 9
2137:   const closeIndex = context.source.indexOf(close, open.length)
2138:   if (closeIndex === -1) {
2139:     emitError(context, 'X_MISSING_INTERPOLATION_END')
2140:     return undefined
2141:   }
2142: 
2143:   const start = getCursor(context)
2144:   // >> 2 -> " a + b }}"
2145:   advanceBy(context, open.length)
2146: 
2147:   // { line, column, offset }
2148:   const innerStart = getCursor(context)
2149:   const innerEnd = getCursor(context)
2150:   // 9 - '{{'.length = 7
2151:   const rawContentLength = closeIndex - open.length
2152:   // " a + b }}".slice(0, 7) => " a + b "
2153:   const rawContent = context.source.slice(0, rawContentLength)
2154:   const preTrimContent = parseTextData(context, rawContentLength, mode)
2155:   // " a + b " => "a + b"
2156:   const content = preTrimContent.trim()
2157:   const startOffset = preTrimContent.indexOf(content)
2158:   if (startOffset > 0) {
2159:     // 处理换行问题
2160:     advancePositionWithMutation(innerStart, rawContent, startOffset)
2161:   }
2162:   const endOffset = rawContentLength - (preTrimContent.length - content.length - startOffset)
2163:   advancePositionWithMutation(innerEnd, rawContent, endOffset)
2164:   advanceBy(context, close.length)
2165: 
2166:   return {
2167:     type: NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION,
2168:     content: {
2169:       type: NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION,
2170:       isStatic: false,
2171:       // Set `isConstant` to false by default and will decide in transformExpression
2172:       constType: ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT,
2173:       content,
2174:       loc: getSelection(context, innerStart, innerEnd)
2175:     },
2176:     loc: getSelection(context, start)
2177:   }
2178: }
2179: function parseAttributes(context, type) {
2180:   const props = []
2181:   // 用 set 避免重复属性
2182:   const attributeNames = new Set()
2183:   while (
2184:     context.source.length > 0 &&
2185:       !startsWith(context.source, '>') &&
2186:       !startsWith(context.source, '/>')
2187:   ) {
2188: 
2189:     // 一些非法检测, ignore
2190: 
2191:     const attr = parseAttribute(context, attributeNames)
2192: 
2193:     logg('ATTR', attr)
2194:     // 去掉 class 之间多余的空格，如： `foo   bar  ` -> `foo bar`
2195:     if (attr.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE &&
2196:        attr.value && attr.name === 'class') {
2197:       attr.value.content = attr.value.content.replace(/\s+/g, ' ').trim()
2198:     }
2199: 
2200:     if (type === TagType.Start) {
2201:       props.push(attr)
2202:     }
2203: 
2204:     advanceSpaces(context)
2205:   }
2206: 
2207:   return props
2208: }
2209: function parseAttribute(context, nameSet) {
2210:   const start = getCursor(context)
2211:   const match = /^[^\t\r\n\f />][^\t\r\n\f />=]*/.exec(context.source)
2212:   const name = match[0]
2213: 
2214:   nameSet.add(name)
2215: 
2216:   advanceBy(context, name.length)
2217: 
2218:   let value = undefined
2219: 
2220:   if (/^[\t\r\n\f ]*=/.test(context.source)) {
2221:     advanceSpaces(context)
2222:     advanceBy(context, 1)
2223:     advanceSpaces(context)
2224:     value = parseAttributeValue(context)
2225:   }
2226: 
2227:   const loc = getSelection(context, start)
2228: 
2229:   // v-on(@), v-bind(:), v-if, v-else, v-slot(#) 指令
2230:   if (!context.inVPre && /^(v-[A-Za-z0-9-]|:|\.|@|#)/.test(name)) {
2231:     const match = /(?:^v-([a-z0-9-]+))?(?:(?::|^\.|^@|^#)(\[[^\]]+\]|[^\.]+))?(.+)?$/i.exec(name)
2232: 
2233:     log(`parseAttribute| match=${match}`)
2234:     let isPropShorthand = startsWith(name, '.')
2235:     let dirName =
2236:         match[1] ||
2237:         (isPropShorthand || startsWith(name, ':')
2238:          ? 'bind'
2239:          : startsWith(name, '@')
2240:         ? 'on'
2241:         : 'slot')
2242:     let arg
2243: 
2244:     if (match[2]) {
2245:       const isSlot = dirName === 'slot'
2246:       const startOffset = name.lastIndexOf(match[2])
2247:       const loc = getSelection(
2248:         context,
2249:         getNewPosition(context, start, startOffset),
2250:         getNewPosition(
2251:           context,
2252:           start,
2253:           startOffset + match[2].length + ((isSlot && match[3]) || '').length
2254:         )
2255:       )
2256: 
2257:       let content = match[2]
2258:       let isStatic = true
2259: 
2260:       if (content.startsWith('[')) {
2261:         isStatic = false
2262: 
2263:         content = content.slice(1, content.length - 1)
2264:       } else if (isSlot){
2265:         content += match[3] || ''
2266:       }
2267: 
2268:       arg = {
2269:         type: NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION,
2270:         content,
2271:         isStatic,
2272:         constType: isStatic
2273:           ? ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
2274:           : ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT,
2275:         loc
2276:       }
2277:     }
2278: 
2279:     // quoted: `foo="bar"`, not quoted: `foo=bar`
2280:     if (value && value.isQuoted) {
2281:       const valueLoc = value.loc
2282:       valueLoc.start.offset++
2283:       valueLoc.start.column++
2284:       valueLoc.end = advancePositionWithClone(valueLoc.start, value.content)
2285:       valueLoc.source = valueLoc.source.slice(1, -1)
2286:     }
2287: 
2288:     // 修饰符 v-bind.number="foo" => '.number' => ['number']
2289:     const modifiers = match[3] ? match[3].slice(1).split('.') : []
2290:     // `<div foo.prop="bar">` 如果不加 `.prop` 这个会被解析到 `$attrs` 中
2291:     // 如果加了 `.prop` 则会被解析到 `$props` 中去
2292:     if (isPropShorthand) {
2293:       modifiers.push('prop')
2294:     }
2295: 
2296:     return {
2297:       type: NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE,
2298:       name: dirName,
2299:       exp: value && {
2300:         type: NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION,
2301:         content: value.content,
2302:         isStatic: false,
2303:         // Treat as non-constant by default. This can be potentially set to
2304:         // other values by `transformExpression` to make it eligible for hoisting.
2305:         constType: ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT,
2306:         loc: value.loc
2307:       },
2308:       arg,
2309:       modifiers,
2310:       loc
2311:     }
2312:   }
2313: 
2314:   return {
2315:     type: NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE,
2316:     name,
2317:     value: value && {
2318:       type: NodeTypes.TEXT,
2319:       content: value.content,
2320:       loc: value.loc
2321:     },
2322:     loc
2323:   }
2324: }
2325: function parseAttributeValue(context) {
2326:   const start = getCursor(context)
2327:   let content
2328: 
2329:   const quote = context.source[0]
2330:   // value 分两种情况，可以用引号包起来也可以不使用引号
2331:   // `<div foo="value">` 或 `<div foo=value>`
2332:   const isQuoted = quote === `"` || quote === `'`
2333:   if (isQuoted) {
2334:     // Quoted value.
2335:     advanceBy(context, 1)
2336: 
2337:     const endIndex = context.source.indexOf(quote)
2338:     if (endIndex === -1) {
2339:       content = parseTextData(
2340:         context,
2341:         context.source.length,
2342:         TextModes.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
2343:       )
2344:     } else {
2345:       content = parseTextData(context, endIndex, TextModes.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE)
2346:       advanceBy(context, 1)
2347:     }
2348:   } else {
2349:     // Unquoted
2350:     const match = /^[^\t\r\n\f >]+/.exec(context.source)
2351:     if (!match) {
2352:       return undefined
2353:     }
2354:     content = parseTextData(context, match[0].length, TextModes.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE)
2355:   }
2356: 
2357:   return { content, isQuoted, loc: getSelection(context, start) }
2358: }
2359: 
2360: function baseParse(content, options = {}) {
2361:   const context = createParserContext(content, options)
2362:   const start = getCursor(context)
2363:   return createRoot(
2364:     parseChildren(context, TextModes.DATA, []),
2365:     getSelection(context, start)
2366:   )
2367: }
2368: function createTransformContext(
2369:   root,
2370:   {
2371:     filename = '',
2372:     prefixIdentifiers = false,
2373:     hoistStatic = false,
2374:     cacheHandlers = false,
2375:     nodeTransforms = [],
2376:     directiveTransforms = {},
2377:     transformHoist = null,
2378:     isBuiltInComponent = NOOP,
2379:     isCustomElement = NOOP,
2380:     expressionPlugins = [],
2381:     scopeId = null,
2382:     slotted = true,
2383:     ssr = false,
2384:     inSSR = false,
2385:     ssrCssVars = ``,
2386:     bindingMetadata = EMPTY_OBJ,
2387:     inline = false,
2388:     isTS = false,
2389:     onError = defaultOnError,
2390:     onWarn = defaultOnWarn,
2391:     compatConfig
2392:   }
2393: ) {
2394:   const nameMatch = filename.replace(/\?.*$/, '').match(/([^/\\]+)\.\w+$/)
2395:   const context = {
2396:     // options
2397:     selfName: nameMatch && capitalize(camelize(nameMatch[1])),
2398:     prefixIdentifiers,
2399:     hoistStatic,
2400:     cacheHandlers,
2401:     nodeTransforms,
2402:     directiveTransforms,
2403:     transformHoist,
2404:     isBuiltInComponent,
2405:     isCustomElement,
2406:     expressionPlugins,
2407:     scopeId,
2408:     slotted,
2409:     ssr,
2410:     inSSR,
2411:     ssrCssVars,
2412:     bindingMetadata,
2413:     inline,
2414:     isTS,
2415:     onError,
2416:     onWarn,
2417:     compatConfig,
2418: 
2419:     // state
2420:     root,
2421:     helpers: new Map(),
2422:     components: new Set(),
2423:     directives: new Set(),
2424:     hoists: [],
2425:     imports: [],
2426:     constantCache: new Map(),
2427:     temps: 0,
2428:     cached: 0,
2429:     identifiers: Object.create(null),
2430:     scopes: { // 记录下面四个指令的嵌套层次
2431:       vFor: 0,
2432:       vSlot: 0,
2433:       vPre: 0,
2434:       vOnce: 0
2435:     },
2436:     parent: null,
2437:     currentNode: root,
2438:     childIndex: 0,
2439:     inVOnce: false,
2440: 
2441:     // methods
2442:     helper(name) {
2443:       const count = context.helpers.get(name) || 0
2444:       context.helpers.set(name, count + 1)
2445:       return name
2446:     },
2447:     removeHelper(name) {
2448:       const count = context.helpers.get(name)
2449:       if (count) {
2450:         const currentCount = count - 1
2451:         if (!currentCount) {
2452:           context.helpers.delete(name)
2453:         } else {
2454:           context.helpers.set(name, currentCount)
2455:         }
2456:       }
2457:     },
2458:     helperString(name) {
2459:       return `_${helperNameMap[context.helper(name)]}`
2460:     },
2461:     replaceNode(node) {
2462:       context.parent.children[context.childIndex] = context.currentNode = node
2463:     },
2464:     removeNode(node) {
2465:       const list = context.parent.children
2466:       const removalIndex = node
2467:         ? list.indexOf(node)
2468:         : context.currentNode
2469:         ? context.childIndex
2470:         : -1
2471: 
2472:       if (!node || node === context.currentNode) {
2473:         // current node removed
2474:         context.currentNode = null
2475:         context.onNodeRemoved()
2476:       } else {
2477:         // sibling node removed
2478:         if (context.childIndex > removalIndex) {
2479:           context.childIndex--
2480:           context.onNodeRemoved()
2481:         }
2482:       }
2483:       context.parent.children.splice(removalIndex, 1)
2484:     },
2485:     onNodeRemoved: () => {},
2486:     addIdentifiers(exp) {
2487:       // identifier tracking only happens in non-browser builds.
2488:       if (!__BROWSER__) {
2489:         if (isString(exp)) {
2490:           addId(exp)
2491:         } else if (exp.identifiers) {
2492:           exp.identifiers.forEach(addId)
2493:         } else if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
2494:           addId(exp.content)
2495:         }
2496:       }
2497:     },
2498:     removeIdentifiers(exp) {
2499:       if (!__BROWSER__) {
2500:         if (isString(exp)) {
2501:           removeId(exp)
2502:         } else if (exp.identifiers) {
2503:           exp.identifiers.forEach(removeId)
2504:         } else if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
2505:           removeId(exp.content)
2506:         }
2507:       }
2508:     },
2509:     hoist(exp) {
2510:       if (isString(exp)) exp = createSimpleExpression(exp)
2511:       context.hoists.push(exp)
2512:       const identifier = createSimpleExpression(
2513:         `_hoisted_${context.hoists.length}`,
2514:         false,
2515:         exp.loc,
2516:         ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
2517:       )
2518:       identifier.hoisted = exp
2519:       return identifier
2520:     },
2521:     cache(exp, isVNode = false) {
2522:       return createCacheExpression(context.cached++, exp, isVNode)
2523:     }
2524:   }
2525: 
2526:   function addId(id) {
2527:     const { identifiers } = context
2528:     if (identifiers[id] === undefined) {
2529:       identifiers[id] = 0
2530:     }
2531:     identifiers[id]++
2532:   }
2533: 
2534:   function removeId(id) {
2535:     context.identifiers[id]--
2536:   }
2537: 
2538:   return context
2539: }
2540: function traverseNode(node, context) {
2541:   // 记录当前正在处理的节点
2542:   context.currentNode = node
2543:   // 对节点转换时使用到的插件(外部可通过这个来修改某个指令)
2544:   const { nodeTransforms } = context
2545:   // 递归遍历结束，回溯时调用的函数列表
2546:   // 也就是这个函数最后执行的函数，当一颗树遍历完成执行的函数
2547:   // 随后的 for 循环是用来收集这些函数的
2548:   const exitFns = []
2549: 
2550:   logg('traverseNode', node)
2551:   for (let i = 0; i < nodeTransforms.length; i++) {
2552:     const onExit = nodeTransforms[i](node, context)
2553:     if (onExit) {
2554:       if (isArray(onExit)) {
2555:         exitFns.push(...onExit)
2556:       } else {
2557:         exitFns.push(onExit)
2558:       }
2559:     }
2560:     if (!context.currentNode) {
2561:       // node was removed
2562:       return
2563:     } else {
2564:       // node may have been replaced
2565:       node = context.currentNode
2566:     }
2567:   }
2568: 
2569:   // 根据节点类型来分别处理，这里忽略注释
2570:   switch (node.type) {
2571:     case NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION:
2572:       // no need to traverse, but we need to inject toString helper
2573:       if (!context.ssr) {
2574:         context.helper(TO_DISPLAY_STRING)
2575:       }
2576:       break
2577: 
2578:     // for container types, further traverse downwards
2579:     // 处理 if...else if...else 分支
2580:     case NodeTypes.IF:
2581:       for (let i = 0; i < node.branches.length; i++) {
2582:         traverseNode(node.branches[i], context)
2583:       }
2584:       break
2585:     case NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH: // else..if
2586:     case NodeTypes.FOR: // for
2587:     case NodeTypes.ELEMENT:
2588:     case NodeTypes.ROOT:
2589:       traverseChildren(node, context)
2590:       break
2591:   }
2592: 
2593:   // 收集完成，执行这些收集到的函数，作用到当前节点上
2594:   context.currentNode = node
2595:   let i = exitFns.length
2596:   while (i--) {
2597:     exitFns[i]()
2598:   }
2599: }
2600: 
2601: function traverseChildren(parent, context) {
2602:   let i = 0
2603:   const nodeRemoved = () => {
2604:     i--
2605:   }
2606:   for (; i < parent.children.length; i++) {
2607:     const child = parent.children[i]
2608:     if (isString(child)) continue
2609:     context.parent = parent
2610:     context.childIndex = i
2611:     context.onNodeRemoved = nodeRemoved
2612:     traverseNode(child, context)
2613:   }
2614: }
2615: function hoistStatic(root, context) {
2616:   _walk(
2617:     root,
2618:     context,
2619:     // Root node is unfortunately non-hoistable due to potential parent
2620:     // fallthrough attributes.
2621:     isSingleElementRoot(root, root.children[0])
2622:   )
2623: }
2624: 
2625: function isSingleElementRoot(
2626:   root,
2627:   child
2628: ) {
2629:   const { children } = root
2630:   return (
2631:     children.length === 1 &&
2632:     child.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT &&
2633:     !isSlotOutlet(child)
2634:   )
2635: }
2636: 
2637: function _walk(
2638:   node,
2639:   context,
2640:   doNotHoistNode = false
2641: ) {
2642:   const { children } = node
2643:   const originalCount = children.length
2644:   let hoistedCount = 0
2645: 
2646:   for (let i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
2647:     const child = children[i]
2648:     // only plain elements & text calls are eligible for hoisting.
2649:     if (
2650:       child.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT &&
2651:       child.tagType === ElementTypes.ELEMENT
2652:     ) {
2653:       const constantType = doNotHoistNode
2654:         ? ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2655:         : getConstantType(child, context)
2656:       if (constantType > ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT) {
2657:         if (constantType >= ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST) {
2658:           child.codegenNode.patchFlag =
2659:             PatchFlags.HOISTED + (__DEV__ ? ` /* HOISTED */` : ``)
2660:           child.codegenNode = context.hoist(child.codegenNode)
2661:           hoistedCount++
2662:           continue
2663:         }
2664:       } else {
2665:         // node may contain dynamic children, but its props may be eligible for
2666:         // hoisting.
2667:         const codegenNode = child.codegenNode
2668:         if (codegenNode.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
2669:           const flag = getPatchFlag(codegenNode)
2670:           if (
2671:             (!flag ||
2672:               flag === PatchFlags.NEED_PATCH ||
2673:               flag === PatchFlags.TEXT) &&
2674:             getGeneratedPropsConstantType(child, context) >=
2675:               ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
2676:           ) {
2677:             const props = getNodeProps(child)
2678:             if (props) {
2679:               codegenNode.props = context.hoist(props)
2680:             }
2681:           }
2682:           if (codegenNode.dynamicProps) {
2683:             codegenNode.dynamicProps = context.hoist(codegenNode.dynamicProps)
2684:           }
2685:         }
2686:       }
2687:     } else if (
2688:       child.type === NodeTypes.TEXT_CALL &&
2689:       getConstantType(child.content, context) >= ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
2690:     ) {
2691:       child.codegenNode = context.hoist(child.codegenNode)
2692:       hoistedCount++
2693:     }
2694: 
2695:     // walk further
2696:     if (child.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
2697:       const isComponent = child.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT
2698:       if (isComponent) {
2699:         context.scopes.vSlot++
2700:       }
2701:       _walk(child, context)
2702:       if (isComponent) {
2703:         context.scopes.vSlot--
2704:       }
2705:     } else if (child.type === NodeTypes.FOR) {
2706:       // Do not hoist v-for single child because it has to be a block
2707:       _walk(child, context, child.children.length === 1)
2708:     } else if (child.type === NodeTypes.IF) {
2709:       for (let i = 0; i < child.branches.length; i++) {
2710:         // Do not hoist v-if single child because it has to be a block
2711:         _walk(
2712:           child.branches[i],
2713:           context,
2714:           child.branches[i].children.length === 1
2715:         )
2716:       }
2717:     }
2718:   }
2719: 
2720:   if (hoistedCount && context.transformHoist) {
2721:     logg(`hoist walk -> transformHoist, hoistedCount = ${hoistedCount}`)
2722:     context.transformHoist(children, context, node)
2723:   }
2724: 
2725:   // all children were hoisted - the entire children array is hoistable.
2726:   if (
2727:     hoistedCount &&
2728:     hoistedCount === originalCount &&
2729:     node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT &&
2730:     node.tagType === ElementTypes.ELEMENT &&
2731:     node.codegenNode &&
2732:     node.codegenNode.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL &&
2733:     isArray(node.codegenNode.children)
2734:   ) {
2735:     node.codegenNode.children = context.hoist(
2736:       createArrayExpression(node.codegenNode.children)
2737:     )
2738:   }
2739: }
2740: 
2741: function getConstantType(node, context) {
2742:   const { constantCache } = context
2743:   switch (node.type) {
2744:     case NodeTypes.ELEMENT:
2745:       if (node.tagType !== ElementTypes.ELEMENT) {
2746:         return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2747:       }
2748:       const cached = constantCache.get(node)
2749:       if (cached !== undefined) {
2750:         return cached
2751:       }
2752:       const codegenNode = node.codegenNode
2753:       if (codegenNode.type !== NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
2754:         return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2755:       }
2756:       if (
2757:         codegenNode.isBlock &&
2758:         node.tag !== 'svg' &&
2759:         node.tag !== 'foreignObject'
2760:       ) {
2761:         return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2762:       }
2763:       const flag = getPatchFlag(codegenNode)
2764:       if (!flag) {
2765:         let returnType = ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
2766: 
2767:         // Element itself has no patch flag. However we still need to check:
2768: 
2769:         // 1. Even for a node with no patch flag, it is possible for it to contain
2770:         // non-hoistable expressions that refers to scope variables, e.g. compiler
2771:         // injected keys or cached event handlers. Therefore we need to always
2772:         // check the codegenNode's props to be sure.
2773:         const generatedPropsType = getGeneratedPropsConstantType(node, context)
2774:         if (generatedPropsType === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT) {
2775:           constantCache.set(node, ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT)
2776:           return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2777:         }
2778:         if (generatedPropsType < returnType) {
2779:           returnType = generatedPropsType
2780:         }
2781: 
2782:         // 2. its children.
2783:         for (let i = 0; i < node.children.length; i++) {
2784:           const childType = getConstantType(node.children[i], context)
2785:           if (childType === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT) {
2786:             constantCache.set(node, ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT)
2787:             return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2788:           }
2789:           if (childType < returnType) {
2790:             returnType = childType
2791:           }
2792:         }
2793: 
2794:         // 3. if the type is not already CAN_SKIP_PATCH which is the lowest non-0
2795:         // type, check if any of the props can cause the type to be lowered
2796:         // we can skip can_patch because it's guaranteed by the absence of a
2797:         // patchFlag.
2798:         if (returnType > ConstantTypes.CAN_SKIP_PATCH) {
2799:           for (let i = 0; i < node.props.length; i++) {
2800:             const p = node.props[i]
2801:             if (p.type === NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE && p.name === 'bind' && p.exp) {
2802:               const expType = getConstantType(p.exp, context)
2803:               if (expType === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT) {
2804:                 constantCache.set(node, ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT)
2805:                 return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2806:               }
2807:               if (expType < returnType) {
2808:                 returnType = expType
2809:               }
2810:             }
2811:           }
2812:         }
2813: 
2814:         // only svg/foreignObject could be block here, however if they are
2815:         // static then they don't need to be blocks since there will be no
2816:         // nested updates.
2817:         if (codegenNode.isBlock) {
2818:           context.removeHelper(OPEN_BLOCK)
2819:           context.removeHelper(
2820:             getVNodeBlockHelper(context.inSSR, codegenNode.isComponent)
2821:           )
2822:           codegenNode.isBlock = false
2823:           context.helper(getVNodeHelper(context.inSSR, codegenNode.isComponent))
2824:         }
2825: 
2826:         constantCache.set(node, returnType)
2827:         return returnType
2828:       } else {
2829:         constantCache.set(node, ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT)
2830:         return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2831:       }
2832:     case NodeTypes.TEXT:
2833:     case NodeTypes.COMMENT:
2834:       return ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
2835:     case NodeTypes.IF:
2836:     case NodeTypes.FOR:
2837:     case NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH:
2838:       return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2839:     case NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION:
2840:     case NodeTypes.TEXT_CALL:
2841:       return getConstantType(node.content, context)
2842:     case NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION:
2843:       return node.constType
2844:     case NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION:
2845:       let returnType = ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
2846:       for (let i = 0; i < node.children.length; i++) {
2847:         const child = node.children[i]
2848:         if (isString(child) || isSymbol(child)) {
2849:           continue
2850:         }
2851:         const childType = getConstantType(child, context)
2852:         if (childType === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT) {
2853:           return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2854:         } else if (childType < returnType) {
2855:           returnType = childType
2856:         }
2857:       }
2858:       return returnType
2859:     default:
2860:       return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2861:   }
2862: }
2863: 
2864: const allowHoistedHelperSet = new Set([
2865:   NORMALIZE_CLASS,
2866:   NORMALIZE_STYLE,
2867:   NORMALIZE_PROPS,
2868:   GUARD_REACTIVE_PROPS
2869: ])
2870: 
2871: function getConstantTypeOfHelperCall(value, context){
2872:   if (
2873:     value.type === NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION &&
2874:     !isString(value.callee) &&
2875:     allowHoistedHelperSet.has(value.callee)
2876:   ) {
2877:     const arg = value.arguments[0]
2878:     if (arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
2879:       return getConstantType(arg, context)
2880:     } else if (arg.type === NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION) {
2881:       // in the case of nested helper call, e.g. `normalizeProps(guardReactiveProps(exp))`
2882:       return getConstantTypeOfHelperCall(arg, context)
2883:     }
2884:   }
2885:   return ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2886: }
2887: 
2888: function getGeneratedPropsConstantType(node, context) {
2889:   let returnType = ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
2890:   const props = getNodeProps(node)
2891:   if (props && props.type === NodeTypes.JS_OBJECT_EXPRESSION) {
2892:     const { properties } = props
2893:     for (let i = 0; i < properties.length; i++) {
2894:       const { key, value } = properties[i]
2895:       const keyType = getConstantType(key, context)
2896:       if (keyType === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT) {
2897:         return keyType
2898:       }
2899:       if (keyType < returnType) {
2900:         returnType = keyType
2901:       }
2902:       let valueType
2903:       if (value.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
2904:         valueType = getConstantType(value, context)
2905:       } else if (value.type === NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION) {
2906:         // some helper calls can be hoisted,
2907:         // such as the `normalizeProps` generated by the compiler for pre-normalize class,
2908:         // in this case we need to respect the ConstantType of the helper's arguments
2909:         valueType = getConstantTypeOfHelperCall(value, context)
2910:       } else {
2911:         valueType = ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
2912:       }
2913:       if (valueType === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT) {
2914:         return valueType
2915:       }
2916:       if (valueType < returnType) {
2917:         returnType = valueType
2918:       }
2919:     }
2920:   }
2921:   return returnType
2922: }
2923: 
2924: function getNodeProps(node) {
2925:   const codegenNode = node.codegenNode
2926:   if (codegenNode.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
2927:     return codegenNode.props
2928:   }
2929: }
2930: 
2931: function getPatchFlag(node) {
2932:   const flag = node.patchFlag
2933:   return flag ? parseInt(flag, 10) : undefined
2934: }
2935: 
2936: function createRootCodegen(root, context) {
2937:   const { helper } = context
2938:   const { children } = root
2939:   logg('createRootCodegen', `children=${children.length}, 只有一个用 block, 多个用Fragment`)
2940:   if (children.length === 1) {
2941:     const child = children[0]
2942:     // if the single child is an element, turn it into a block.
2943:     // 如果只有一个根元素，如： <template><div>...</div></template>
2944:     if (isSingleElementRoot(root, child) && child.codegenNode) {
2945:       // single element root is never hoisted so codegenNode will never be
2946:       // SimpleExpressionNode
2947:       const codegenNode = child.codegenNode
2948:       if (codegenNode.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
2949:         makeBlock(codegenNode, context)
2950:       }
2951:       root.codegenNode = codegenNode
2952:     } else {
2953:       // - single <slot/>, IfNode, ForNode: already blocks.
2954:       // - single text node: always patched.
2955:       // root codegen falls through via genNode()
2956:       root.codegenNode = child
2957:     }
2958:   } else if (children.length > 1) {
2959:     // root 下有多个节点时，使用 fragment block，3.x 特性，2.x中是不支持多个元素的
2960:     let patchFlag = PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT
2961:     let patchFlagText = PatchFlagNames[PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT]
2962: 
2963:     root.codegenNode = createVNodeCall(
2964:       context,
2965:       helper(FRAGMENT),
2966:       undefined,
2967:       root.children,
2968:       patchFlag + (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${patchFlagText} */` : ``),
2969:       undefined,
2970:       undefined,
2971:       true,
2972:       undefined,
2973:       false /* isComponent */
2974:     )
2975:   } else {
2976:     // no children = noop. codegen will return null.
2977:   }
2978: }
2979: function createStructuralDirectiveTransform(name, fn) {
2980:   // 正则就用 test 方法，字符串直接比较
2981:   const matches = isString(name)
2982:     ? (n) => n === name
2983:     : (n) => name.test(n)
2984: 
2985:   logg('createStructuralDirectiveTransform', `name=${name}, matches=${matches}`)
2986:   return (node, context) => {
2987:     if (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
2988:       const { props } = node
2989:       // v-slot 指令特殊处理，代码在 vSlot.ts 中，所以这里跳过它
2990:       if (node.tagType === ElementTypes.TEMPLATE && props.some(isVSlot)) {
2991:         return
2992:       }
2993:       const exitFns = []
2994:       for (let i = 0; i < props.length; i++) {
2995:         const prop = props[i]
2996:         if (prop.type === NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE && matches(prop.name)) {
2997:           // structural directives are removed to avoid infinite recursion
2998:           // also we remove them *before* applying so that it can further
2999:           // traverse itself in case it moves the node around
3000:           props.splice(i, 1)
3001:           i--
3002:           const onExit = fn(node, prop, context)
3003:           if (onExit) exitFns.push(onExit)
3004:         }
3005:       }
3006:       return exitFns
3007:     }
3008:   }
3009: }
3010: 
3011: function getBaseTransformPreset(prefixIdentifiers) {
3012:   return [
3013:     [
3014:       transformOnce,
3015:       transformIf,
3016:       transformMemo,
3017:       transformFor,
3018:       ...(!__BROWSER__ && prefixIdentifiers
3019:         ? [
3020:             // order is important
3021:             trackVForSlotScopes,
3022:             transformExpression
3023:           ]
3024:         : __BROWSER__ && __DEV__
3025:         ? [transformExpression]
3026:         : []),
3027:       transformSlotOutlet,
3028:       transformElement,
3029:       trackSlotScopes,
3030:       transformText
3031:     ],
3032:     {
3033:       on: transformOn,
3034:       bind: transformBind,
3035:       model: transformModel
3036:     }
3037:   ]
3038: }
3039: function makeBlock(node, { helper, removeHelper, inSSR }) {
