3040:   if (!node.isBlock) {
3041:     node.isBlock = true
3042:     removeHelper(getVNodeHelper(inSSR, node.isComponent))
3043:     helper(OPEN_BLOCK)
3044:     helper(getVNodeBlockHelper(inSSR, node.isComponent))
3045:   }
3046: }
3047: const defaultFallback = createSimpleExpression(`undefined`, false)
3048: 
3049: // A NodeTransform that:
3050: // 1. Tracks scope identifiers for scoped slots so that they don't get prefixed
3051: //    by transformExpression. This is only applied in non-browser builds with
3052: //    { prefixIdentifiers: true }.
3053: // 2. Track v-slot depths so that we know a slot is inside another slot.
3054: //    Note the exit callback is executed before buildSlots() on the same node,
3055: //    so only nested slots see positive numbers.
3056: const trackSlotScopes = (node, context) => {
3057:   if (
3058:     node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT &&
3059:     (node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT ||
3060:       node.tagType === ElementTypes.TEMPLATE)
3061:   ) {
3062:     // We are only checking non-empty v-slot here
3063:     // since we only care about slots that introduce scope variables.
3064:     const vSlot = findDir(node, 'slot')
3065:     if (vSlot) {
3066:       const slotProps = vSlot.exp
3067:       if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
3068:         slotProps && context.addIdentifiers(slotProps)
3069:       }
3070:       context.scopes.vSlot++
3071:       return () => {
3072:         if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
3073:           slotProps && context.removeIdentifiers(slotProps)
3074:         }
3075:         context.scopes.vSlot--
3076:       }
3077:     }
3078:   }
3079: }
3080: 
3081: 
3082: // A NodeTransform that tracks scope identifiers for scoped slots with v-for.
3083: // This transform is only applied in non-browser builds with { prefixIdentifiers: true }
3084: const trackVForSlotScopes = (node, context) => {
3085:   let vFor
3086:   if (
3087:     isTemplateNode(node) &&
3088:     node.props.some(isVSlot) &&
3089:     (vFor = findDir(node, 'for'))
3090:   ) {
3091:     const result = (vFor.parseResult = parseForExpression(
3092:       vFor.exp,
3093:       context
3094:     ))
3095:     if (result) {
3096:       const { value, key, index } = result
3097:       const { addIdentifiers, removeIdentifiers } = context
3098:       value && addIdentifiers(value)
3099:       key && addIdentifiers(key)
3100:       index && addIdentifiers(index)
3101: 
3102:       return () => {
3103:         value && removeIdentifiers(value)
3104:         key && removeIdentifiers(key)
3105:         index && removeIdentifiers(index)
3106:       }
3107:     }
3108:   }
3109: }
3110: 
3111: const buildClientSlotFn = (props, children, loc) =>
3112:   createFunctionExpression(
3113:     props,
3114:     children,
3115:     false /* newline */,
3116:     true /* isSlot */,
3117:     children.length ? children[0].loc : loc
3118:   )
3119: 
3120: 
3121: // Instead of being a DirectiveTransform, v-slot processing is called during
3122: // transformElement to build the slots object for a component.
3123: function buildSlots(node, context, buildSlotFn= buildClientSlotFn) {
3124:   context.helper(WITH_CTX)
3125: 
3126:   const { children, loc } = node
3127:   const slotsProperties = []
3128:   const dynamicSlots= []
3129: 
3130:   // If the slot is inside a v-for or another v-slot, force it to be dynamic
3131:   // since it likely uses a scope variable.
3132:   let hasDynamicSlots = context.scopes.vSlot > 0 || context.scopes.vFor > 0
3133:   // with `prefixIdentifiers: true`, this can be further optimized to make
3134:   // it dynamic only when the slot actually uses the scope variables.
3135:   if (!__BROWSER__ && !context.ssr && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
3136:     hasDynamicSlots = hasScopeRef(node, context.identifiers)
3137:   }
3138: 
3139:   // 1. Check for slot with slotProps on component itself.
3140:   //    <Comp v-slot="{ prop }"/>
3141:   const onComponentSlot = findDir(node, 'slot', true)
3142:   if (onComponentSlot) {
3143:     const { arg, exp } = onComponentSlot
3144:     if (arg && !isStaticExp(arg)) {
3145:       hasDynamicSlots = true
3146:     }
3147:     slotsProperties.push(
3148:       createObjectProperty(
3149:         arg || createSimpleExpression('default', true),
3150:         buildSlotFn(exp, children, loc)
3151:       )
3152:     )
3153:   }
3154: 
3155:   // 2. Iterate through children and check for template slots
3156:   //    <template v-slot:foo="{ prop }">
3157:   let hasTemplateSlots = false
3158:   let hasNamedDefaultSlot = false
3159:   const implicitDefaultChildren = []
3160:   const seenSlotNames = new Set()
3161: 
3162:   for (let i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
3163:     const slotElement = children[i]
3164:     let slotDir
3165: 
3166:     if (
3167:       !isTemplateNode(slotElement) ||
3168:       !(slotDir = findDir(slotElement, 'slot', true))
3169:     ) { // 收集不在 template v-slot 中的元素/组件，这些都会合并到默认插槽中去
3170:       if (slotElement.type !== NodeTypes.COMMENT) {
3171:         implicitDefaultChildren.push(slotElement)
3172:       }
3173:       continue
3174:     }
3175: 
3176:     if (onComponentSlot) {
3177:       logg(`buildSlots already has on-component slot - this is incorrect usage`)
3178:       break
3179:     }
3180: 
3181:     hasTemplateSlots = true
3182:     const { children: slotChildren, loc: slotLoc } = slotElement
3183:     const {
3184:       arg: slotName = createSimpleExpression(`default`, true),
3185:       exp: slotProps,
3186:       loc: dirLoc
3187:     } = slotDir
3188: 
3189:     // check if name is dynamic.
3190:     let staticSlotName
3191:     if (isStaticExp(slotName)) {
3192:       staticSlotName = slotName ? slotName.content : `default`
3193:     } else {
3194:       hasDynamicSlots = true
3195:     }
3196: 
3197:     const slotFunction = buildSlotFn(slotProps, slotChildren, slotLoc)
3198:     // check if this slot is conditional (v-if/v-for)
3199:     let vIf
3200:     let vElse
3201:     let vFor
3202:     if ((vIf = findDir(slotElement, 'if'))) {
3203:       hasDynamicSlots = true
3204:       dynamicSlots.push(
3205:         createConditionalExpression(
3206:           vIf.exp,
3207:           buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction),
3208:           defaultFallback
3209:         )
3210:       )
3211:     } else if (
3212:       (vElse = findDir(slotElement, /^else(-if)?$/, true /* allowEmpty */))
3213:     ) {
3214:       // find adjacent v-if
3215:       let j = i
3216:       let prev
3217:       while (j--) {
3218:         prev = children[j]
3219:         if (prev.type !== NodeTypes.COMMENT) {
3220:           break
3221:         }
3222:       }
3223:       if (prev && isTemplateNode(prev) && findDir(prev, 'if')) {
3224:         // remove node
3225:         children.splice(i, 1)
3226:         i--
3227: 
3228:         // attach this slot to previous conditional
3229:         let conditional = dynamicSlots[
3230:           dynamicSlots.length - 1
3231:         ]
3232:         while (
3233:           conditional.alternate.type === NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION
3234:         ) {
3235:           conditional = conditional.alternate
3236:         }
3237:         conditional.alternate = vElse.exp
3238:           ? createConditionalExpression(
3239:               vElse.exp,
3240:               buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction),
3241:               defaultFallback
3242:             )
3243:           : buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction)
3244:       }
3245:     } else if ((vFor = findDir(slotElement, 'for'))) {
3246:       hasDynamicSlots = true
3247:       const parseResult =
3248:         vFor.parseResult ||
3249:         parseForExpression(vFor.exp , context)
3250:       if (parseResult) {
3251:         // Render the dynamic slots as an array and add it to the createSlot()
3252:         // args. The runtime knows how to handle it appropriately.
3253:         dynamicSlots.push(
3254:           createCallExpression(context.helper(RENDER_LIST), [
3255:             parseResult.source,
3256:             createFunctionExpression(
3257:               createForLoopParams(parseResult),
3258:               buildDynamicSlot(slotName, slotFunction),
3259:               true /* force newline */
3260:             )
3261:           ])
3262:         )
3263:       }
3264:     } else {
3265:       // check duplicate static names
3266:       if (staticSlotName) {
3267:         if (seenSlotNames.has(staticSlotName)) {
3268:           logg(`buildSlots seenSlotNames has slot name`)
3269:           continue
3270:         }
3271:         seenSlotNames.add(staticSlotName)
3272:         if (staticSlotName === 'default') {
3273:           hasNamedDefaultSlot = true
3274:         }
3275:       }
3276:       slotsProperties.push(createObjectProperty(slotName, slotFunction))
3277:     }
3278:   }
3279: 
3280:   if (!onComponentSlot) {
3281:     const buildDefaultSlotProperty = (props, children) => {
3282:       const fn = buildSlotFn(props, children, loc)
3283: 
3284:       return createObjectProperty(`default`, fn)
3285:     }
3286: 
3287:     if (!hasTemplateSlots) {
3288:       // implicit default slot (on component)
3289:       slotsProperties.push(buildDefaultSlotProperty(undefined, children))
3290:     } else if (
3291:       implicitDefaultChildren.length &&
3292:       // #3766
3293:       // with whitespace: 'preserve', whitespaces between slots will end up in
3294:       // implicitDefaultChildren. Ignore if all implicit children are whitespaces.
3295:       implicitDefaultChildren.some(node => isNonWhitespaceContent(node))
3296:     ) {
3297:       // implicit default slot (mixed with named slots)
3298:       if (hasNamedDefaultSlot) {
3299:         logg(`buildSlots hasNamedDefaultSlot`)
3300:       } else {
3301:         // 合并到默认插槽
3302:         slotsProperties.push(
3303:           buildDefaultSlotProperty(undefined, implicitDefaultChildren)
3304:         )
3305:       }
3306:     }
3307:   }
3308: 
3309:   const slotFlag = hasDynamicSlots
3310:     ? SlotFlags.DYNAMIC
3311:     : hasForwardedSlots(node.children)
3312:     ? SlotFlags.FORWARDED
3313:     : SlotFlags.STABLE
3314: 
3315:   let slots = createObjectExpression(
3316:     slotsProperties.concat(
3317:       createObjectProperty(
3318:         `_`,
3319:         // 2 = compiled but dynamic = can skip normalization, but must run diff
3320:         // 1 = compiled and static = can skip normalization AND diff as optimized
3321:         createSimpleExpression(
3322:           slotFlag + (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${slotFlagsText[slotFlag]} */` : ``),
3323:           false
3324:         )
3325:       )
3326:     ),
3327:     loc
3328:   )
3329:   if (dynamicSlots.length) {
3330:     slots = createCallExpression(context.helper(CREATE_SLOTS), [
3331:       slots,
3332:       createArrayExpression(dynamicSlots)
3333:     ])
3334:   }
3335: 
3336:   return {
3337:     slots,
3338:     hasDynamicSlots
3339:   }
3340: }
3341: 
3342: function buildDynamicSlot(name, fn) {
3343:   return createObjectExpression([
3344:     createObjectProperty(`name`, name),
3345:     createObjectProperty(`fn`, fn)
3346:   ])
3347: }
3348: 
3349: function hasForwardedSlots(children) {
3350:   for (let i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
3351:     const child = children[i]
3352:     switch (child.type) {
3353:       case NodeTypes.ELEMENT:
3354:         if (
3355:           child.tagType === ElementTypes.SLOT ||
3356:           hasForwardedSlots(child.children)
3357:         ) {
3358:           return true
3359:         }
3360:         break
3361:       case NodeTypes.IF:
3362:         if (hasForwardedSlots(child.branches)) return true
3363:         break
3364:       case NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH:
3365:       case NodeTypes.FOR:
3366:         if (hasForwardedSlots(child.children)) return true
3367:         break
3368:       default:
3369:         break
3370:     }
3371:   }
3372:   return false
3373: }
3374: 
3375: function isNonWhitespaceContent(node){
3376:   if (node.type !== NodeTypes.TEXT && node.type !== NodeTypes.TEXT_CALL)
3377:     return true
3378:   return node.type === NodeTypes.TEXT
3379:     ? !!node.content.trim()
3380:     : isNonWhitespaceContent(node.content)
3381: }
3382: // some directive transforms (e.g. v-model) may return a symbol for runtime
3383: // import, which should be used instead of a resolveDirective call.
3384: const directiveImportMap = new WeakMap()
3385: 
3386: // generate a JavaScript AST for this element's codegen
3387: const transformElement = (node, context) => {
3388:   // perform the work on exit, after all child expressions have been
3389:   // processed and merged.
3390:   return function postTransformElement() {
3391:     node = context.currentNode
3392: 
3393:     if (
3394:       !(
3395:         node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT &&
3396:         (node.tagType === ElementTypes.ELEMENT ||
3397:           node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT)
3398:       )
3399:     ) {
3400:       return
3401:     }
3402: 
3403:     const { tag, props } = node
3404:     const isComponent = node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT
3405: 
3406:     // The goal of the transform is to create a codegenNode implementing the
3407:     // VNodeCall interface.
3408:     let vnodeTag = isComponent
3409:       ? resolveComponentType(node, context)
3410:       : `"${tag}"`
3411: 
3412:     const isDynamicComponent =
3413:       isObject(vnodeTag) && vnodeTag.callee === RESOLVE_DYNAMIC_COMPONENT
3414: 
3415:     let vnodeProps
3416:     let vnodeChildren
3417:     let vnodePatchFlag
3418:     let patchFlag = 0
3419:     let vnodeDynamicProps
3420:     let dynamicPropNames
3421:     let vnodeDirectives
3422: 
3423:     let shouldUseBlock =
3424:       // dynamic component may resolve to plain elements
3425:       isDynamicComponent ||
3426:       vnodeTag === TELEPORT ||
3427:       vnodeTag === SUSPENSE ||
3428:       (!isComponent &&
3429:         // <svg> and <foreignObject> must be forced into blocks so that block
3430:         // updates inside get proper isSVG flag at runtime. (#639, #643)
3431:         // This is technically web-specific, but splitting the logic out of core
3432:         // leads to too much unnecessary complexity.
3433:         (tag === 'svg' || tag === 'foreignObject'))
3434: 
3435:     // props
3436:     if (props.length > 0) {
3437:       const propsBuildResult = buildProps(node, context)
3438:       vnodeProps = propsBuildResult.props
3439:       patchFlag = propsBuildResult.patchFlag
3440:       dynamicPropNames = propsBuildResult.dynamicPropNames
3441:       const directives = propsBuildResult.directives
3442:       vnodeDirectives =
3443:         directives && directives.length
3444:           ? (createArrayExpression(
3445:               directives.map(dir => buildDirectiveArgs(dir, context))
3446:             ))
3447:           : undefined
3448: 
3449:       if (propsBuildResult.shouldUseBlock) {
3450:         shouldUseBlock = true
3451:       }
3452:     }
3453: 
3454:     // children
3455:     if (node.children.length > 0) {
3456:       if (vnodeTag === KEEP_ALIVE) {
3457:         // Although a built-in component, we compile KeepAlive with raw children
3458:         // instead of slot functions so that it can be used inside Transition
3459:         // or other Transition-wrapping HOCs.
3460:         // To ensure correct updates with block optimizations, we need to:
3461:         // 1. Force keep-alive into a block. This avoids its children being
3462:         //    collected by a parent block.
3463:         shouldUseBlock = true
3464:         // 2. Force keep-alive to always be updated, since it uses raw children.
3465:         patchFlag |= PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS
3466:       }
3467: 
3468:       const shouldBuildAsSlots =
3469:         isComponent &&
3470:         // Teleport is not a real component and has dedicated runtime handling
3471:         vnodeTag !== TELEPORT &&
3472:         // explained above.
3473:         vnodeTag !== KEEP_ALIVE
3474: 
3475:       if (shouldBuildAsSlots) {
3476:         const { slots, hasDynamicSlots } = buildSlots(node, context)
3477:         vnodeChildren = slots
3478:         if (hasDynamicSlots) {
3479:           patchFlag |= PatchFlags.DYNAMIC_SLOTS
3480:         }
3481:       } else if (node.children.length === 1 && vnodeTag !== TELEPORT) {
3482:         const child = node.children[0]
3483:         const type = child.type
3484:         // check for dynamic text children
3485:         const hasDynamicTextChild =
3486:           type === NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION ||
3487:           type === NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION
3488:         if (
3489:           hasDynamicTextChild &&
3490:           getConstantType(child, context) === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
3491:         ) {
3492:           patchFlag |= PatchFlags.TEXT
3493:         }
3494:         // pass directly if the only child is a text node
3495:         // (plain / interpolation / expression)
3496:         if (hasDynamicTextChild || type === NodeTypes.TEXT) {
3497:           vnodeChildren = child
3498:         } else {
3499:           vnodeChildren = node.children
3500:         }
3501:       } else {
3502:         vnodeChildren = node.children
3503:       }
3504:     }
3505: 
3506:     // patchFlag & dynamicPropNames
3507:     if (patchFlag !== 0) {
3508:       vnodePatchFlag = String(patchFlag)
3509:       if (dynamicPropNames && dynamicPropNames.length) {
3510:         vnodeDynamicProps = stringifyDynamicPropNames(dynamicPropNames)
3511:       }
3512:     }
3513: 
3514:     node.codegenNode = createVNodeCall(
3515:       context,
3516:       vnodeTag,
3517:       vnodeProps,
3518:       vnodeChildren,
3519:       vnodePatchFlag,
3520:       vnodeDynamicProps,
3521:       vnodeDirectives,
3522:       !!shouldUseBlock,
3523:       false /* disableTracking */,
3524:       isComponent,
3525:       node.loc
3526:     )
3527:   }
3528: }
3529: 
3530: function resolveComponentType(
3531:   node,
3532:   context,
3533:   ssr = false
3534: ) {
3535:   let { tag } = node
3536: 
3537:   // 1. dynamic component
3538:   const isExplicitDynamic = isComponentTag(tag)
3539:   const isProp = findProp(node, 'is')
3540:   if (isProp) {
3541:     if (isExplicitDynamic ) {
3542:       const exp =
3543:         isProp.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE
3544:           ? isProp.value && createSimpleExpression(isProp.value.content, true)
3545:           : isProp.exp
3546:       if (exp) {
3547:         return createCallExpression(context.helper(RESOLVE_DYNAMIC_COMPONENT), [
3548:           exp
3549:         ])
3550:       }
3551:     } else if (
3552:       isProp.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE &&
3553:       isProp.value.content.startsWith('vue:')
3554:     ) {
3555:       // <button is="vue:xxx">
3556:       // if not <component>, only is value that starts with "vue:" will be
3557:       // treated as component by the parse phase and reach here, unless it's
3558:       // compat mode where all is values are considered components
3559:       tag = isProp.value.content.slice(4)
3560:     }
3561:   }
3562: 
3563:   // 1.5 v-is (TODO: Deprecate)
3564:   const isDir = !isExplicitDynamic && findDir(node, 'is')
3565:   if (isDir && isDir.exp) {
3566:     return createCallExpression(context.helper(RESOLVE_DYNAMIC_COMPONENT), [
3567:       isDir.exp
3568:     ])
3569:   }
3570: 
3571:   // 2. built-in components (Teleport, Transition, KeepAlive, Suspense...)
3572:   const builtIn = isCoreComponent(tag) || context.isBuiltInComponent(tag)
3573:   if (builtIn) {
3574:     // built-ins are simply fallthroughs / have special handling during ssr
3575:     // so we don't need to import their runtime equivalents
3576:     if (!ssr) context.helper(builtIn)
3577:     return builtIn
3578:   }
3579: 
3580:   // 3. user component (from setup bindings)
3581:   // this is skipped in browser build since browser builds do not perform
3582:   // binding analysis.
3583:   if (!__BROWSER__) {
3584:     const fromSetup = resolveSetupReference(tag, context)
3585:     if (fromSetup) {
3586:       return fromSetup
3587:     }
3588:     const dotIndex = tag.indexOf('.')
3589:     if (dotIndex > 0) {
3590:       const ns = resolveSetupReference(tag.slice(0, dotIndex), context)
3591:       if (ns) {
3592:         return ns + tag.slice(dotIndex)
3593:       }
3594:     }
3595:   }
3596: 
3597:   // 4. Self referencing component (inferred from filename)
3598:   if (
3599:     !__BROWSER__ &&
3600:     context.selfName &&
3601:     capitalize(camelize(tag)) === context.selfName
3602:   ) {
3603:     context.helper(RESOLVE_COMPONENT)
3604:     // codegen.ts has special check for __self postfix when generating
3605:     // component imports, which will pass additional `maybeSelfReference` flag
3606:     // to `resolveComponent`.
3607:     context.components.add(tag + `__self`)
3608:     return toValidAssetId(tag, `component`)
3609:   }
3610: 
3611:   // 5. user component (resolve)
3612:   context.helper(RESOLVE_COMPONENT)
3613:   context.components.add(tag)
3614:   return toValidAssetId(tag, `component`)
3615: }
3616: 
3617: 
3618: function resolveSetupReference(name, context) {
3619:   const bindings = context.bindingMetadata
3620:   if (!bindings || bindings.__isScriptSetup === false) {
3621:     return
3622:   }
3623: 
3624:   const camelName = camelize(name)
3625:   const PascalName = capitalize(camelName)
3626:   const checkType = (type) => {
3627:     if (bindings[name] === type) {
3628:       return name
3629:     }
3630:     if (bindings[camelName] === type) {
3631:       return camelName
3632:     }
3633:     if (bindings[PascalName] === type) {
3634:       return PascalName
3635:     }
3636:   }
3637: 
3638:   const fromConst = checkType(BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST)
3639:   if (fromConst) {
3640:     return context.inline
3641:       ? // in inline mode, const setup bindings (e.g. imports) can be used as-is
3642:         fromConst
3643:       : `$setup[${JSON.stringify(fromConst)}]`
3644:   }
3645: 
3646:   const fromMaybeRef =
3647:     checkType(BindingTypes.SETUP_LET) ||
3648:     checkType(BindingTypes.SETUP_REF) ||
3649:     checkType(BindingTypes.SETUP_MAYBE_REF)
3650:   if (fromMaybeRef) {
3651:     return context.inline
3652:       ? // setup scope bindings that may be refs need to be unrefed
3653:         `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${fromMaybeRef})`
3654:       : `$setup[${JSON.stringify(fromMaybeRef)}]`
3655:   }
3656: }
3657: 
3658: function buildProps(
3659:   node,
3660:   context,
3661:   props = node.props,
3662:   ssr = false
3663: ) {
3664:   const { tag, loc: elementLoc, children } = node
3665:   const isComponent = node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT
3666:   let properties = []
3667:   const mergeArgs = []
3668:   const runtimeDirectives = []
3669:   const hasChildren = children.length > 0
3670:   let shouldUseBlock = false
3671: 
3672:   // patchFlag analysis
3673:   let patchFlag = 0
3674:   let hasRef = false
3675:   let hasClassBinding = false
3676:   let hasStyleBinding = false
3677:   let hasHydrationEventBinding = false
3678:   let hasDynamicKeys = false
3679:   let hasVnodeHook = false
3680:   const dynamicPropNames = []
3681: 
3682:   const analyzePatchFlag = ({ key, value }) => {
3683:     if (isStaticExp(key)) {
3684:       const name = key.content
3685:       const isEventHandler = isOn(name)
3686:       if (
3687:         !isComponent &&
3688:         isEventHandler &&
3689:         // omit the flag for click handlers because hydration gives click
3690:         // dedicated fast path.
3691:         name.toLowerCase() !== 'onclick' &&
3692:         // omit v-model handlers
3693:         name !== 'onUpdate:modelValue' &&
3694:         // omit onVnodeXXX hooks
3695:         !isReservedProp(name)
3696:       ) {
3697:         hasHydrationEventBinding = true
3698:       }
3699: 
3700:       if (isEventHandler && isReservedProp(name)) {
3701:         hasVnodeHook = true
3702:       }
3703: 
3704:       if (
3705:         value.type === NodeTypes.JS_CACHE_EXPRESSION ||
3706:         ((value.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION ||
3707:           value.type === NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION) &&
3708:           getConstantType(value, context) > 0)
3709:       ) {
3710:         // skip if the prop is a cached handler or has constant value
3711:         return
3712:       }
3713: 
3714:       if (name === 'ref') {
3715:         hasRef = true
3716:       } else if (name === 'class') {
3717:         hasClassBinding = true
3718:       } else if (name === 'style') {
3719:         hasStyleBinding = true
3720:       } else if (name !== 'key' && !dynamicPropNames.includes(name)) {
3721:         dynamicPropNames.push(name)
3722:       }
3723: 
3724:       // treat the dynamic class and style binding of the component as dynamic props
3725:       if (
3726:         isComponent &&
3727:         (name === 'class' || name === 'style') &&
3728:         !dynamicPropNames.includes(name)
3729:       ) {
3730:         dynamicPropNames.push(name)
3731:       }
3732:     } else {
3733:       hasDynamicKeys = true
3734:     }
3735:   }
3736: 
3737:   for (let i = 0; i < props.length; i++) {
3738:     // static attribute
3739:     const prop = props[i]
3740:     if (prop.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE) {
3741:       const { loc, name, value } = prop
3742:       let isStatic = true
3743:       if (name === 'ref') {
3744:         hasRef = true
3745:         if (context.scopes.vFor > 0) {
3746:           properties.push(
3747:             createObjectProperty(
3748:               createSimpleExpression('ref_for', true),
3749:               createSimpleExpression('true')
3750:             )
3751:           )
3752:         }
3753:         // in inline mode there is no setupState object, so we can't use string
3754:         // keys to set the ref. Instead, we need to transform it to pass the
3755:         // actual ref instead.
3756:         if (
3757:           !__BROWSER__ &&
3758:           value &&
3759:           context.inline &&
3760:           context.bindingMetadata[value.content]
3761:         ) {
3762:           isStatic = false
3763:           properties.push(
3764:             createObjectProperty(
3765:               createSimpleExpression('ref_key', true),
3766:               createSimpleExpression(value.content, true, value.loc)
3767:             )
3768:           )
3769:         }
3770:       }
3771:       // skip is on <component>, or is="vue:xxx"
3772:       if (
3773:         name === 'is' &&
3774:         (isComponentTag(tag) ||
3775:           (value && value.content.startsWith('vue:')))
3776:       ) {
3777:         continue
3778:       }
3779:       properties.push(
3780:         createObjectProperty(
3781:           createSimpleExpression(
3782:             name,
3783:             true,
3784:             getInnerRange(loc, 0, name.length)
3785:           ),
3786:           createSimpleExpression(
3787:             value ? value.content : '',
3788:             isStatic,
3789:             value ? value.loc : loc
3790:           )
3791:         )
3792:       )
3793:     } else {
3794:       // directives
3795:       const { name, arg, exp, loc } = prop
3796:       const isVBind = name === 'bind'
3797:       const isVOn = name === 'on'
3798: 
3799:       // skip v-slot - it is handled by its dedicated transform.
3800:       if (name === 'slot') {
3801:         continue
3802:       }
3803:       // skip v-once/v-memo - they are handled by dedicated transforms.
3804:       if (name === 'once' || name === 'memo') {
3805:         continue
3806:       }
3807:       // skip v-is and :is on <component>
3808:       if (
3809:         name === 'is' ||
3810:         (isVBind &&
3811:           isStaticArgOf(arg, 'is') &&
3812:           isComponentTag(tag))
3813:       ) {
3814:         continue
3815:       }
3816:       // skip v-on in SSR compilation
3817:       if (isVOn && ssr) {
3818:         continue
3819:       }
3820: 
3821:       if (
3822:         // #938: elements with dynamic keys should be forced into blocks
3823:         (isVBind && isStaticArgOf(arg, 'key')) ||
3824:         // inline before-update hooks need to force block so that it is invoked
3825:         // before children
3826:         (isVOn && hasChildren && isStaticArgOf(arg, 'vue:before-update'))
3827:       ) {
3828:         shouldUseBlock = true
3829:       }
3830: 
3831:       if (isVBind && isStaticArgOf(arg, 'ref') && context.scopes.vFor > 0) {
3832:         properties.push(
3833:           createObjectProperty(
3834:             createSimpleExpression('ref_for', true),
3835:             createSimpleExpression('true')
3836:           )
3837:         )
3838:       }
3839: 
3840:       // special case for v-bind and v-on with no argument
3841:       if (!arg && (isVBind || isVOn)) {
3842:         hasDynamicKeys = true
3843:         if (exp) {
3844:           if (properties.length) {
3845:             mergeArgs.push(
3846:               createObjectExpression(dedupeProperties(properties), elementLoc)
3847:             )
3848:             properties = []
3849:           }
3850:           if (isVBind) {
3851:             mergeArgs.push(exp)
3852:           } else {
3853:             // v-on="obj" -> toHandlers(obj)
3854:             mergeArgs.push({
3855:               type: NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION,
3856:               loc,
3857:               callee: context.helper(TO_HANDLERS),
3858:               arguments: [exp]
3859:             })
3860:           }
3861:         }
3862:         continue
3863:       }
3864: 
3865:       const directiveTransform = context.directiveTransforms[name]
3866:       if (directiveTransform) {
3867:         // has built-in directive transform.
3868:         const { props, needRuntime } = directiveTransform(prop, node, context)
3869:         !ssr && props.forEach(analyzePatchFlag)
3870:         properties.push(...props)
3871:         if (needRuntime) {
3872:           runtimeDirectives.push(prop)
3873:           if (isSymbol(needRuntime)) {
3874:             directiveImportMap.set(prop, needRuntime)
3875:           }
3876:         }
3877:       } else if (!isBuiltInDirective(name)) {
3878:         // no built-in transform, this is a user custom directive.
3879:         runtimeDirectives.push(prop)
3880:         // custom dirs may use beforeUpdate so they need to force blocks
3881:         // to ensure before-update gets called before children update
3882:         if (hasChildren) {
3883:           shouldUseBlock = true
3884:         }
3885:       }
3886:     }
3887:   }
3888: 
3889:   let propsExpression = undefined
3890: 
3891:   // has v-bind="object" or v-on="object", wrap with mergeProps
3892:   if (mergeArgs.length) {
3893:     if (properties.length) {
3894:       mergeArgs.push(
3895:         createObjectExpression(dedupeProperties(properties), elementLoc)
3896:       )
3897:     }
3898:     if (mergeArgs.length > 1) {
3899:       propsExpression = createCallExpression(
3900:         context.helper(MERGE_PROPS),
3901:         mergeArgs,
3902:         elementLoc
3903:       )
3904:     } else {
3905:       // single v-bind with nothing else - no need for a mergeProps call
3906:       propsExpression = mergeArgs[0]
3907:     }
3908:   } else if (properties.length) {
3909:     propsExpression = createObjectExpression(
3910:       dedupeProperties(properties),
3911:       elementLoc
3912:     )
3913:   }
3914: 
3915:   // patchFlag analysis
3916:   if (hasDynamicKeys) {
3917:     patchFlag |= PatchFlags.FULL_PROPS
3918:   } else {
3919:     if (hasClassBinding && !isComponent) {
3920:       patchFlag |= PatchFlags.CLASS
3921:     }
3922:     if (hasStyleBinding && !isComponent) {
3923:       patchFlag |= PatchFlags.STYLE
3924:     }
3925:     if (dynamicPropNames.length) {
3926:       patchFlag |= PatchFlags.PROPS
3927:     }
3928:     if (hasHydrationEventBinding) {
3929:       patchFlag |= PatchFlags.HYDRATE_EVENTS
3930:     }
3931:   }
3932:   if (
3933:     !shouldUseBlock &&
3934:     (patchFlag === 0 || patchFlag === PatchFlags.HYDRATE_EVENTS) &&
3935:     (hasRef || hasVnodeHook || runtimeDirectives.length > 0)
3936:   ) {
3937:     patchFlag |= PatchFlags.NEED_PATCH
3938:   }
3939: 
3940:   // pre-normalize props, SSR is skipped for now
3941:   if (!context.inSSR && propsExpression) {
3942:     switch (propsExpression.type) {
3943:       case NodeTypes.JS_OBJECT_EXPRESSION:
3944:         // means that there is no v-bind,
3945:         // but still need to deal with dynamic key binding
3946:         let classKeyIndex = -1
3947:         let styleKeyIndex = -1
3948:         let hasDynamicKey = false
3949: 
3950:         for (let i = 0; i < propsExpression.properties.length; i++) {
3951:           const key = propsExpression.properties[i].key
3952:           if (isStaticExp(key)) {
3953:             if (key.content === 'class') {
3954:               classKeyIndex = i
3955:             } else if (key.content === 'style') {
3956:               styleKeyIndex = i
3957:             }
3958:           } else if (!key.isHandlerKey) {
3959:             hasDynamicKey = true
3960:           }
3961:         }
3962: 
3963:         const classProp = propsExpression.properties[classKeyIndex]
3964:         const styleProp = propsExpression.properties[styleKeyIndex]
3965: 
3966:         // no dynamic key
3967:         if (!hasDynamicKey) {
3968:           if (classProp && !isStaticExp(classProp.value)) {
3969:             classProp.value = createCallExpression(
3970:               context.helper(NORMALIZE_CLASS),
3971:               [classProp.value]
3972:             )
3973:           }
3974:           if (
3975:             styleProp &&
3976:             !isStaticExp(styleProp.value) &&
3977:             // the static style is compiled into an object,
3978:             // so use `hasStyleBinding` to ensure that it is a dynamic style binding
3979:             (hasStyleBinding ||
3980:               // v-bind:style and style both exist,
3981:               // v-bind:style with static literal object
3982:               styleProp.value.type === NodeTypes.JS_ARRAY_EXPRESSION)
3983:           ) {
3984:             styleProp.value = createCallExpression(
3985:               context.helper(NORMALIZE_STYLE),
3986:               [styleProp.value]
3987:             )
3988:           }
3989:         } else {
3990:           // dynamic key binding, wrap with `normalizeProps`
3991:           propsExpression = createCallExpression(
3992:             context.helper(NORMALIZE_PROPS),
3993:             [propsExpression]
3994:           )
3995:         }
3996:         break
3997:       case NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION:
3998:         // mergeProps call, do nothing
3999:         break
4000:       default:
4001:         // single v-bind
4002:         propsExpression = createCallExpression(
4003:           context.helper(NORMALIZE_PROPS),
4004:           [
4005:             createCallExpression(context.helper(GUARD_REACTIVE_PROPS), [
4006:               propsExpression
4007:             ])
4008:           ]
4009:         )
4010:         break
4011:     }
4012:   }
4013: 
4014:   return {
4015:     props: propsExpression,
4016:     directives: runtimeDirectives,
4017:     patchFlag,
4018:     dynamicPropNames,
4019:     shouldUseBlock
4020:   }
4021: }
4022: 
4023: // Dedupe props in an object literal.
4024: // Literal duplicated attributes would have been warned during the parse phase,
4025: // however, it's possible to encounter duplicated `onXXX` handlers with different
4026: // modifiers. We also need to merge static and dynamic class / style attributes.
4027: // - onXXX handlers / style: merge into array
4028: // - class: merge into single expression with concatenation
4029: function dedupeProperties(properties) {
4030:   const knownProps = new Map()
4031:   const deduped = []
4032:   for (let i = 0; i < properties.length; i++) {
4033:     const prop = properties[i]
4034:     // dynamic keys are always allowed
4035:     if (prop.key.type === NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION || !prop.key.isStatic) {
4036:       deduped.push(prop)
4037:       continue
4038:     }
4039:     const name = prop.key.content
4040:     const existing = knownProps.get(name)
4041:     if (existing) {
4042:       if (name === 'style' || name === 'class' || isOn(name)) {
4043:         mergeAsArray(existing, prop)
4044:       }
4045:       // unexpected duplicate, should have emitted error during parse
4046:     } else {
4047:       knownProps.set(name, prop)
4048:       deduped.push(prop)
4049:     }
4050:   }
4051:   return deduped
4052: }
4053: 
4054: function mergeAsArray(existing, incoming) {
4055:   if (existing.value.type === NodeTypes.JS_ARRAY_EXPRESSION) {
4056:     existing.value.elements.push(incoming.value)
4057:   } else {
4058:     existing.value = createArrayExpression(
4059:       [existing.value, incoming.value],
4060:       existing.loc
4061:     )
4062:   }
4063: }
4064: 
4065: function buildDirectiveArgs(
4066:   dir,
4067:   context
4068: ) {
4069:   const dirArgs = []
4070:   const runtime = directiveImportMap.get(dir)
4071:   if (runtime) {
4072:     // built-in directive with runtime
4073:     dirArgs.push(context.helperString(runtime))
4074:   } else {
4075:     // user directive.
4076:     // see if we have directives exposed via <script setup>
4077:     const fromSetup =
4078:       !__BROWSER__ && resolveSetupReference('v-' + dir.name, context)
4079:     if (fromSetup) {
4080:       dirArgs.push(fromSetup)
4081:     } else {
4082:       // inject statement for resolving directive
4083:       context.helper(RESOLVE_DIRECTIVE)
4084:       context.directives.add(dir.name)
4085:       dirArgs.push(toValidAssetId(dir.name, `directive`))
4086:     }
4087:   }
4088:   const { loc } = dir
4089:   if (dir.exp) dirArgs.push(dir.exp)
4090:   if (dir.arg) {
4091:     if (!dir.exp) {
4092:       dirArgs.push(`void 0`)
4093:     }
4094:     dirArgs.push(dir.arg)
4095:   }
4096:   if (Object.keys(dir.modifiers).length) {
4097:     if (!dir.arg) {
4098:       if (!dir.exp) {
4099:         dirArgs.push(`void 0`)
4100:       }
4101:       dirArgs.push(`void 0`)
4102:     }
4103:     const trueExpression = createSimpleExpression(`true`, false, loc)
4104:     dirArgs.push(
4105:       createObjectExpression(
4106:         dir.modifiers.map(modifier =>
4107:           createObjectProperty(modifier, trueExpression)
4108:         ),
4109:         loc
4110:       )
4111:     )
4112:   }
4113:   return createArrayExpression(dirArgs, dir.loc)
4114: }
4115: 
4116: function stringifyDynamicPropNames(props) {
4117:   let propsNamesString = `[`
4118:   for (let i = 0, l = props.length; i < l; i++) {
4119:     propsNamesString += JSON.stringify(props[i])
4120:     if (i < l - 1) propsNamesString += ', '
4121:   }
4122:   return propsNamesString + `]`
4123: }
4124: 
4125: function isComponentTag(tag) {
4126:   return tag === 'component' || tag === 'Component'
4127: }
4128: 
4129: 
4130: const isLiteralWhitelisted = /*#__PURE__*/ makeMap('true,false,null,this')
4131: 
4132: const transformExpression = (node, context) => {
4133:   logg(`transformExpression`, node)
4134:   // 插值处理
4135:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION) {
4136:     node.content = processExpression(
4137:       node.content ,
4138:       context
4139:     )
4140:   } else if (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
4141:     // 处理元素上的指令
4142:     for (let i = 0; i < node.props.length; i++) {
4143:       const dir = node.props[i]
4144:       logg(`transformExpression - prop[${i}] - directive`, node.props[i])
4145:       // do not process for v-on & v-for since they are special handled
4146:       if (dir.type === NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE && dir.name !== 'for') { // v-for 在 vFor.ts 中处理
4147:         const exp = dir.exp
4148:         const arg = dir.arg
4149:         // do not process exp if this is v-on:arg - we need special handling
4150:         // for wrapping inline statements.
4151:         if (
4152:           exp &&
4153:           exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION &&
4154:           !(dir.name === 'on' && arg)
4155:         ) {
4156:           dir.exp = processExpression(
4157:             exp,
4158:             context,
4159:             // slot args must be processed as function params
4160:             dir.name === 'slot'
4161:           )
4162:         }
4163:         if (arg && arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION && !arg.isStatic) {
4164:           dir.arg = processExpression(arg, context)
4165:         }
4166:       }
4167:     }
4168:   }
4169: }
4170: 
4171: // Important: since this function uses Node.js only dependencies, it should
4172: // always be used with a leading !__BROWSER__ check so that it can be
4173: // tree-shaken from the browser build.
4174: function processExpression(
4175:   node,
4176:   context,
4177:   // some expressions like v-slot props & v-for aliases should be parsed as
4178:   // function params
4179:   asParams = false,
4180:   // v-on handler values may contain multiple statements
4181:   asRawStatements = false,
4182:   localVars = Object.create(context.identifiers)
4183: ) {
4184:   if (__BROWSER__) {
4185:     return node
4186:   }
4187: 
4188:   if (!context.prefixIdentifiers || !node.content.trim()) {
4189:     return node
4190:   }
4191: 
4192:   const { inline, bindingMetadata } = context
4193:   const rewriteIdentifier = (raw, parent, id) => {
4194:     const type = hasOwn(bindingMetadata, raw) && bindingMetadata[raw]
4195:     if (inline) {
4196:       // x = y
4197:       const isAssignmentLVal =
4198:         parent && parent.type === 'AssignmentExpression' && parent.left === id
4199:       // x++
4200:       const isUpdateArg =
4201:         parent && parent.type === 'UpdateExpression' && parent.argument === id
4202:       // ({ x } = y)
4203:       const isDestructureAssignment =
4204:         parent && isInDestructureAssignment(parent, parentStack)
4205: 
4206:       if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST || localVars[raw]) {
4207:         return raw
4208:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_REF) {
4209:         return `${raw}.value`
4210:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_MAYBE_REF) {
4211:         // const binding that may or may not be ref
4212:         // if it's not a ref, then assignments don't make sense -
4213:         // so we ignore the non-ref assignment case and generate code
4214:         // that assumes the value to be a ref for more efficiency
4215:         return isAssignmentLVal || isUpdateArg || isDestructureAssignment
4216:           ? `${raw}.value`
4217:           : `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
4218:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_LET) {
4219:         if (isAssignmentLVal) {
4220:           // let binding.
4221:           // this is a bit more tricky as we need to cover the case where
4222:           // let is a local non-ref value, and we need to replicate the
4223:           // right hand side value.
4224:           // x = y --> isRef(x) ? x.value = y : x = y
4225:           const { right: rVal, operator } = parent
4226:           const rExp = rawExp.slice(rVal.start - 1, rVal.end - 1)
4227:           const rExpString = stringifyExpression(
4228:             processExpression(
4229:               createSimpleExpression(rExp, false),
4230:               context,
4231:               false,
4232:               false,
4233:               knownIds
4234:             )
4235:           )
4236:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${raw}.value ${operator} ${rExpString} : ${raw}`
4237:         } else if (isUpdateArg) {
4238:           // make id replace parent in the code range so the raw update operator
4239:           // is removed
4240:           id.start = parent.start
4241:           id.end = parent.end
4242:           const { prefix: isPrefix, operator } = parent
4243:           const prefix = isPrefix ? operator : ``
4244:           const postfix = isPrefix ? `` : operator
4245:           // let binding.
4246:           // x++ --> isRef(a) ? a.value++ : a++
4247:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${prefix}${raw}.value${postfix} : ${prefix}${raw}${postfix}`
4248:         } else if (isDestructureAssignment) {
4249:           // TODO
4250:           // let binding in a destructure assignment - it's very tricky to
4251:           // handle both possible cases here without altering the original
4252:           // structure of the code, so we just assume it's not a ref here
4253:           // for now
4254:           return raw
4255:         } else {
4256:           return `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
4257:         }
4258:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS) {
4259:         // use __props which is generated by compileScript so in ts mode
4260:         // it gets correct type
4261:         return `__props.${raw}`
4262:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
4263:         // prop with a different local alias (from defineProps() destructure)
4264:         return `__props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
4265:       }
4266:     } else {
4267:       if (type && type.startsWith('setup')) {
4268:         // setup bindings in non-inline mode
4269:         return `$setup.${raw}`
4270:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
4271:         return `$props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
4272:       } else if (type) {
4273:         return `$${type}.${raw}`
4274:       }
4275:     }
4276: 
4277:     // fallback to ctx
4278:     return `_ctx.${raw}`
4279:   }
4280: 
4281:   // fast path if expression is a simple identifier.
4282:   const rawExp = node.content
4283:   // bail constant on parens (function invocation) and dot (member access)
4284:   const bailConstant = rawExp.indexOf(`(`) > -1 || rawExp.indexOf('.') > 0
4285: 
4286:   logg(`processExpression - node.content: ${rawExp}`)
4287:   if (isSimpleIdentifier(rawExp)) {
4288:     const isScopeVarReference = context.identifiers[rawExp]
4289:     const isAllowedGlobal = isGloballyWhitelisted(rawExp)
4290:     const isLiteral = isLiteralWhitelisted(rawExp)
4291:     if (!asParams && !isScopeVarReference && !isAllowedGlobal && !isLiteral) {
4292:       // const bindings exposed from setup can be skipped for patching but
4293:       // cannot be hoisted to module scope
4294:       if (bindingMetadata[node.content] === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST) {
4295:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_SKIP_PATCH
4296:       }
4297:       node.content = rewriteIdentifier(rawExp)
4298:     } else if (!isScopeVarReference) {
4299:       if (isLiteral) {
4300:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
4301:       } else {
4302:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
4303:       }
4304:     }
4305:     return node
4306:   }
4307: 
4308:   let ast
4309:   // exp needs to be parsed differently:
4310:   // 1. Multiple inline statements (v-on, with presence of `;`): parse as raw
4311:   //    exp, but make sure to pad with spaces for consistent ranges
4312:   // 2. Expressions: wrap with parens (for e.g. object expressions)
4313:   // 3. Function arguments (v-for, v-slot): place in a function argument position
4314:   const source = asRawStatements
4315:     ? ` ${rawExp} `
4316:     : `(${rawExp})${asParams ? `=>{}` : ``}`
4317:   try {
4318:     ast = babelParser.parse(source, {
4319:       plugins: context.expressionPlugins
4320:     }).program
4321:   } catch (e) {
4322:     return node
4323:   }
4324: 
4325:   logg(`processExpression - babel parse`, ast)
4326:   const ids = []
4327:   const parentStack = []
4328:   const knownIds = Object.create(context.identifiers)
4329: 
4330:   walkIdentifiers(
4331:     ast,
4332:     (node, parent, _, isReferenced, isLocal) => {
4333:       if (isStaticPropertyKey(node, parent)) {
4334:         return
4335:       }
4336: 
4337:       const needPrefix = isReferenced && canPrefix(node)
4338:       if (needPrefix && !isLocal) {
4339:         if (isStaticProperty(parent) && parent.shorthand) {
4340:           // property shorthand like { foo }, we need to add the key since
4341:           // we rewrite the value
4342:           node.prefix = `${node.name}: `
4343:         }
4344:         node.name = rewriteIdentifier(node.name, parent, node)
4345:         ids.push(node)
4346:       } else {
4347:         // The identifier is considered constant unless it's pointing to a
4348:         // local scope variable (a v-for alias, or a v-slot prop)
4349:         if (!(needPrefix && isLocal) && !bailConstant) {
4350:           node.isConstant = true
4351:         }
4352:         // also generate sub-expressions for other identifiers for better
4353:         // source map support. (except for property keys which are static)
4354:         ids.push(node)
4355:       }
4356:     },
4357:     true, // invoke on ALL identifiers
4358:     parentStack,
4359:     knownIds
4360:   )
4361: 
4362:   // We break up the compound expression into an array of strings and sub
4363:   // expressions (for identifiers that have been prefixed). In codegen, if
4364:   // an ExpressionNode has the `.children` property, it will be used instead of
4365:   // `.content`.
4366:   const children = []
4367:   ids.sort((a, b) => a.start - b.start)
4368:   ids.forEach((id, i) => {
4369:     // range is offset by -1 due to the wrapping parens when parsed
4370:     const start = id.start - 1
4371:     const end = id.end - 1
4372:     const last = ids[i - 1]
4373:     const leadingText = rawExp.slice(last ? last.end - 1 : 0, start)
4374:     if (leadingText.length || id.prefix) {
4375:       children.push(leadingText + (id.prefix || ``))
4376:     }
4377:     const source = rawExp.slice(start, end)
4378:     children.push(
4379:       createSimpleExpression(
4380:         id.name,
4381:         false,
4382:         {
4383:           source,
4384:           start: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, start),
4385:           end: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, end)
4386:         },
4387:         id.isConstant ? ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY : ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
4388:       )
4389:     )
4390:     if (i === ids.length - 1 && end < rawExp.length) {
4391:       children.push(rawExp.slice(end))
4392:     }
4393:   })
4394: 
4395:   let ret
4396:   if (children.length) {
4397:     ret = createCompoundExpression(children, node.loc)
4398:   } else {
4399:     ret = node
4400:     ret.constType = bailConstant
4401:       ? ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
4402:       : ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
4403:   }
4404:   ret.identifiers = Object.keys(knownIds)
4405:   return ret
4406: }
4407: 
4408: function canPrefix(id) {
4409:   // skip whitelisted globals
4410:   if (isGloballyWhitelisted(id.name)) {
4411:     return false
4412:   }
4413:   // special case for webpack compilation
4414:   if (id.name === 'require') {
4415:     return false
4416:   }
4417:   return true
4418: }
4419: 
4420: function stringifyExpression(exp) {
4421:   if (isString(exp)) {
4422:     return exp
4423:   } else if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
4424:     return exp.content
4425:   } else {
4426:     return (exp.children)
4427:       .map(stringifyExpression)
4428:       .join('')
4429:   }
4430: }
4431: 
4432: const transformSlotOutlet = (node, context) => {
4433:   if (isSlotOutlet(node)) { // <slot/>
4434:     const { children, loc } = node
4435:     const { slotName, slotProps } = processSlotOutlet(node, context)
4436: 
4437:     const slotArgs = [
4438:       context.prefixIdentifiers ? `_ctx.$slots` : `$slots`,
4439:       slotName,
4440:       '{}', //  props
4441:       'undefined', // children
4442:       'true'
4443:     ]
4444:     let expectedLen = 2
4445: 
4446:     if (slotProps) {
4447:       slotArgs[2] = slotProps
4448:       expectedLen = 3
4449:     }
4450: 
4451:     if (children.length) {
4452:       slotArgs[3] = createFunctionExpression([], children, false, false, loc)
4453:       expectedLen = 4
4454:     }
4455: 
4456:     if (context.scopeId && !context.slotted) {
4457:       expectedLen = 5
4458:     }
4459:     slotArgs.splice(expectedLen) // remove unused arguments
4460: 
4461:     // -> renderSlot($slots, slotName, props, children, true)
4462:     node.codegenNode = createCallExpression(
4463:       context.helper(RENDER_SLOT), // renderSlot
4464:       slotArgs,
4465:       loc
4466:     )
4467:   }
4468: }
4469: 
4470: function processSlotOutlet(
4471:   node,
4472:   context
4473: ) {
4474:   let slotName = `"default"`
4475:   let slotProps = undefined
4476: 
4477:   const nonNameProps = [] // 无名插槽
4478:   logg(`processSlotOutlet| props.length = ${node.props.length}`)
4479:   for (let i = 0; i < node.props.length; i++) {
4480:     const p = node.props[i]
4481:     logg(`processSlotOutlet| props[${i}]`, p)
4482:     if (p.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE) { // 静态 <slot name="xxx"/>
4483:       if (p.value) {
4484:         if (p.name === 'name') {
4485:           slotName = JSON.stringify(p.value.content)
4486:         } else {
4487:           p.name = camelize(p.name)
4488:           nonNameProps.push(p)
4489:         }
4490:       }
4491:     } else { // 动态 <slot :name="xxx"/>
4492:       // 动态插槽 <slot v-bind:name="slotName"/>
4493:       if (p.name === 'bind' && isStaticArgOf(p.arg, 'name')) {
4494:         if (p.exp) slotName = p.exp
4495:       } else {
4496:         if (p.name === 'bind' && p.arg && isStaticExp(p.arg)) {
4497:           p.arg.content = camelize(p.arg.content)
4498:         }
4499:         nonNameProps.push(p)
4500:       }
4501:     }
4502:   }
4503: 
4504:   logg(`processSlotOutlet| nonNameProps.length=${nonNameProps.length}`)
4505:   if (nonNameProps.length > 0) {
4506:     const { props, directives } = buildProps(node, context, nonNameProps)
4507:     slotProps = props
4508: 
4509:     if (directives.length) {
4510:       logg('[ERROR] X_V_SLOT_UNEXPECTED_DIRECTIVE_ON_SLOT_OUTLET')
4511:     }
4512:   }
4513: 
4514:   return {
4515:     slotName,
4516:     slotProps
4517:   }
4518: }
4519: // Merge adjacent text nodes and expressions into a single expression
4520: // e.g. <div>abc {{ d }} {{ e }}</div> should have a single expression node as child.
4521: const transformText = (node, context) => {
4522:   if (
4523:     node.type === NodeTypes.ROOT ||
4524:     node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT ||
4525:     node.type === NodeTypes.FOR ||
4526:     node.type === NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH
4527:   ) {
4528:     // perform the transform on node exit so that all expressions have already
4529:     // been processed.
4530:     return () => {
4531:       const children = node.children
4532:       let currentContainer = undefined
4533:       let hasText = false
4534: 
4535:       for (let i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
4536:         const child = children[i]
4537:         if (isText(child)) {
4538:           hasText = true
4539:           for (let j = i + 1; j < children.length; j++) {
4540:             const next = children[j]
4541:             if (isText(next)) {
4542:               if (!currentContainer) {
4543:                 currentContainer = children[i] = {
4544:                   type: NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION,
4545:                   loc: child.loc,
4546:                   children: [child]
4547:                 }
4548:               }
4549:               // merge adjacent text node into current
4550:               currentContainer.children.push(` + `, next)
4551:               children.splice(j, 1)
4552:               j--
4553:             } else {
4554:               currentContainer = undefined
4555:               break
4556:             }
4557:           }
4558:         }
4559:       }
4560: 
4561:       if (
4562:         !hasText ||
4563:         // if this is a plain element with a single text child, leave it
4564:         // as-is since the runtime has dedicated fast path for this by directly
4565:         // setting textContent of the element.
4566:         // for component root it's always normalized anyway.
4567:         (children.length === 1 &&
4568:           (node.type === NodeTypes.ROOT ||
4569:             (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT &&
4570:               node.tagType === ElementTypes.ELEMENT &&
4571:               // #3756
4572:               // custom directives can potentially add DOM elements arbitrarily,
4573:               // we need to avoid setting textContent of the element at runtime
4574:               // to avoid accidentally overwriting the DOM elements added
4575:               // by the user through custom directives.
4576:               !node.props.find(
4577:                 p =>
4578:                   p.type === NodeTypes.DIRECTIVE &&
4579:                   !context.directiveTransforms[p.name]
4580:               ))))
4581:       ) {
4582:         return
4583:       }
4584: 
4585:       // pre-convert text nodes into createTextVNode(text) calls to avoid
4586:       // runtime normalization.
4587:       for (let i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
4588:         const child = children[i]
4589:         if (isText(child) || child.type === NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION) {
4590:           const callArgs = []
4591:           // createTextVNode defaults to single whitespace, so if it is a
4592:           // single space the code could be an empty call to save bytes.
4593:           if (child.type !== NodeTypes.TEXT || child.content !== ' ') {
4594:             callArgs.push(child)
4595:           }
4596:           // mark dynamic text with flag so it gets patched inside a block
4597:           if (
4598:             !context.ssr &&
4599:             getConstantType(child, context) === ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
4600:           ) {
4601:             callArgs.push(
4602:               PatchFlags.TEXT +
4603:                 (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${PatchFlagNames[PatchFlags.TEXT]} */` : ``)
4604:             )
4605:           }
4606:           children[i] = {
4607:             type: NodeTypes.TEXT_CALL,
4608:             content: child,
4609:             loc: child.loc,
4610:             codegenNode: createCallExpression(
4611:               context.helper(CREATE_TEXT),
4612:               callArgs
4613:             )
4614:           }
4615:         }
4616:       }
4617:     }
4618:   }
4619: }
4620: // v-bind without arg is handled directly in ./transformElements.ts due to it affecting
4621: // codegen for the entire props object. This transform here is only for v-bind
4622: // *with* args.
4623: const transformBind = (dir, _node, context) => {
4624:   const { exp, modifiers, loc } = dir
4625:   const arg = dir.arg
4626: 
4627:   if (arg.type !== NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
4628:     arg.children.unshift(`(`)
4629:     arg.children.push(`) || ""`)
4630:   } else if (!arg.isStatic) {
4631:     arg.content = `${arg.content} || ""`
4632:   }
4633: 
4634:   // .sync is replaced by v-model:arg
4635:   if (modifiers.includes('camel')) {
4636:     if (arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
4637:       if (arg.isStatic) {
4638:         arg.content = camelize(arg.content)
4639:       } else {
4640:         arg.content = `${context.helperString(CAMELIZE)}(${arg.content})`
4641:       }
4642:     } else {
4643:       arg.children.unshift(`${context.helperString(CAMELIZE)}(`)
4644:       arg.children.push(`)`)
4645:     }
4646:   }
4647: 
4648:   if (!context.inSSR) {
4649:     if (modifiers.includes('prop')) {
4650:       injectPrefix(arg, '.')
4651:     }
4652:     if (modifiers.includes('attr')) {
4653:       injectPrefix(arg, '^')
4654:     }
4655:   }
4656: 
4657:   if (
4658:     !exp ||
4659:     (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION && !exp.content.trim())
4660:   ) {
4661:     logg(`transformBind v-bind no expression`)
4662:     return {
4663:       props: [createObjectProperty(arg, createSimpleExpression('', true, loc))]
4664:     }
4665:   }
4666: 
4667:   return {
4668:     props: [createObjectProperty(arg, exp)]
4669:   }
4670: }
4671: 
4672: const injectPrefix = (arg, prefix) => {
4673:   if (arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
4674:     if (arg.isStatic) {
4675:       arg.content = prefix + arg.content
4676:     } else {
4677:       arg.content = `\`${prefix}\${${arg.content}}\``
4678:     }
4679:   } else {
4680:     arg.children.unshift(`'${prefix}' + (`)
4681:     arg.children.push(`)`)
4682:   }
4683: }
4684: 
4685: const transformFor = createStructuralDirectiveTransform(
4686:   'for',
4687:   (node, dir, context) => {
4688:     const { helper, removeHelper } = context
4689:     return processFor(node, dir, context, forNode => {
4690:       // create the loop render function expression now, and add the
4691:       // iterator on exit after all children have been traversed
4692:       const renderExp = createCallExpression(helper(RENDER_LIST), [
4693:         forNode.source
4694:       ])
4695:       const isTemplate = isTemplateNode(node)
4696:       const memo = findDir(node, 'memo')
4697:       const keyProp = findProp(node, `key`)
4698:       const keyExp =
4699:         keyProp &&
4700:         (keyProp.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE
4701:           ? createSimpleExpression(keyProp.value.content, true)
4702:           : keyProp.exp)
4703:       const keyProperty = keyProp ? createObjectProperty(`key`, keyExp) : null
4704: 
4705:       if (!__BROWSER__ && isTemplate) {
4706:         // #2085 / #5288 process :key and v-memo expressions need to be
4707:         // processed on `<template v-for>`. In this case the node is discarded
4708:         // and never traversed so its binding expressions won't be processed
4709:         // by the normal transforms.
4710:         if (memo) {
4711:           memo.exp = processExpression(
4712:             memo.exp ,
4713:             context
4714:           )
4715:         }
4716:         if (keyProperty && keyProp.type !== NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE) {
4717:           keyProperty.value = processExpression(
4718:             keyProperty.value ,
4719:             context
4720:           )
4721:         }
4722:       }
4723: 
4724:       const isStableFragment =
4725:         forNode.source.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION &&
4726:         forNode.source.constType > ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
4727:       const fragmentFlag = isStableFragment
4728:         ? PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT
4729:         : keyProp
4730:         ? PatchFlags.KEYED_FRAGMENT
4731:         : PatchFlags.UNKEYED_FRAGMENT
4732: 
4733:       forNode.codegenNode = createVNodeCall(
4734:         context,
4735:         helper(FRAGMENT),
4736:         undefined,
4737:         renderExp,
4738:         fragmentFlag +
4739:           (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${PatchFlagNames[fragmentFlag]} */` : ``),
4740:         undefined,
4741:         undefined,
4742:         true /* isBlock */,
4743:         !isStableFragment /* disableTracking */,
4744:         false /* isComponent */,
4745:         node.loc
4746:       )
4747: 
4748:       return () => {
4749:         // finish the codegen now that all children have been traversed
4750:         let childBlock
4751:         const { children } = forNode
4752: 
4753:         // check <template v-for> key placement
4754:         if ((__DEV__ || !__BROWSER__) && isTemplate) {
4755:           node.children.some(c => {
4756:             if (c.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
4757:               const key = findProp(c, 'key')
4758:               if (key) {
4759:                 logg(`transformFor - key on template`)
4760:                 return true
4761:               }
4762:             }
4763:           })
4764:         }
4765: 
4766:         const needFragmentWrapper =
4767:           children.length !== 1 || children[0].type !== NodeTypes.ELEMENT
4768:         const slotOutlet = isSlotOutlet(node)
4769:           ? node
4770:           : isTemplate &&
4771:             node.children.length === 1 &&
4772:             isSlotOutlet(node.children[0])
4773:           ? node.children[0] // api-extractor somehow fails to infer this
4774:           : null
4775: 
4776:         if (slotOutlet) {
4777:           // <slot v-for="..."> or <template v-for="..."><slot/></template>
4778:           childBlock = slotOutlet.codegenNode
4779:           if (isTemplate && keyProperty) {
4780:             // <template v-for="..." :key="..."><slot/></template>
4781:             // we need to inject the key to the renderSlot() call.
4782:             // the props for renderSlot is passed as the 3rd argument.
4783:             injectProp(childBlock, keyProperty, context)
4784:           }
4785:         } else if (needFragmentWrapper) {
4786:           // <template v-for="..."> with text or multi-elements
4787:           // should generate a fragment block for each loop
4788:           childBlock = createVNodeCall(
4789:             context,
4790:             helper(FRAGMENT),
4791:             keyProperty ? createObjectExpression([keyProperty]) : undefined,
4792:             node.children,
4793:             PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT +
4794:               (__DEV__
4795:                 ? ` /* ${PatchFlagNames[PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT]} */`
4796:                 : ``),
4797:             undefined,
4798:             undefined,
4799:             true,
4800:             undefined,
4801:             false /* isComponent */
4802:           )
4803:         } else {
4804:           // Normal element v-for. Directly use the child's codegenNode
4805:           // but mark it as a block.
4806:           childBlock = children[0].codegenNode
4807:           if (isTemplate && keyProperty) {
4808:             injectProp(childBlock, keyProperty, context)
4809:           }
4810:           if (childBlock.isBlock !== !isStableFragment) {
4811:             if (childBlock.isBlock) {
4812:               // switch from block to vnode
4813:               removeHelper(OPEN_BLOCK)
4814:               removeHelper(
4815:                 getVNodeBlockHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent)
4816:               )
4817:             } else {
4818:               // switch from vnode to block
4819:               removeHelper(
4820:                 getVNodeHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent)
4821:               )
4822:             }
4823:           }
4824:           childBlock.isBlock = !isStableFragment
4825:           if (childBlock.isBlock) {
4826:             helper(OPEN_BLOCK)
4827:             helper(getVNodeBlockHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent))
4828:           } else {
4829:             helper(getVNodeHelper(context.inSSR, childBlock.isComponent))
4830:           }
4831:         }
4832: 
4833:         if (memo) {
4834:           const loop = createFunctionExpression(
4835:             createForLoopParams(forNode.parseResult, [
4836:               createSimpleExpression(`_cached`)
4837:             ])
4838:           )
4839:           loop.body = createBlockStatement([
4840:             createCompoundExpression([`const _memo = (`, memo.exp, `)`]),
4841:             createCompoundExpression([
4842:               `if (_cached`,
4843:               ...(keyExp ? [` && _cached.key === `, keyExp] : []),
4844:               ` && ${context.helperString(
4845:                 IS_MEMO_SAME
4846:               )}(_cached, _memo)) return _cached`
4847:             ]),
4848:             createCompoundExpression([`const _item = `, childBlock]),
4849:             createSimpleExpression(`_item.memo = _memo`),
4850:             createSimpleExpression(`return _item`)
4851:           ])
4852:           renderExp.arguments.push(
4853:             loop,
4854:             createSimpleExpression(`_cache`),
4855:             createSimpleExpression(String(context.cached++))
4856:           )
4857:         } else {
4858:           renderExp.arguments.push(
4859:             createFunctionExpression(
4860:               createForLoopParams(forNode.parseResult),
4861:               childBlock,
4862:               true /* force newline */
4863:             )
4864:           )
4865:         }
4866:       }
4867:     })
4868:   }
4869: )
4870: 
4871: // target-agnostic transform used for both Client and SSR
4872: function processFor(
4873:   node,
4874:   dir,
4875:   context,
4876:   processCodegen
4877: ) {
4878:   if (!dir.exp) {
4879:     logg(`processFor - dir.exp is null`)
4880:     return
4881:   }
4882: 
4883:   const parseResult = parseForExpression(
4884:     // can only be simple expression because vFor transform is applied
4885:     // before expression transform.
4886:     dir.exp,
4887:     context
4888:   )
4889: 
4890:   if (!parseResult) {
4891:     logg(`processFor - parseResult is null`)
4892:     return
4893:   }
4894: 
4895:   const { addIdentifiers, removeIdentifiers, scopes } = context
4896:   const { source, value, key, index } = parseResult
4897: 
4898:   const forNode = {
4899:     type: NodeTypes.FOR,
4900:     loc: dir.loc,
4901:     source,
4902:     valueAlias: value,
4903:     keyAlias: key,
4904:     objectIndexAlias: index,
4905:     parseResult,
4906:     children: isTemplateNode(node) ? node.children : [node]
4907:   }
4908: 
4909:   context.replaceNode(forNode)
4910: 
4911:   // bookkeeping
4912:   scopes.vFor++
4913:   if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
4914:     // scope management
4915:     // inject identifiers to context
4916:     value && addIdentifiers(value)
4917:     key && addIdentifiers(key)
4918:     index && addIdentifiers(index)
4919:   }
4920: 
4921:   const onExit = processCodegen && processCodegen(forNode)
4922: 
4923:   return () => {
4924:     scopes.vFor--
4925:     if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
4926:       value && removeIdentifiers(value)
4927:       key && removeIdentifiers(key)
4928:       index && removeIdentifiers(index)
4929:     }
4930:     if (onExit) onExit()
4931:   }
4932: }
4933: 
4934: const forAliasRE = /([\s\S]*?)\s+(?:in|of)\s+([\s\S]*)/
4935: // This regex doesn't cover the case if key or index aliases have destructuring,
4936: // but those do not make sense in the first place, so this works in practice.
4937: const forIteratorRE = /,([^,\}\]]*)(?:,([^,\}\]]*))?$/
4938: const stripParensRE = /^\(|\)$/g
4939: 
4940: function parseForExpression(
4941:   input,
4942:   context
4943: ) {
4944:   const loc = input.loc
4945:   const exp = input.content
4946:   const inMatch = exp.match(forAliasRE)
4947:   if (!inMatch) return
4948: 
4949:   const [, LHS, RHS] = inMatch
4950: 
4951:   const result = {
4952:     source: createAliasExpression(
4953:       loc,
4954:       RHS.trim(),
4955:       exp.indexOf(RHS, LHS.length)
4956:     ),
4957:     value: undefined,
4958:     key: undefined,
4959:     index: undefined
4960:   }
4961:   if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
4962:     result.source = processExpression(
4963:       result.source,
4964:       context
4965:     )
4966:   }
4967: 
4968:   let valueContent = LHS.trim().replace(stripParensRE, '').trim()
4969:   const trimmedOffset = LHS.indexOf(valueContent)
4970: 
4971:   const iteratorMatch = valueContent.match(forIteratorRE)
4972:   if (iteratorMatch) {
4973:     valueContent = valueContent.replace(forIteratorRE, '').trim()
4974: 
4975:     const keyContent = iteratorMatch[1].trim()
4976:     let keyOffset
4977:     if (keyContent) {
4978:       keyOffset = exp.indexOf(keyContent, trimmedOffset + valueContent.length)
4979:       result.key = createAliasExpression(loc, keyContent, keyOffset)
4980:       if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
4981:         result.key = processExpression(result.key, context, true)
4982:       }
4983:     }
4984: 
4985:     if (iteratorMatch[2]) {
4986:       const indexContent = iteratorMatch[2].trim()
4987: 
4988:       if (indexContent) {
4989:         result.index = createAliasExpression(
4990:           loc,
4991:           indexContent,
4992:           exp.indexOf(
4993:             indexContent,
4994:             result.key
4995:               ? keyOffset + keyContent.length
4996:               : trimmedOffset + valueContent.length
4997:           )
4998:         )
4999:         if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
5000:           result.index = processExpression(result.index, context, true)
5001:         }
5002:       }
5003:     }
5004:   }
5005: 
5006:   if (valueContent) {
5007:     result.value = createAliasExpression(loc, valueContent, trimmedOffset)
5008:     if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
5009:       result.value = processExpression(result.value, context, true)
5010:     }
5011:   }
5012: 
5013:   return result
5014: }
5015: 
5016: function createAliasExpression(
5017:   range,
5018:   content,
5019:   offset
5020: ) {
5021:   return createSimpleExpression(
5022:     content,
5023:     false,
5024:     getInnerRange(range, offset, content.length)
5025:   )
5026: }
5027: 
5028: function createForLoopParams(
5029:   { value, key, index },
5030:   memoArgs = []
5031: ) {
5032:   return createParamsList([value, key, index, ...memoArgs])
5033: }
5034: 
5035: function createParamsList(args) {
5036:   let i = args.length
5037:   while (i--) {
5038:     if (args[i]) break
5039:   }
5040:   return args
5041:     .slice(0, i + 1)
5042:     .map((arg, i) => arg || createSimpleExpression(`_`.repeat(i + 1), false))
5043: }
5044: function processIf(node, dir, context, processCodegen) {
5045:   logg('processIf - node - dir', node, dir)
5046:   if (
5047:     dir.name !== 'else' &&
5048:     (!dir.exp || !dir.exp.content.trim())
5049:   ) {
5050:     const loc = dir.exp ? dir.exp.loc : node.loc
5051:     // <div v-if></div> 没有指令值的情况，默认值为 true
5052:     dir.exp = createSimpleExpression(`true`, false, loc)
5053:   }
5054: 
5055:   if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers && dir.exp) {
5056:     // dir.exp can only be simple expression because vIf transform is applied
5057:     // before expression transform.
5058:     dir.exp = processExpression(dir.exp, context)
5059:   }
5060: 
5061:   if (dir.name === 'if') { // v-if
5062:     const branch = createIfBranch(node, dir)
5063:     const ifNode = {
5064:       type: NodeTypes.IF,
5065:       loc: node.loc,
5066:       branches: [branch]
5067:     }
5068:     context.replaceNode(ifNode)
5069:     if (processCodegen) {
5070:       return processCodegen(ifNode, branch, true)
5071:     }
5072:   } else {
5073:     // locate the adjacent v-if
5074:     const siblings = context.parent.children
5075:     const comments = []
5076:     let i = siblings.indexOf(node)
5077:     while (i-- >= -1) {
5078:       const sibling = siblings[i]
5079: 
5080:       // 空行，空文本
5081:       if (
5082:         sibling &&
5083:         sibling.type === NodeTypes.TEXT &&
5084:         !sibling.content.trim().length
5085:       ) {
5086:         context.removeNode(sibling)
5087:         continue
5088:       }
5089: 
5090:       if (sibling && sibling.type === NodeTypes.IF) {
5091:         // 这里会将原本的结点删除，而是用新组装的 if 结构(包含else-if, else 分支的结构，node.branches[...])
5092:         context.removeNode()
5093:         const branch = createIfBranch(node, dir)
5094:         sibling.branches.push(branch)
5095: 
5096:         const onExit = processCodegen && processCodegen(sibling, branch, false)
5097:         // 这里需要手动触发一次遍历，因为上面将原本的分支节点从原来的节点树中删除了
5098:         traverseNode(branch, context)
5099:         // 回溯结束后执行收集到的 transformXxx 函数
5100:         if (onExit) onExit()
5101:         // make sure to reset currentNode after traversal to indicate this
5102:         // node has been removed.
5103:         context.currentNode = null
5104:       }
5105:       break
5106:     }
5107:   }
5108: }
5109: function createIfBranch(node, dir) {
5110:   return {
5111:     type: NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH,
5112:     loc: node.loc,
5113:     condition: dir.name === 'else' ? undefined : dir.exp,
5114:     children:
5115:       node.tagType === ElementTypes.TEMPLATE && !findDir(node, 'for')
5116:         ? node.children
5117:         : [node],
5118:     userKey: findProp(node, `key`)
5119:   }
5120: }
5121: function createCodegenNodeForBranch(branch, keyIndex, context) {
5122:   if (branch.condition) {
5123:     return createConditionalExpression(
5124:       branch.condition,
5125:       createChildrenCodegenNode(branch, keyIndex, context),
5126:       // 这里是考虑到只有 v-if 的情况，因为 v-if 指令最后都会被解析成三目运算符形式
5127:       // 如： <div v-if="foo"/><div v-else/> => foo ? ... : ...
5128:       // 如： <div v-if="foo"/><div v-else-if="bar"/><div v-else/> => foo ? ... : bar ? ... : ...
5129:       // 所以必需得要有一个 v-else，如果没有的话就相当于是 `foo ? ...` 这样的语句是不合法的
5130:       // 因此这里在判断没有 v-else 分支的情况时默认给它创建了个注释节点
5131:       createCallExpression(context.helper(CREATE_COMMENT), [
5132:         __DEV__ ? '"v-if"' : '""',
5133:         'true'
5134:       ])
5135:     )
5136:   } else {
5137:     return createChildrenCodegenNode(branch, keyIndex, context)
5138:   }
5139: }
5140: function createChildrenCodegenNode(branch, keyIndex, context) {
5141:   const { helper } = context
5142:   const keyProperty = createObjectProperty(
5143:     `key`,
5144:     createSimpleExpression(
5145:       `${keyIndex}`,
5146:       false,
5147:       locStub,
5148:       ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
5149:     )
5150:   )
5151:   const { children } = branch
5152:   const firstChild = children[0]
5153:   const needFragmentWrapper =
5154:     children.length !== 1 || firstChild.type !== NodeTypes.ELEMENT
5155:   if (needFragmentWrapper) {
5156:     if (children.length === 1 && firstChild.type === NodeTypes.FOR) {
5157:       // optimize away nested fragments when child is a ForNode
5158:       const vnodeCall = firstChild.codegenNode
5159:       injectProp(vnodeCall, keyProperty, context)
5160:       return vnodeCall
5161:     } else {
5162:       let patchFlag = PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT
5163:       let patchFlagText = PatchFlagNames[PatchFlags.STABLE_FRAGMENT]
5164: 
5165:       return createVNodeCall(
5166:         context,
5167:         helper(FRAGMENT),
5168:         createObjectExpression([keyProperty]),
5169:         children,
5170:         patchFlag + (__DEV__ ? ` /* ${patchFlagText} */` : ``),
5171:         undefined,
5172:         undefined,
5173:         true,
5174:         false,
5175:         false /* isComponent */,
5176:         branch.loc
5177:       )
5178:     }
5179:   } else {
5180:     const ret = firstChild.codegenNode
5181:     const vnodeCall = getMemoedVNodeCall(ret)
5182:     // Change createVNode to createBlock.
5183:     if (vnodeCall.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
5184:       makeBlock(vnodeCall, context)
5185:     }
5186:     // inject branch key
5187:     injectProp(vnodeCall, keyProperty, context)
5188:     return ret
5189:   }
5190: }
5191: function isSameKey(a, b) {
5192:   if (!a || a.type !== b.type) {
5193:     return false
5194:   }
5195:   if (a.type === NodeTypes.ATTRIBUTE) {
5196:     if (a.value.content !== b.value.content) {
5197:       return false
5198:     }
5199:   } else {
5200:     // directive
5201:     const exp = a.exp
5202:     const branchExp = b.exp
5203:     if (exp.type !== branchExp.type) {
5204:       return false
5205:     }
5206:     if (
5207:       exp.type !== NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION ||
5208:       exp.isStatic !== branchExp.isStatic ||
5209:       exp.content !== branchExp.content
5210:     ) {
5211:       return false
5212:     }
5213:   }
5214:   return true
5215: }
5216: function getParentCondition(node) {
5217:   while (true) {
5218:     if (node.type === NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION) {
5219:       if (node.alternate.type === NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION) {
5220:         node = node.alternate
5221:       } else {
5222:         return node
5223:       }
5224:     } else if (node.type === NodeTypes.JS_CACHE_EXPRESSION) {
5225:       node = node.value
5226:     }
5227:   }
5228: }
5229: 
5230: 
5231: const transformIf = createStructuralDirectiveTransform(
5232:   /^(if|else|else-if)$/,
5233:   (node, dir, context) => {
5234:     return processIf(node, dir, context, (ifNode, branch, isRoot) => {
