5235:       const siblings = context.parent.children
5236:       // if...else if...else 都处于同级渲染
5237:       let i = siblings.indexOf(ifNode)
5238:       let key = 0
5239:       while (i-- >= 0) {
5240:         const sibling = siblings[i]
5241:         if (sibling && sibling.type === NodeTypes.IF) {
5242:           key += sibling.branches.length
5243:         }
5244:       }
5245: 
5246:       logg('transformIf', ifNode, { isRoot, branch })
5247:       // 退出时的回调，当所有 children 被遍历转换完成时被调用生成 codegenNode
5248:       return () => {
5249:         if (isRoot) { // v-if
5250:           ifNode.codegenNode = createCodegenNodeForBranch(
5251:             branch, key, context
5252:           )
5253:           logg('transformIf - isRoot - v-if', ifNode)
5254:         } else { // v-else, v-else-if
5255:           // 将 v-else-* 分枝挂到 v-if 节点下面
5256:           const parentCondition = getParentCondition(ifNode.codegenNode)
5257:           parentCondition.alternate = createCodegenNodeForBranch(
5258:             branch, key + ifNode.branches.length - 1,
5259:             context
5260:           )
5261:           logg('transformIf - v-else-*', ifNode)
5262:         }
5263:       }
5264: 
5265:     })
5266:   }
5267: )
5268: const memoSeen = new WeakSet()
5269: 
5270: const transformMemo = (node, context) => {
5271:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT) {
5272:     const dir = findDir(node, 'memo')
5273:     if (!dir || memoSeen.has(node)) {
5274:       return
5275:     }
5276:     memoSeen.add(node)
5277:     return () => {
5278:       const codegenNode = node.codegenNode || context.currentNode.codegenNode
5279:       if (codegenNode && codegenNode.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL) {
5280:         // non-component sub tree should be turned into a block
5281:         if (node.tagType !== ElementTypes.COMPONENT) {
5282:           makeBlock(codegenNode, context)
5283:         }
5284:         node.codegenNode = createCallExpression(context.helper(WITH_MEMO), [
5285:           dir.exp,
5286:           createFunctionExpression(undefined, codegenNode),
5287:           `_cache`,
5288:           String(context.cached++)
5289:         ])
5290:       }
5291:     }
5292:   }
5293: }
5294: const transformModel = (dir, node, context) => {
5295:   const { exp, arg } = dir
5296:   if (!exp) {
5297:     logg(`transformModel no exp`)
5298:     return createTransformProps()
5299:   }
5300: 
5301:   const rawExp = exp.loc.source
5302:   const expString =
5303:     exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION ? exp.content : rawExp
5304: 
5305:   // im SFC <script setup> inline mode, the exp may have been transformed into
5306:   // _unref(exp)
5307:   const bindingType = context.bindingMetadata[rawExp]
5308:   const maybeRef =
5309:     !__BROWSER__ &&
5310:     context.inline &&
5311:     bindingType &&
5312:     bindingType !== BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST
5313: 
5314:   if (
5315:     !expString.trim() ||
5316:     (!isMemberExpression(expString, context) && !maybeRef)
5317:   ) {
5318:     return createTransformProps()
5319:   }
5320: 
5321:   if (
5322:     !__BROWSER__ &&
5323:     context.prefixIdentifiers &&
5324:     isSimpleIdentifier(expString) &&
5325:     context.identifiers[expString]
5326:   ) {
5327:     return createTransformProps()
5328:   }
5329: 
5330:   const propName = arg ? arg : createSimpleExpression('modelValue', true)
5331:   const eventName = arg
5332:     ? isStaticExp(arg)
5333:       ? `onUpdate:${arg.content}`
5334:       : createCompoundExpression(['"onUpdate:" + ', arg])
5335:     : `onUpdate:modelValue`
5336: 
5337:   let assignmentExp
5338:   const eventArg = context.isTS ? `($event: any)` : `$event`
5339:   if (maybeRef) {
5340:     if (bindingType === BindingTypes.SETUP_REF) {
5341:       // v-model used on known ref.
5342:       assignmentExp = createCompoundExpression([
5343:         `${eventArg} => ((`,
5344:         createSimpleExpression(rawExp, false, exp.loc),
5345:         `).value = $event)`
5346:       ])
5347:     } else {
5348:       // v-model used on a potentially ref binding in <script setup> inline mode.
5349:       // the assignment needs to check whether the binding is actually a ref.
5350:       const altAssignment =
5351:         bindingType === BindingTypes.SETUP_LET ? `${rawExp} = $event` : `null`
5352:       assignmentExp = createCompoundExpression([
5353:         `${eventArg} => (${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${rawExp}) ? (`,
5354:         createSimpleExpression(rawExp, false, exp.loc),
5355:         `).value = $event : ${altAssignment})`
5356:       ])
5357:     }
5358:   } else {
5359:     assignmentExp = createCompoundExpression([
5360:       `${eventArg} => ((`,
5361:       exp,
5362:       `) = $event)`
5363:     ])
5364:   }
5365: 
5366:   const props = [
5367:     // modelValue: foo
5368:     createObjectProperty(propName, dir.exp),
5369:     // "onUpdate:modelValue": $event => (foo = $event)
5370:     createObjectProperty(eventName, assignmentExp)
5371:   ]
5372: 
5373:   // cache v-model handler if applicable (when it doesn't refer any scope vars)
5374:   if (
5375:     !__BROWSER__ &&
5376:     context.prefixIdentifiers &&
5377:     !context.inVOnce &&
5378:     context.cacheHandlers &&
5379:     !hasScopeRef(exp, context.identifiers)
5380:   ) {
5381:     props[1].value = context.cache(props[1].value)
5382:   }
5383: 
5384:   // modelModifiers: { foo: true, "bar-baz": true }
5385:   if (dir.modifiers.length && node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT) {
5386:     const modifiers = dir.modifiers
5387:       .map(m => (isSimpleIdentifier(m) ? m : JSON.stringify(m)) + `: true`)
5388:       .join(`, `)
5389:     const modifiersKey = arg
5390:       ? isStaticExp(arg)
5391:         ? `${arg.content}Modifiers`
5392:         : createCompoundExpression([arg, ' + "Modifiers"'])
5393:       : `modelModifiers`
5394:     props.push(
5395:       createObjectProperty(
5396:         modifiersKey,
5397:         createSimpleExpression(
5398:           `{ ${modifiers} }`,
5399:           false,
5400:           dir.loc,
5401:           ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
5402:         )
5403:       )
5404:     )
5405:   }
5406: 
5407:   return createTransformProps(props)
5408: }
5409: 
5410: function createTransformProps(props = []) {
5411:   return { props }
5412: }
5413: // 函数表达式正则, @click="fnExp"
5414: const fnExpRE =
5415:   /^\s*([\w$_]+|(async\s*)?\([^)]*?\))\s*=>|^\s*(async\s+)?function(?:\s+[\w$]+)?\s*\(/
5416: 
5417: const transformOn = (
5418:   dir,
5419:   node,
5420:   context,
5421:   augmentor
5422: ) => {
5423:   const { loc, modifiers, arg } = dir
5424: 
5425:   let eventName
5426:   if (arg.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
5427:     if (arg.isStatic) {
5428:       let rawName = arg.content
5429: 
5430:       // 将事件名转成驼峰式
5431:       eventName = createSimpleExpression(
5432:         toHandlerKey(camelize(rawName)),
5433:         true,
5434:         arg.loc
5435:       )
5436:     } else {
5437:       // #2388 toHandlerKey 将事件名转成 onXxx, 如：eventName -> onEventName
5438:       eventName = createCompoundExpression([
5439:         `${context.helperString(TO_HANDLER_KEY)}(`,
5440:         arg,
5441:         `)`
5442:       ])
5443:     }
5444:   } else {
5445:     // already a compound expression.
5446: 
5447:     eventName = arg
5448:     eventName.children.unshift(`${context.helperString(TO_HANDLER_KEY)}(`)
5449:     eventName.children.push(`)`)
5450:   }
5451: 
5452:   // handler processing, 事件表达式内容
5453:   let exp = dir.exp
5454:   if (exp && !exp.content.trim()) {
5455:     exp = undefined
5456:   }
5457:   // 事件处理函数缓存
5458:   let shouldCache = context.cacheHandlers && !exp && !context.inVOnce
5459:   if (exp) {
5460:     const isMemberExp = isMemberExpression(exp.content, context)
5461:     const isInlineStatement = !(isMemberExp || fnExpRE.test(exp.content))
5462:     const hasMultipleStatements = exp.content.includes(`;`)
5463: 
5464:     // process the expression since it's been skipped
5465:     if (!__BROWSER__ && context.prefixIdentifiers) {
5466:       isInlineStatement && context.addIdentifiers(`$event`)
5467:       exp = dir.exp = processExpression(
5468:         exp,
5469:         context,
5470:         false,
5471:         hasMultipleStatements
5472:       )
5473:       isInlineStatement && context.removeIdentifiers(`$event`)
5474:       // with scope analysis, the function is hoistable if it has no reference
5475:       // to scope variables.
5476:       shouldCache =
5477:         context.cacheHandlers &&
5478:         // unnecessary to cache inside v-once
5479:         !context.inVOnce &&
5480:         // runtime constants don't need to be cached
5481:         // (this is analyzed by compileScript in SFC <script setup>)
5482:         !(exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION && exp.constType > 0) &&
5483:         // #1541 bail if this is a member exp handler passed to a component -
5484:         // we need to use the original function to preserve arity,
5485:         // e.g. <transition> relies on checking cb.length to determine
5486:         // transition end handling. Inline function is ok since its arity
5487:         // is preserved even when cached.
5488:         !(isMemberExp && node.tagType === ElementTypes.COMPONENT) &&
5489:         // bail if the function references closure variables (v-for, v-slot)
5490:         // it must be passed fresh to avoid stale values.
5491:         !hasScopeRef(exp, context.identifiers)
5492:       // If the expression is optimizable and is a member expression pointing
5493:       // to a function, turn it into invocation (and wrap in an arrow function
5494:       // below) so that it always accesses the latest value when called - thus
5495:       // avoiding the need to be patched.
5496:       if (shouldCache && isMemberExp) {
5497:         if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
5498:           exp.content = `${exp.content} && ${exp.content}(...args)`
5499:         } else {
5500:           exp.children = [...exp.children, ` && `, ...exp.children, `(...args)`]
5501:         }
5502:       }
5503:     }
5504: 
5505:     if (isInlineStatement || (shouldCache && isMemberExp)) {
5506:       // wrap inline statement in a function expression
5507:       // ($event) => statement
5508:       // (...args) => { statement1;statement2 }
5509:       exp = createCompoundExpression([
5510:         `${
5511:           isInlineStatement
5512:             ? `$event`
5513:             : `(...args)`
5514:         } => ${hasMultipleStatements ? `{` : `(`}`,
5515:         exp,
5516:         hasMultipleStatements ? `}` : `)`
5517:       ])
5518:     }
5519:   }
5520: 
5521:   let ret = {
5522:     props: [
5523:       createObjectProperty(
5524:         eventName,
5525:         exp || createSimpleExpression(`() => {}`, false, loc)
5526:       )
5527:     ]
5528:   }
5529: 
5530:   // apply extended compiler augmentor
5531:   if (augmentor) {
5532:     ret = augmentor(ret)
5533:   }
5534: 
5535:   if (shouldCache) {
5536:     // cache handlers so that it's always the same handler being passed down.
5537:     // this avoids unnecessary re-renders when users use inline handlers on
5538:     // components.
5539:     ret.props[0].value = context.cache(ret.props[0].value)
5540:   }
5541: 
5542:   // mark the key as handler for props normalization check
5543:   ret.props.forEach(p => (p.key.isHandlerKey = true))
5544:   return ret
5545: }
5546: const seen = new WeakSet()
5547: 
5548: const transformOnce = (node, context) => {
5549:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.ELEMENT && findDir(node, 'once', true)) {
5550:     if (seen.has(node) || context.inVOnce) {
5551:       logg(`transformOnce node has seen`)
5552:       return
5553:     }
5554:     seen.add(node)
5555:     context.inVOnce = true
5556:     context.helper(SET_BLOCK_TRACKING)
5557:     return () => {
5558:       context.inVOnce = false
5559:       const cur = context.currentNode
5560:       if (cur.codegenNode) {
5561:         cur.codegenNode = context.cache(cur.codegenNode, true /* isVNode */)
5562:       }
5563:     }
5564:   }
5565: }
5566: // Important: since this function uses Node.js only dependencies, it should
5567: // always be used with a leading !__BROWSER__ check so that it can be
5568: // tree-shaken from the browser build.
5569: function processExpression(
5570:   node,
5571:   context,
5572:   // some expressions like v-slot props & v-for aliases should be parsed as
5573:   // function params
5574:   asParams = false,
5575:   // v-on handler values may contain multiple statements
5576:   asRawStatements = false,
5577:   localVars = Object.create(context.identifiers)
5578: ) {
5579:   if (__BROWSER__) {
5580:     return node
5581:   }
5582: 
5583:   if (!context.prefixIdentifiers || !node.content.trim()) {
5584:     return node
5585:   }
5586: 
5587:   const { inline, bindingMetadata } = context
5588:   const rewriteIdentifier = (raw, parent, id) => {
5589:     const type = hasOwn(bindingMetadata, raw) && bindingMetadata[raw]
5590:     if (inline) {
5591:       // x = y
5592:       const isAssignmentLVal =
5593:         parent && parent.type === 'AssignmentExpression' && parent.left === id
5594:       // x++
5595:       const isUpdateArg =
5596:         parent && parent.type === 'UpdateExpression' && parent.argument === id
5597:       // ({ x } = y)
5598:       const isDestructureAssignment =
5599:         parent && isInDestructureAssignment(parent, parentStack)
5600: 
5601:       if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST || localVars[raw]) {
5602:         return raw
5603:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_REF) {
5604:         return `${raw}.value`
5605:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_MAYBE_REF) {
5606:         // const binding that may or may not be ref
5607:         // if it's not a ref, then assignments don't make sense -
5608:         // so we ignore the non-ref assignment case and generate code
5609:         // that assumes the value to be a ref for more efficiency
5610:         return isAssignmentLVal || isUpdateArg || isDestructureAssignment
5611:           ? `${raw}.value`
5612:           : `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
5613:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.SETUP_LET) {
5614:         if (isAssignmentLVal) {
5615:           // let binding.
5616:           // this is a bit more tricky as we need to cover the case where
5617:           // let is a local non-ref value, and we need to replicate the
5618:           // right hand side value.
5619:           // x = y --> isRef(x) ? x.value = y : x = y
5620:           const { right: rVal, operator } = parent
5621:           const rExp = rawExp.slice(rVal.start - 1, rVal.end - 1)
5622:           const rExpString = stringifyExpression(
5623:             processExpression(
5624:               createSimpleExpression(rExp, false),
5625:               context,
5626:               false,
5627:               false,
5628:               knownIds
5629:             )
5630:           )
5631:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${raw}.value ${operator} ${rExpString} : ${raw}`
5632:         } else if (isUpdateArg) {
5633:           // make id replace parent in the code range so the raw update operator
5634:           // is removed
5635:           id.start = parent.start
5636:           id.end = parent.end
5637:           const { prefix: isPrefix, operator } = parent
5638:           const prefix = isPrefix ? operator : ``
5639:           const postfix = isPrefix ? `` : operator
5640:           // let binding.
5641:           // x++ --> isRef(a) ? a.value++ : a++
5642:           return `${context.helperString(IS_REF)}(${raw})${``} ? ${prefix}${raw}.value${postfix} : ${prefix}${raw}${postfix}`
5643:         } else if (isDestructureAssignment) {
5644:           // TODO
5645:           // let binding in a destructure assignment - it's very tricky to
5646:           // handle both possible cases here without altering the original
5647:           // structure of the code, so we just assume it's not a ref here
5648:           // for now
5649:           return raw
5650:         } else {
5651:           return `${context.helperString(UNREF)}(${raw})`
5652:         }
5653:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS) {
5654:         // use __props which is generated by compileScript so in ts mode
5655:         // it gets correct type
5656:         return `__props.${raw}`
5657:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
5658:         // prop with a different local alias (from defineProps() destructure)
5659:         return `__props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
5660:       }
5661:     } else {
5662:       if (type && type.startsWith('setup')) {
5663:         // setup bindings in non-inline mode
5664:         return `$setup.${raw}`
5665:       } else if (type === BindingTypes.PROPS_ALIASED) {
5666:         return `$props.${bindingMetadata.__propsAliases[raw]}`
5667:       } else if (type) {
5668:         return `$${type}.${raw}`
5669:       }
5670:     }
5671: 
5672:     // fallback to ctx
5673:     return `_ctx.${raw}`
5674:   }
5675: 
5676:   // fast path if expression is a simple identifier.
5677:   const rawExp = node.content
5678:   // bail constant on parens (function invocation) and dot (member access)
5679:   const bailConstant = rawExp.indexOf(`(`) > -1 || rawExp.indexOf('.') > 0
5680: 
5681:   if (isSimpleIdentifier(rawExp)) {
5682:     const isScopeVarReference = context.identifiers[rawExp]
5683:     const isAllowedGlobal = isGloballyWhitelisted(rawExp)
5684:     const isLiteral = isLiteralWhitelisted(rawExp)
5685:     if (!asParams && !isScopeVarReference && !isAllowedGlobal && !isLiteral) {
5686:       // const bindings exposed from setup can be skipped for patching but
5687:       // cannot be hoisted to module scope
5688:       if (bindingMetadata[node.content] === BindingTypes.SETUP_CONST) {
5689:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_SKIP_PATCH
5690:       }
5691:       node.content = rewriteIdentifier(rawExp)
5692:     } else if (!isScopeVarReference) {
5693:       if (isLiteral) {
5694:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
5695:       } else {
5696:         node.constType = ConstantTypes.CAN_HOIST
5697:       }
5698:     }
5699:     return node
5700:   }
5701: 
5702:   let ast
5703:   // exp needs to be parsed differently:
5704:   // 1. Multiple inline statements (v-on, with presence of `;`): parse as raw
5705:   //    exp, but make sure to pad with spaces for consistent ranges
5706:   // 2. Expressions: wrap with parens (for e.g. object expressions)
5707:   // 3. Function arguments (v-for, v-slot): place in a function argument position
5708:   const source = asRawStatements
5709:     ? ` ${rawExp} `
5710:     : `(${rawExp})${asParams ? `=>{}` : ``}`
5711:   try {
5712:     ast = babelParser.parse(source, {
5713:       plugins: context.expressionPlugins
5714:     }).program
5715:   } catch (e) {
5716:     return node
5717:   }
5718: 
5719:   const ids= []
5720:   const parentStack = []
5721:   const knownIds = Object.create(context.identifiers)
5722: 
5723:   walkIdentifiers(
5724:     ast,
5725:     (node, parent, _, isReferenced, isLocal) => {
5726:       if (isStaticPropertyKey(node, parent)) {
5727:         return
5728:       }
5729: 
5730:       const needPrefix = isReferenced && canPrefix(node)
5731:       if (needPrefix && !isLocal) {
5732:         if (isStaticProperty(parent) && parent.shorthand) {
5733:           // property shorthand like { foo }, we need to add the key since
5734:           // we rewrite the value
5735:           node.prefix = `${node.name}: `
5736:         }
5737:         node.name = rewriteIdentifier(node.name, parent, node)
5738:         ids.push(node)
5739:       } else {
5740:         // The identifier is considered constant unless it's pointing to a
5741:         // local scope variable (a v-for alias, or a v-slot prop)
5742:         if (!(needPrefix && isLocal) && !bailConstant) {
5743:           node.isConstant = true
5744:         }
5745:         // also generate sub-expressions for other identifiers for better
5746:         // source map support. (except for property keys which are static)
5747:         ids.push(node)
5748:       }
5749:     },
5750:     true, // invoke on ALL identifiers
5751:     parentStack,
5752:     knownIds
5753:   )
5754: 
5755:   // We break up the compound expression into an array of strings and sub
5756:   // expressions (for identifiers that have been prefixed). In codegen, if
5757:   // an ExpressionNode has the `.children` property, it will be used instead of
5758:   // `.content`.
5759:   const children = []
5760:   ids.sort((a, b) => a.start - b.start)
5761:   ids.forEach((id, i) => {
5762:     // range is offset by -1 due to the wrapping parens when parsed
5763:     const start = id.start - 1
5764:     const end = id.end - 1
5765:     const last = ids[i - 1]
5766:     const leadingText = rawExp.slice(last ? last.end - 1 : 0, start)
5767:     if (leadingText.length || id.prefix) {
5768:       children.push(leadingText + (id.prefix || ``))
5769:     }
5770:     const source = rawExp.slice(start, end)
5771:     children.push(
5772:       createSimpleExpression(
5773:         id.name,
5774:         false,
5775:         {
5776:           source,
5777:           start: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, start),
5778:           end: advancePositionWithClone(node.loc.start, source, end)
5779:         },
5780:         id.isConstant ? ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY : ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
5781:       )
5782:     )
5783:     if (i === ids.length - 1 && end < rawExp.length) {
5784:       children.push(rawExp.slice(end))
5785:     }
5786:   })
5787: 
5788:   let ret
5789:   if (children.length) {
5790:     ret = createCompoundExpression(children, node.loc)
5791:   } else {
5792:     ret = node
5793:     ret.constType = bailConstant
5794:       ? ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
5795:       : ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY
5796:   }
5797:   ret.identifiers = Object.keys(knownIds)
5798:   return ret
5799: }
5800: 
5801: function canPrefix(id) {
5802:   // skip whitelisted globals
5803:   if (isGloballyWhitelisted(id.name)) {
5804:     return false
5805:   }
5806:   // special case for webpack compilation
5807:   if (id.name === 'require') {
5808:     return false
5809:   }
5810:   return true
5811: }
5812: 
5813: function stringifyExpression(exp){
5814:   if (isString(exp)) {
5815:     return exp
5816:   } else if (exp.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
5817:     return exp.content
5818:   } else {
5819:     return exp.children.map(stringifyExpression).join('')
5820:   }
5821: }
5822: 
5823: function createRoot(children, loc = locStub) {
5824:   return {
5825:     type: NodeTypes.ROOT,
5826:     children,
5827:     helpers: [],
5828:     components: [],
5829:     directives: [],
5830:     hoists: [],
5831:     imports: [],
5832:     cached: 0,
5833:     temps: 0,
5834:     codegenNode: undefined,
5835:     loc
5836:   }
5837: }
5838: function createVNodeCall(
5839:   context,
5840:   tag,
5841:   props,
5842:   children,
5843:   patchFlag,
5844:   dynamicProps,
5845:   directives,
5846:   isBlock = false,
5847:   disableTracking = false,
5848:   isComponent = false,
5849:   loc = locStub
5850: ) {
5851:   if (context) {
5852:     // 单个子节点用 block
5853:     if (isBlock) {
5854:       context.helper(OPEN_BLOCK)
5855:       context.helper(getVNodeBlockHelper(context.inSSR, isComponent))
5856:     } else {
5857:       // 多个节节点用 fragment
5858:       context.helper(getVNodeHelper(context.inSSR, isComponent))
5859:     }
5860:     if (directives) {
5861:       context.helper(WITH_DIRECTIVES)
5862:     }
5863:   }
5864: 
5865:   return {
5866:     type: NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL,
5867:     tag,
5868:     props,
5869:     children,
5870:     patchFlag,
5871:     dynamicProps,
5872:     directives,
5873:     isBlock,
5874:     disableTracking,
5875:     isComponent,
5876:     loc
5877:   }
5878: }
5879: function createArrayExpression(elements, loc = locStub) {
5880:   return {
5881:     type: NodeTypes.JS_ARRAY_EXPRESSION,
5882:     loc,
5883:     elements
5884:   }
5885: }
5886: function createObjectExpression(properties, loc = locStub) {
5887:   return {
5888:     type: NodeTypes.JS_OBJECT_EXPRESSION,
5889:     loc,
5890:     properties
5891:   }
5892: }
5893: function createObjectProperty(key, value) {
5894:   return {
5895:     type: NodeTypes.JS_PROPERTY,
5896:     loc: locStub,
5897:     key: isString(key) ? createSimpleExpression(key, true) : key,
5898:     value
5899:   }
5900: }
5901: function createSimpleExpression(
5902:   content,
5903:   isStatic = false,
5904:   loc  = locStub,
5905:   constType = ConstantTypes.NOT_CONSTANT
5906: ) {
5907:   return {
5908:     type: NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION,
5909:     loc,
5910:     content,
5911:     isStatic,
5912:     constType: isStatic ? ConstantTypes.CAN_STRINGIFY : constType
5913:   }
5914: }
5915: function createInterpolation(content, loc) {
5916:   return {
5917:     type: NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION,
5918:     loc,
5919:     content: isString(content)
5920:       ? createSimpleExpression(content, false, loc)
5921:       : content
5922:   }
5923: }
5924: function createCompoundExpression(children, loc = locStub) {
5925:   return {
5926:     type: NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION,
5927:     loc,
5928:     children
5929:   }
5930: }
5931: function createCallExpression(callee, args = [], loc = locStub) {
5932:   return {
5933:     type: NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION,
5934:     loc,
5935:     callee,
5936:     arguments: args
5937:   }
5938: }
5939: function createFunctionExpression(
5940:   params,
5941:   returns = undefined,
5942:   newline = false,
5943:   isSlot = false,
5944:   loc = locStub
5945: ) {
5946:   return {
5947:     type: NodeTypes.JS_FUNCTION_EXPRESSION,
5948:     params,
5949:     returns,
5950:     newline,
5951:     isSlot,
5952:     loc
5953:   }
5954: }
5955: function createConditionalExpression(
5956:   test,
5957:   consequent,
5958:   alternate,
5959:   newline = true
5960: ) {
5961:   return {
5962:     type: NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION,
5963:     test,
5964:     consequent,
5965:     alternate,
5966:     newline,
5967:     loc: locStub
5968:   }
5969: }
5970: function createCacheExpression(
5971:   index,
5972:   value,
5973:   isVNode = false
5974: ) {
5975:   return {
5976:     type: NodeTypes.JS_CACHE_EXPRESSION,
5977:     index,
5978:     value,
5979:     isVNode,
5980:     loc: locStub
5981:   }
5982: }
5983: function createBlockStatement(body) {
5984:   return {
5985:     type: NodeTypes.JS_BLOCK_STATEMENT,
5986:     body,
5987:     loc: locStub
5988:   }
5989: }
5990: function createTemplateLiteral(elements) {
5991:   return {
5992:     type: NodeTypes.JS_TEMPLATE_LITERAL,
5993:     elements,
5994:     loc: locStub
5995:   }
5996: }
5997: function createIfStatement(test, consequent, alternate) {
5998:   return {
5999:     type: NodeTypes.JS_IF_STATEMENT,
6000:     test,
6001:     consequent,
6002:     alternate,
6003:     loc: locStub
6004:   }
6005: }
6006: function createAssignmentExpression(left, right) {
6007:   return {
6008:     type: NodeTypes.JS_ASSIGNMENT_EXPRESSION,
6009:     left,
6010:     right,
6011:     loc: locStub
6012:   }
6013: }
6014: function createSequenceExpression(expressions) {
6015:   return {
6016:     type: NodeTypes.JS_SEQUENCE_EXPRESSION,
6017:     expressions,
6018:     loc: locStub
6019:   }
6020: }
6021: function createReturnStatement(returns) {
6022:   return {
6023:     type: NodeTypes.JS_RETURN_STATEMENT,
6024:     returns,
6025:     loc: locStub
6026:   }
6027: }
6028: 
6029: function transform(root, options) {
6030:   // transform 上下文
6031:   const context = createTransformContext(root, options)
6032: 
6033:   // 递归遍历整个 ast root 树，最终为每颗子树生成 codegenNode
6034:   traverseNode(root, context)
6035: 
6036:   // 静态提升处理
6037:   if (options.hoistStatic) {
6038:     hoistStatic(root, context)
6039:   }
6040: 
6041:   // 创建 root codegenNode 代码
6042:   if (!options.ssr) {
6043:     createRootCodegen(root, context)
6044:   }
6045: 
6046:   // finalize meta information
6047:   root.helpers = [...context.helpers.keys()]
6048:   root.components = [...context.components]
6049:   root.directives = [...context.directives]
6050:   root.imports = context.imports
6051:   root.hoists = context.hoists
6052:   root.temps = context.temps
6053:   root.cached = context.cached
6054: }
6055: function getBaseTransformPreset(prefixIdentifiers) {
6056:   return [
6057:     [
6058:       transformOnce,
6059:       transformIf,
6060:       transformMemo,
6061:       transformFor,
6062:       ...(!__BROWSER__ && prefixIdentifiers
6063:         ? [
6064:             // order is important
6065:             trackVForSlotScopes,
6066:             transformExpression
6067:           ]
6068:         : __BROWSER__ && __DEV__
6069:         ? [transformExpression]
6070:         : []),
6071:       transformSlotOutlet,
6072:       transformElement,
6073:       trackSlotScopes,
6074:       transformText
6075:     ],
6076:     {
6077:       on: transformOn,
6078:       bind: transformBind,
6079:       model: transformModel
6080:     }
6081:   ]
6082: }
6083: const PURE_ANNOTATION = `/*#__PURE__*/`
6084: 
6085: function isText$1(n) {
6086:   return (
6087:     isString(n) ||
6088:     n.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION ||
6089:     n.type === NodeTypes.TEXT ||
6090:     n.type === NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION ||
6091:     n.type === NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION
6092:   )
6093: }
6094: 
6095: // 过滤掉后面空值参数fn(a, b, c, null, undefined, '') => fn(a,b,c)
6096: function genNullableArgs(args) {
6097:   let i = args.length
6098:   while (i--) {
6099:     if (args[i] != null) break
6100:   }
6101:   return args.slice(0, i + 1).map(arg => arg || `null`)
6102: }
6103: 
6104: // 生成对象的 key 值，可能是个表达式，如： { [a + b + c]: value }
6105: function genExpressionAsPropertyKey(node, context) {
6106:   const { push } = context
6107:   if (node.type === NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION) {
6108:     push(`[`)
6109:     genCompoundExpression(node, context)
6110:     push(`]`)
6111:   } else if (node.isStatic) {
6112:     // only quote keys if necessary
6113:     const text = isSimpleIdentifier(node.content)
6114:       ? node.content
6115:       : JSON.stringify(node.content)
6116:     push(text, node)
6117:   } else {
6118:     push(`[${node.content}]`, node)
6119:   }
6120: }
6121: function createCodegenContext(
6122:   ast,
6123:   {
6124:     mode = 'function',
6125:     prefixIdentifiers = mode === 'module',
6126:     sourceMap = false,
6127:     filename = `template.vue.html`,
6128:     scopeId = null,
6129:     optimizeImports = false,
6130:     runtimeGlobalName = `Vue`,
6131:     runtimeModuleName = `vue`,
6132:     ssrRuntimeModuleName = 'vue/server-renderer',
6133:     ssr = false,
6134:     isTS = false,
6135:     inSSR = false
6136:   }
6137: ) {
6138:   const context = {
6139:     mode,
6140:     prefixIdentifiers,
6141:     sourceMap,
6142:     filename,
6143:     scopeId,
6144:     optimizeImports,
6145:     runtimeGlobalName,
6146:     runtimeModuleName,
6147:     ssrRuntimeModuleName,
6148:     ssr,
6149:     isTS,
6150:     inSSR,
6151:     source: ast.loc.source,
6152:     code: ``,
6153:     column: 1,
6154:     line: 1,
6155:     offset: 0,
6156:     indentLevel: 0,
6157:     pure: false,
6158:     map: undefined,
6159:     helper(key) {
6160:       return `_${helperNameMap[key]}`
6161:     },
6162:     push(code, node) {
6163:       context.code += code
6164:       if (!__BROWSER__ && context.map) {
6165:         if (node) {
6166:           let name
6167:           if (node.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION && !node.isStatic) {
6168:             const content = node.content.replace(/^_ctx\./, '')
6169:             if (content !== node.content && isSimpleIdentifier(content)) {
6170:               name = content
6171:             }
6172:           }
6173:           addMapping(node.loc.start, name)
6174:         }
6175:         advancePositionWithMutation(context, code)
6176:         if (node && node.loc !== locStub) {
6177:           addMapping(node.loc.end)
6178:         }
6179:       }
6180:     },
6181:     indent() {
6182:       newline(++context.indentLevel)
6183:     },
6184:     deindent(withoutNewLine = false) {
6185:       if (withoutNewLine) {
6186:         --context.indentLevel
6187:       } else {
6188:         newline(--context.indentLevel)
6189:       }
6190:     },
6191:     newline() {
6192:       newline(context.indentLevel)
6193:     }
6194:   }
6195: 
6196:   function newline(n) {
6197:     context.push('\n' + `  `.repeat(n))
6198:   }
6199: 
6200:   function addMapping(loc, name) {
6201:     context.map.addMapping({
6202:       name,
6203:       source: context.filename,
6204:       original: {
6205:         line: loc.line,
6206:         column: loc.column - 1 // source-map column is 0 based
6207:       },
6208:       generated: {
6209:         line: context.line,
6210:         column: context.column - 1
6211:       }
6212:     })
6213:   }
6214: 
6215:   return context
6216: }
6217: 
6218: function genModulePreamble(ast, context, genScopeId, inline) {
6219:   const {
6220:     push,
6221:     newline,
6222:     optimizeImports,
6223:     runtimeModuleName,
6224:     ssrRuntimeModuleName
6225:   } = context
6226: 
6227:   if (genScopeId && ast.hoists.length) {
6228:     ast.helpers.push(PUSH_SCOPE_ID, POP_SCOPE_ID)
6229:   }
6230: 
6231:   // generate import statements for helpers
6232:   if (ast.helpers.length) {
6233:     if (optimizeImports) {
6234:       // when bundled with webpack with code-split, calling an import binding
6235:       // as a function leads to it being wrapped with `Object(a.b)` or `(0,a.b)`,
6236:       // incurring both payload size increase and potential perf overhead.
6237:       // therefore we assign the imports to variables (which is a constant ~50b
6238:       // cost per-component instead of scaling with template size)
6239:       push(
6240:         `import { ${ast.helpers
6241:           .map(s => helperNameMap[s])
6242:           .join(', ')} } from ${JSON.stringify(runtimeModuleName)}\n`
6243:       )
6244:       push(
6245:         `\n// Binding optimization for webpack code-split\nconst ${ast.helpers
6246:           .map(s => `_${helperNameMap[s]} = ${helperNameMap[s]}`)
6247:           .join(', ')}\n`
6248:       )
6249:     } else {
6250:       push(
6251:         `import { ${ast.helpers
6252:           .map(s => `${helperNameMap[s]} as _${helperNameMap[s]}`)
6253:           .join(', ')} } from ${JSON.stringify(runtimeModuleName)}\n`
6254:       )
6255:     }
6256:   }
6257: 
6258:   if (ast.ssrHelpers && ast.ssrHelpers.length) {
6259:     push(
6260:       `import { ${ast.ssrHelpers
6261:         .map(s => `${helperNameMap[s]} as _${helperNameMap[s]}`)
6262:         .join(', ')} } from "${ssrRuntimeModuleName}"\n`
6263:     )
6264:   }
6265: 
6266:   if (ast.imports.length) {
6267:     genImports(ast.imports, context)
6268:     newline()
6269:   }
6270: 
6271:   genHoists(ast.hoists, context)
6272:   newline()
6273: 
6274:   if (!inline) {
6275:     push(`export `)
6276:   }
6277: }
6278: function genImports(importsOptions, context) {
6279:   if (!importsOptions.length) {
6280:     return
6281:   }
6282:   importsOptions.forEach(imports => {
6283:     context.push(`import `)
6284:     genNode(imports.exp, context)
6285:     context.push(` from '${imports.path}'`)
6286:     context.newline()
6287:   })
6288: }
6289: function genFunctionPreamble(ast, context) {
6290:   const {
6291:     ssr,
6292:     prefixIdentifiers,
6293:     push,
6294:     newline,
6295:     runtimeModuleName,
6296:     runtimeGlobalName,
6297:     ssrRuntimeModuleName
6298:   } = context
6299:   const VueBinding =
6300:     !__BROWSER__ && ssr
6301:       ? `require(${JSON.stringify(runtimeModuleName)})`
6302:       : runtimeGlobalName
6303:   const aliasHelper = (s) => `${helperNameMap[s]}: _${helperNameMap[s]}`
6304:   // Generate const declaration for helpers
6305:   // In prefix mode, we place the const declaration at top so it's done
6306:   // only once; But if we not prefixing, we place the declaration inside the
6307:   // with block so it doesn't incur the `in` check cost for every helper access.
6308:   if (ast.helpers.length > 0) {
6309:     if (!__BROWSER__ && prefixIdentifiers) {
6310:       push(
6311:         `const { ${ast.helpers.map(aliasHelper).join(', ')} } = ${VueBinding}\n`
6312:       )
6313:     } else {
6314:       // "with" mode.
6315:       // save Vue in a separate variable to avoid collision
6316:       push(`const _Vue = ${VueBinding}\n`)
6317:       // in "with" mode, helpers are declared inside the with block to avoid
6318:       // has check cost, but hoists are lifted out of the function - we need
6319:       // to provide the helper here.
6320:       if (ast.hoists.length) {
6321:         const staticHelpers = [
6322:           CREATE_VNODE,
6323:           CREATE_ELEMENT_VNODE,
6324:           CREATE_COMMENT,
6325:           CREATE_TEXT,
6326:           CREATE_STATIC
6327:         ]
6328:           .filter(helper => ast.helpers.includes(helper))
6329:           .map(aliasHelper)
6330:           .join(', ')
6331:         push(`const { ${staticHelpers} } = _Vue\n`)
6332:       }
6333:     }
6334:   }
6335:   // generate variables for ssr helpers
6336:   if (!__BROWSER__ && ast.ssrHelpers && ast.ssrHelpers.length) {
6337:     // ssr guarantees prefixIdentifier: true
6338:     push(
6339:       `const { ${ast.ssrHelpers
6340:         .map(aliasHelper)
6341:         .join(', ')} } = require("${ssrRuntimeModuleName}")\n`
6342:     )
6343:   }
6344:   genHoists(ast.hoists, context)
6345:   newline()
6346:   push(`return `)
6347: }
6348: function genHoists(hoists, context) {
6349:   if (!hoists.length) {
6350:     return
6351:   }
6352:   context.pure = true
6353:   const { push, newline, helper, scopeId, mode } = context
6354:   const genScopeId = !__BROWSER__ && scopeId != null && mode !== 'function'
6355:   newline()
6356: 
6357:   // generate inlined withScopeId helper
6358:   if (genScopeId) {
6359:     push(
6360:       `const _withScopeId = n => (${helper(
6361:         PUSH_SCOPE_ID
6362:       )}("${scopeId}"),n=n(),${helper(POP_SCOPE_ID)}(),n)`
6363:     )
6364:     newline()
6365:   }
6366: 
6367:   for (let i = 0; i < hoists.length; i++) {
6368:     const exp = hoists[i]
6369:     if (exp) {
6370:       const needScopeIdWrapper = genScopeId && exp.type === NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL
6371:       push(
6372:         `const _hoisted_${i + 1} = ${
6373:           needScopeIdWrapper ? `${PURE_ANNOTATION} _withScopeId(() => ` : ``
6374:         }`
6375:       )
6376:       genNode(exp, context)
6377:       if (needScopeIdWrapper) {
6378:         push(`)`)
6379:       }
6380:       newline()
6381:     }
6382:   }
6383: 
6384:   context.pure = false
6385: }
6386: // type = 'component' | 'directive' | 'filter'
6387: function genAssets(assets, type, { helper, push, newline, isTS }) {
6388:   const resolver = helper(
6389:     type === 'component'
6390:       ? RESOLVE_COMPONENT
6391:       : RESOLVE_DIRECTIVE
6392:   )
6393:   for (let i = 0; i < assets.length; i++) {
6394:     let id = assets[i]
6395:     // potential component implicit self-reference inferred from SFC filename
6396:     const maybeSelfReference = id.endsWith('__self')
6397:     if (maybeSelfReference) {
6398:       id = id.slice(0, -6)
6399:     }
6400:     push(
6401:       `const ${toValidAssetId(id, type)} = ${resolver}(${JSON.stringify(id)}${
6402:         maybeSelfReference ? `, true` : ``
6403:       })${isTS ? `!` : ``}`
6404:     )
6405:     if (i < assets.length - 1) {
6406:       newline()
6407:     }
6408:   }
6409: }
6410: function genText(node, context) {
6411:   context.push(JSON.stringify(node.content), node)
6412: }
6413: function genExpression(node, context) {
6414:   const { content, isStatic } = node
6415:   context.push(isStatic ? JSON.stringify(content) : content, node)
6416: }
6417: function genInterpolation(node, context) {
6418:   const { push, helper, pure } = context
6419:   if (pure) push(PURE_ANNOTATION)
6420:   push(`${helper(TO_DISPLAY_STRING)}(`)
6421:   genNode(node.content, context)
6422:   push(`)`)
6423: }
6424: function genCompoundExpression(node, context) {
6425:   for (let i = 0; i < node.children.length; i++) {
6426:     const child = node.children[i]
6427:     if (isString(child)) {
6428:       context.push(child)
6429:     } else {
6430:       genNode(child, context)
6431:     }
6432:   }
6433: }
6434: function genComment(node, context) {
6435:   const { push, helper, pure } = context
6436:   if (pure) {
6437:     push(PURE_ANNOTATION)
6438:   }
6439:   push(`${helper(CREATE_COMMENT)}(${JSON.stringify(node.content)})`, node)
6440: }
6441: function genVNodeCall(node, context) {
6442:   const { push, helper, pure } = context
6443:   const {
6444:     tag,
6445:     props,
6446:     children,
6447:     patchFlag,
6448:     dynamicProps,
6449:     directives,
6450:     isBlock,
6451:     disableTracking,
6452:     isComponent
6453:   } = node
6454:   if (directives) {
6455:     push(helper(WITH_DIRECTIVES) + `(`)
6456:   }
6457:   if (isBlock) {
6458:     push(`(${helper(OPEN_BLOCK)}(${disableTracking ? `true` : ``}), `)
6459:   }
6460:   if (pure) {
6461:     push(PURE_ANNOTATION)
6462:   }
6463:   const callHelper = isBlock
6464:     ? getVNodeBlockHelper(context.inSSR, isComponent)
6465:     : getVNodeHelper(context.inSSR, isComponent)
6466:   push(helper(callHelper) + `(`, node)
6467:   genNodeList(
6468:     genNullableArgs([tag, props, children, patchFlag, dynamicProps]),
6469:     context
6470:   )
6471:   push(`)`)
6472:   if (isBlock) {
6473:     push(`)`)
6474:   }
6475:   if (directives) {
6476:     push(`, `)
6477:     genNode(directives, context)
6478:     push(`)`)
6479:   }
6480: }
6481: // JavaScript
6482: function genCallExpression(node, context) {
6483:   const { push, helper, pure } = context
6484:   const callee = isString(node.callee) ? node.callee : helper(node.callee)
6485:   if (pure) {
6486:     push(PURE_ANNOTATION)
6487:   }
6488:   push(callee + `(`, node)
6489:   genNodeList(node.arguments, context)
6490:   push(`)`)
6491: }
6492: function genObjectExpression(node, context) {
6493:   const { push, indent, deindent, newline } = context
6494:   const { properties } = node
6495:   if (!properties.length) {
6496:     push(`{}`, node)
6497:     return
6498:   }
6499:   const multilines =
6500:     properties.length > 1 ||
6501:     ((!__BROWSER__ || __DEV__) &&
6502:       properties.some(p => p.value.type !== NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION))
6503:   push(multilines ? `{` : `{ `)
6504:   multilines && indent()
6505:   for (let i = 0; i < properties.length; i++) {
6506:     const { key, value } = properties[i]
6507:     // key
6508:     genExpressionAsPropertyKey(key, context)
6509:     push(`: `)
6510:     // value
6511:     genNode(value, context)
6512:     if (i < properties.length - 1) {
6513:       // will only reach this if it's multilines
6514:       push(`,`)
6515:       newline()
6516:     }
6517:   }
6518:   multilines && deindent()
6519:   push(multilines ? `}` : ` }`)
6520: }
6521: function genArrayExpression(node, context) {
6522:   genNodeListAsArray(node.elements, context)
6523: }
6524: function genFunctionExpression(node, context) {
6525:   const { push, indent, deindent } = context
6526:   const { params, returns, body, newline, isSlot } = node
6527:   if (isSlot) {
6528:     // wrap slot functions with owner context
6529:     push(`_${helperNameMap[WITH_CTX]}(`)
6530:   }
6531:   push(`(`, node)
6532:   if (isArray(params)) {
6533:     genNodeList(params, context)
6534:   } else if (params) {
6535:     genNode(params, context)
6536:   }
6537:   push(`) => `)
6538:   if (newline || body) {
6539:     push(`{`)
6540:     indent()
6541:   }
6542:   if (returns) {
6543:     if (newline) {
6544:       push(`return `)
6545:     }
6546:     if (isArray(returns)) {
6547:       genNodeListAsArray(returns, context)
6548:     } else {
6549:       genNode(returns, context)
6550:     }
6551:   } else if (body) {
6552:     genNode(body, context)
6553:   }
6554:   if (newline || body) {
6555:     deindent()
6556:     push(`}`)
6557:   }
6558:   if (isSlot) {
6559:     push(`)`)
6560:   }
6561: }
6562: function genConditionalExpression(node, context) {
6563:   const { test, consequent, alternate, newline: needNewline } = node
6564:   const { push, indent, deindent, newline } = context
6565:   if (test.type === NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION) {
6566:     const needsParens = !isSimpleIdentifier(test.content)
6567:     needsParens && push(`(`)
6568:     genExpression(test, context)
6569:     needsParens && push(`)`)
6570:   } else {
6571:     push(`(`)
6572:     genNode(test, context)
6573:     push(`)`)
6574:   }
6575:   needNewline && indent()
6576:   context.indentLevel++
6577:   needNewline || push(` `)
6578:   push(`? `)
6579:   genNode(consequent, context)
6580:   context.indentLevel--
6581:   needNewline && newline()
6582:   needNewline || push(` `)
6583:   push(`: `)
6584:   const isNested = alternate.type === NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION
6585:   if (!isNested) {
6586:     context.indentLevel++
6587:   }
6588:   genNode(alternate, context)
6589:   if (!isNested) {
6590:     context.indentLevel--
6591:   }
6592:   needNewline && deindent(true /* without newline */)
6593: }
6594: function genCacheExpression(node, context) {
6595:   const { push, helper, indent, deindent, newline } = context
6596:   push(`_cache[${node.index}] || (`)
6597:   if (node.isVNode) {
6598:     indent()
6599:     push(`${helper(SET_BLOCK_TRACKING)}(-1),`)
6600:     newline()
6601:   }
6602:   push(`_cache[${node.index}] = `)
6603:   genNode(node.value, context)
6604:   if (node.isVNode) {
6605:     push(`,`)
6606:     newline()
6607:     push(`${helper(SET_BLOCK_TRACKING)}(1),`)
6608:     newline()
6609:     push(`_cache[${node.index}]`)
6610:     deindent()
6611:   }
6612:   push(`)`)
6613: }
6614: function genNodeList(nodes, context, multilines = false, comma = true) {
6615:   const { push, newline } = context
6616:   for (let i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {
6617:     const node = nodes[i]
6618:     if (isString(node)) {
6619:       push(node)
6620:     } else if (isArray(node)) {
6621:       genNodeListAsArray(node, context)
6622:     } else {
6623:       genNode(node, context)
6624:     }
6625:     if (i < nodes.length - 1) {
6626:       if (multilines) {
6627:         comma && push(',')
6628:         newline()
6629:       } else {
6630:         comma && push(', ')
6631:       }
6632:     }
6633:   }
6634: }
6635: function genTemplateLiteral(node, context) {
6636:   const { push, indent, deindent } = context
6637:   push('`')
6638:   const l = node.elements.length
6639:   const multilines = l > 3
6640:   for (let i = 0; i < l; i++) {
6641:     const e = node.elements[i]
6642:     if (isString(e)) {
6643:       push(e.replace(/(`|\$|\\)/g, '\\$1'))
6644:     } else {
6645:       push('${')
6646:       if (multilines) indent()
6647:       genNode(e, context)
6648:       if (multilines) deindent()
6649:       push('}')
6650:     }
6651:   }
6652:   push('`')
6653: }
6654: function genIfStatement(node, context) {
6655:   const { push, indent, deindent } = context
6656:   const { test, consequent, alternate } = node
6657:   push(`if (`)
6658:   genNode(test, context)
6659:   push(`) {`)
6660:   indent()
6661:   genNode(consequent, context)
6662:   deindent()
6663:   push(`}`)
6664:   if (alternate) {
6665:     push(` else `)
6666:     if (alternate.type === NodeTypes.JS_IF_STATEMENT) {
6667:       genIfStatement(alternate, context)
6668:     } else {
6669:       push(`{`)
6670:       indent()
6671:       genNode(alternate, context)
6672:       deindent()
6673:       push(`}`)
6674:     }
6675:   }
6676: }
6677: function genAssignmentExpression(node, context) {
6678:   genNode(node.left, context)
6679:   context.push(` = `)
6680:   genNode(node.right, context)
6681: }
6682: function genSequenceExpression(node, context) {
6683:   context.push(`(`)
6684:   genNodeList(node.expressions, context)
6685:   context.push(`)`)
6686: }
6687: function genReturnStatement({ returns }, context) {
6688:   context.push(`return `)
6689:   if (isArray(returns)) {
6690:     genNodeListAsArray(returns, context)
6691:   } else {
6692:     genNode(returns, context)
6693:   }
6694: }
6695: 
6696: function genNode(node, context) {
6697:   if (isString(node)) {
6698:     context.push(node)
6699:     return
6700:   }
6701:   if (isSymbol(node)) {
6702:     context.push(context.helper(node))
6703:     return
6704:   }
6705:   switch (node.type) {
6706:     case NodeTypes.ELEMENT:
6707:     case NodeTypes.IF:
6708:     case NodeTypes.FOR:
6709:       genNode(node.codegenNode, context)
6710:       break
6711:     case NodeTypes.TEXT:
6712:       genText(node, context)
6713:       break
6714:     case NodeTypes.SIMPLE_EXPRESSION:
6715:       genExpression(node, context)
6716:       break
6717:     case NodeTypes.INTERPOLATION:
6718:       genInterpolation(node, context)
6719:       break
6720:     case NodeTypes.TEXT_CALL:
6721:       genNode(node.codegenNode, context)
6722:       break
6723:     case NodeTypes.COMPOUND_EXPRESSION:
6724:       genCompoundExpression(node, context)
6725:       break
6726:     case NodeTypes.COMMENT:
6727:       genComment(node, context)
6728:       break
6729:     case NodeTypes.VNODE_CALL:
6730:       genVNodeCall(node, context)
6731:       break
6732: 
6733:     case NodeTypes.JS_CALL_EXPRESSION:
6734:       genCallExpression(node, context)
6735:       break
6736:     case NodeTypes.JS_OBJECT_EXPRESSION:
6737:       genObjectExpression(node, context)
6738:       break
6739:     case NodeTypes.JS_ARRAY_EXPRESSION:
6740:       genArrayExpression(node, context)
6741:       break
6742:     case NodeTypes.JS_FUNCTION_EXPRESSION:
6743:       genFunctionExpression(node, context)
6744:       break
6745:     case NodeTypes.JS_CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION:
6746:       genConditionalExpression(node, context)
6747:       break
6748:     case NodeTypes.JS_CACHE_EXPRESSION:
6749:       genCacheExpression(node, context)
6750:       break
6751:     case NodeTypes.JS_BLOCK_STATEMENT:
6752:       genNodeList(node.body, context, true, false)
6753:       break
6754: 
6755:     // SSR only types
6756:     case NodeTypes.JS_TEMPLATE_LITERAL:
6757:       !__BROWSER__ && genTemplateLiteral(node, context)
6758:       break
6759:     case NodeTypes.JS_IF_STATEMENT:
6760:       !__BROWSER__ && genIfStatement(node, context)
6761:       break
6762:     case NodeTypes.JS_ASSIGNMENT_EXPRESSION:
6763:       !__BROWSER__ && genAssignmentExpression(node, context)
6764:       break
6765:     case NodeTypes.JS_SEQUENCE_EXPRESSION:
6766:       !__BROWSER__ && genSequenceExpression(node, context)
6767:       break
6768:     case NodeTypes.JS_RETURN_STATEMENT:
6769:       !__BROWSER__ && genReturnStatement(node, context)
6770:       break
6771: 
6772:     /* istanbul ignore next */
6773:     case NodeTypes.IF_BRANCH:
6774:       // noop
6775:       break
6776:     default:
6777:       logg(`unhandled codegen node type: ${node.type}`)
6778:   }
6779: }
6780: function genNodeListAsArray(nodes, context) {
6781:   const multilines =
6782:     nodes.length > 3 ||
6783:     ((!__BROWSER__ || __DEV__) && nodes.some(n => isArray(n) || !isText(n)))
6784:   context.push(`[`)
6785:   multilines && context.indent()
6786:   genNodeList(nodes, context, multilines)
6787:   multilines && context.deindent()
6788:   context.push(`]`)
6789: }
6790: 
6791: function generate(ast, options = {}) {
6792:   const context = createCodegenContext(ast, options)
6793:   if (options.onContextCreated) options.onContextCreated(context)
6794:   const {
6795:     mode,
6796:     push,
6797:     prefixIdentifiers,
6798:     indent,
6799:     deindent,
6800:     newline,
6801:     scopeId,
6802:     ssr
6803:   } = context
6804: 
6805:   const hasHelpers = ast.helpers.length > 0
6806:   const useWithBlock = !prefixIdentifiers && mode !== 'module'
6807:   const genScopeId = !__BROWSER__ && scopeId != null && mode === 'module'
6808:   const isSetupInlined = !__BROWSER__ && !!options.inline
6809: 
6810:   // preambles
6811:   // in setup() inline mode, the preamble is generated in a sub context
6812:   // and returned separately.
6813:   const preambleContext = isSetupInlined
6814:     ? createCodegenContext(ast, options)
6815:     : context
6816:   if (!__BROWSER__ && mode === 'module') {
6817:     genModulePreamble(ast, preambleContext, genScopeId, isSetupInlined)
6818:   } else {
6819:     genFunctionPreamble(ast, preambleContext)
6820:   }
6821:   // enter render function
6822:   const functionName = ssr ? `ssrRender` : `render`
6823:   const args = ssr ? ['_ctx', '_push', '_parent', '_attrs'] : ['_ctx', '_cache']
6824:   if (!__BROWSER__ && options.bindingMetadata && !options.inline) {
6825:     // binding optimization args
6826:     args.push('$props', '$setup', '$data', '$options')
6827:   }
6828:   const signature =
6829:     !__BROWSER__ && options.isTS
6830:       ? args.map(arg => `${arg}: any`).join(',')
6831:       : args.join(', ')
6832: 
6833:   if (isSetupInlined) {
6834:     push(`(${signature}) => {`)
6835:   } else {
6836:     push(`function ${functionName}(${signature}) {`)
6837:   }
6838:   indent()
6839: 
6840:   if (useWithBlock) {
6841:     push(`with (_ctx) {`)
6842:     indent()
6843:     // function mode const declarations should be inside with block
6844:     // also they should be renamed to avoid collision with user properties
6845:     if (hasHelpers) {
6846:       push(
6847:         `const { ${ast.helpers
6848:           .map(s => `${helperNameMap[s]}: _${helperNameMap[s]}`)
6849:           .join(', ')} } = _Vue`
6850:       )
6851:       push(`\n`)
6852:       newline()
6853:     }
6854:   }
6855: 
6856:   // generate asset resolution statements
6857:   if (ast.components.length) {
6858:     genAssets(ast.components, 'component', context)
6859:     if (ast.directives.length || ast.temps > 0) {
6860:       newline()
6861:     }
6862:   }
6863:   if (ast.directives.length) {
6864:     genAssets(ast.directives, 'directive', context)
6865:     if (ast.temps > 0) {
6866:       newline()
6867:     }
6868:   }
6869: 
6870:   // 临时变量
6871:   if (ast.temps > 0) {
6872:     push(`let `)
6873:     for (let i = 0; i < ast.temps; i++) {
6874:       push(`${i > 0 ? `, ` : ``}_temp${i}`)
6875:     }
6876:   }
6877:   if (ast.components.length || ast.directives.length || ast.temps) {
6878:     push(`\n`)
6879:     newline()
6880:   }
6881: 
6882:   // generate the VNode tree expression
6883:   if (!ssr) {
6884:     push(`return `)
6885:   }
6886:   if (ast.codegenNode) {
6887:     genNode(ast.codegenNode, context)
6888:   } else {
6889:     push(`null`)
6890:   }
6891: 
6892:   if (useWithBlock) {
6893:     deindent()
6894:     push(`}`)
6895:   }
6896: 
6897:   deindent()
6898:   push(`}`)
6899: 
6900:   return {
6901:     ast,
6902:     code: context.code,
6903:     preamble: isSetupInlined ? preambleContext.code : ``,
6904:     // SourceMapGenerator does have toJSON() method but it's not in the types
6905:     map: context.map ? context.map.toJSON() : undefined
6906:   }
6907: }
6908: 
6909: function baseCompile(template, options = {}) {
6910:   const isModuleMode = options.mode === 'module'
6911: 
6912:   const prefixIdentifiers =
6913:     !__BROWSER__ && (options.prefixIdentifiers === true || isModuleMode)
6914: 
6915:   const ast = isString(template) ? baseParse(template, options) : template
6916:   const [nodeTransforms, directiveTransforms] = getBaseTransformPreset(prefixIdentifiers)
6917: 
6918:   // 转换出每个节点的 codegenNode
6919:   transform(
6920:     ast,
6921:     extend({}, options, {
6922:       prefixIdentifiers,
6923:       nodeTransforms: [
6924:         ...nodeTransforms,
6925:         ...(options.nodeTransforms || []) // user transforms
6926:       ],
6927:       directiveTransforms: extend(
6928:         {},
6929:         directiveTransforms,
6930:         options.directiveTransforms || {} // user transforms
6931:       )
6932:     })
6933:   )
6934: 
6935:   // 生成 codegen
6936:   return generate(ast, extend({}, options, { prefixIdentifiers }))
6937: }

5.1. getBaseTransformPreset()

 1: function getBaseTransformPreset(prefixIdentifiers) {
 2:   return [
 3:     [
 4:       transformOnce,
 5:       transformIf,
 6:       transformMemo,
 7:       transformFor,
 8:       ...(!__BROWSER__ && prefixIdentifiers
 9:         ? [
10:             // order is important
11:             trackVForSlotScopes,
12:             transformExpression
13:           ]
14:         : __BROWSER__ && __DEV__
15:         ? [transformExpression]
16:         : []),
17:       transformSlotOutlet,
18:       transformElement,
19:       trackSlotScopes,
20:       transformText
21:     ],
22:     {
23:       on: transformOn,
24:       bind: transformBind,
25:       model: transformModel
26:     }
27:   ]
28: }

5.2. testing

测试及案例分析(含流程图)，输入对应的模板生成 render 函数:

旧博客中包含很多测试用例和对应的流程图可供参考：Vue3 源码头脑风暴之☞compiler-core - 若叶知秋

Author: Zhicheng Lee
